诗歌选集

December 22, 2016

001 赞美和敬拜——三一神

一 阿爸父神，我们拜你，

称颂你名永无止！

你选我们，在基督里，

成为圣洁无瑕疵。

我们敬拜，因你大恩，

赞美阿爸当高声！

我们敬拜，因你大恩，

赞美阿爸当高声！

二 永远之子，我们拜你——

登上宝座的羔羊！

神的羔羊，我们屈膝，

你领我们近身旁！

我们敬拜，因你救赎，

神子竟来为人死！

我们敬拜，因你救赎，

神子竟来为人死！

三 父、子、圣灵，三一之神，

我们今向你颂赞！

承受你的一切丰盛，

口唱心和发感赞！

我们敬拜，因你所是，

我们颂扬到万代！

我们敬拜，因你所是，

我们颂扬到万代！

001 8.7.8.7.D.

  1. God, our Father, we adore Thee!

We, Thy children, bless Thy Name!

Chosen in the Christ before Thee,

We are “holy without blame.”

We adore Thee! We adore Thee!

Abba’s praises we proclaim!

We adore Thee! We adore Thee!

Abba’s praises we proclaim!

  1. Son Eternal, we adore Thee!

Lamb upon the throne on high!

Lamb of God, we bow before Thee,

Thou hast brought Thy people nigh!

We adore Thee! We adore Thee!

Son of God, who came to die!

We adore Thee! We adore Thee!

Son of God, who came to die!

  1. Father, Son and Holy Spirit–

Three in One! We give Thee praise!

For the riches we inherit,

Heart and voice to Thee we raise!

We adore Thee! We adore Thee!

Thee we bless, through endless days!

We adore Thee! We adore Thee!

Thee we bless, through endless days!

002 赞美和敬拜——三一神

一 全能君王我神！

教我颂赞你名，

颂赞不停：

赞美父神尊荣，

赞你超越得胜，

赞你权能统治，

直到永世。

二 神子成了肉身！

显出无限权能，

听我呼声：

赐你子民福分，

使你应许得成——

降下圣洁之灵，

使我成圣。

三 保惠之灵降临！

负起神圣见证，

在此良辰：

以你生命大能，

在我心中执政，

永远住我里面，

运行、成全。

四 大哉，三一之神！

永远配得称颂，

永世无终！

直到荣耀之中，

瞻你无上尊荣，

献上爱戴、尊敬，

永无止境！

002 6.6.4.6.6.6.4.

  1. Come, Thou Almighty King,

Help us Thy name to sing,

Help us to praise.

Father, all glorious,

O’er all victorious,

Come, and reign over us,

Ancient of Days.

  1. Come, Thou incarnate Word,

Gird on Thy mighty sword,

Our prayer attend:

Come, and Thy people bless,

And give Thy word success;

Spirit of holiness,

On us descend.

  1. Come, holy Comforter,

Thy sacred witness bear

In this glad hour:

Thou who Almighty art,

Now rule in every heart,

And ne’er from us depart,

Spirit of power.

  1. To Thee, great One in Three,

Eternal praises be

Hence evermore.

Thy sov’reign majesty

May we in glory see,

And to eternity

Love and adore.

[]{#_Toc65240571 .anchor}

003 赞美和敬拜——三一神

一 圣哉、圣哉、圣哉，全能的主神！

我们向你扬声，颂赞直到永远；

圣哉、圣哉、圣哉，全能而又慈怜！

一神别三位，三位是一神！

二 圣哉、圣哉、圣哉，众圣都下拜；

天上长老冠冕，玻璃海前抛开；

基路伯，撒拉弗，也都一同敬拜

永远常存主，昔在又今在。

三 圣哉、圣哉、圣哉，你藏身黑暗，

纵然罪人不能看见你的荣光，

惟你乃是至圣，无何与你相像；

爱、纯洁、能力，惟独你完全！

003 12.13.12.10.

  1. Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord, God Almighty!

Unto everlasting days our song shall rise to Thee;

Holy, Holy, Holy, Merciful and Mighty!

God in Three Persons, blessed Trinity!

  1. Holy, Holy, Holy! all the saints adore Thee;

Heaven’s elders cast their crowns down by the glassy sea;

Cherubim and seraphim worship too before Thee,

Who wert, and art, and evermore shalt be.

  1. Holy, Holy, Holy! though the darkness hide Thee,

Though the eye of sinful man Thy glory may not see,

Only Thou art holy, there is none beside Thee,

Perfect in power, in love, and purity.

004 赞美和敬拜——三一神

一 亲爱天父，我感谢你，

亲爱天父，我感谢你，

我爱你、敬拜你，

俯伏在你面前，

亲爱天父，我感谢你。

二 神的爱子，你何奇妙，

神的爱子，你何奇妙，

洗我罪、苏我魂，

差遣圣灵内住，

神的爱子，你何奇妙。

004 Irregular Meter

l Heavenly Father, I appreciate you,

Heavenly Father, I appreciate you,

I love you, adore you,

I bow down before you;

Heavenly Father, I appreciate you.

  1. Son of God, what a wonder you are,

Son of God, what a wonder you are;

You’ve cleansed my soul from sin,

Sent the Holy Ghost within;

Son of God, what a wonder you are.

005 赞美和敬拜——三一神

一 父神，我敬拜你；

我将一生给你，

我真爱你！

二 耶稣，我敬拜你；

我将一生给你，

我真爱你！

三 圣灵，我敬拜你；

我将一生给你，

我真爱你！

005 6.6.4.

  1. Father, I adore you;

lay my life before you.

How I love you!

  1. Jesus, I adore you;

lay my life before you.

How I love you!

  1. Spirit, I adore you;

lay my life before you.

How I love you!

006 赞美和敬拜——三一神

赞美我神，万福源头；

天下万有向祂歌讴；

天上众军和声响应；

赞美圣父、圣子、圣灵！

006 8. 6. 8. 6. with chorus

Praise God, from whom all blessings flow;

Praise Him, all creatures here below;

Praise Him above, ye heav’nly host;

Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost!

007 赞美和敬拜——三一神

荣耀，荣耀归于圣父，

荣耀，荣耀归圣子，

荣耀，荣耀归于圣灵，

荣耀归神永无止。

和 高声赞美！高声赞美！

高声赞美三一神！

荣耀归祂！荣耀归祂！

荣耀，荣耀，神来施救恩。

007 8. 7. 8. 7. with chorus

Glory, glory to the Father!

Glory, glory to the Son!

Glory, glory to the Spirit!

Glory to the Three in One!

Let us praise Him! Let us praise Him!

Praise our God, the Three in One!

Give Him glory; Give Him glory!

Wondrous things for us our God hath done!

008 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的伟大)

一 当我思念，我主，你创造大工，

我心立即肃然赞叹惊奇！

我见众星，又闻那雷声隆隆，

宇宙到处显示你的能力！

和 我心不禁，歌颂我主、我神：

“你真伟大！你真伟大！”

我心不禁，歌颂我主、我神：

“你真伟大！你真伟大！”

二 当我漫步，在林间树下徘徊，

鸟语啾啾，柔美唱和树梢；

当我伫立，从山巅俯视四围，

涧水潺潺，和风息息拂到。

三 当我思想，神竟不吝祂爱子，

差祂受死，我真难以领会；

十字架上，甘为我担罪不辞，

流血至死，使我得蒙赦罪。

四 当主再临，天地要欢呼爆发，

我心欢乐，因将被接回家；

那时我要谦卑屈膝敬拜祂，

并要宣告：“我神，你真伟大！”

008 11. 10.11.10. with chorus

  1. O Lord my God, when I in awesome wonder,

Consider all the works Thy hand hath made;

I see the stars, I hear the mighty thunder,

Thy power through out the universe displayed.

Then sings my soul, my Savior God to Thee:

How great Thou art, how great Thou art.

Then sings my soul, my Savior God to Thee,

How great Thou art, how great Thou art.

  1. When through the woods and forest glades I wander,

And hear the birds sing sweetly in the trees:

When I look down from lofty mountain grandeur,

And hear the brook and feel the gentle breeze:

  1. And when I think, that God, His son not sparing,

Sent Him to die, I scarce can take it in:

That on the cross, my burden gladly bearing,

He bled and died to take away my sin:

  1. When Christ shall come, with shout of acclamation,

And take me home, what joy shall fill my heart!

Then shall I bow, in humble adoration,

And there proclaim, my God, how great Thou art!

009 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的荣耀)

一 父阿，我爱你，

我敬拜并尊崇你，

在全地荣耀你的圣名。

荣耀你的名，

荣耀你的名，

在全地荣耀你的圣名。

二 耶稣，我爱你，

我敬拜并尊崇你，

在全地荣耀你的圣名。

荣耀你的名，

荣耀你的名，

在全地荣耀你的圣名。

009 Irregular Meter

  1. Father, we love You,

We worship and adore You,

Glorify Thy name in all the earth.

Glorify Thy name,

Glorify Thy name,

Glorify Thy name in all the earth.

  1. Jesus, we love You,

We worship and adore You;

Glorify Thy name in all the earth.

Glorify Thy name,

Glorify Thy name,

Glorify Thy name in all the earth.

010 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的爱)

一 神阿，你为何故

赐下耶稣基督，

你所爱的儿子，

来为罪人受死？

无它，乃是你的大爱，

无它，乃是你的大爱，

叫你这样舍去心爱。

二 神，你儿子为何

离开天上宝座，

受苦直到命绝，

流出祂的宝血？

无它，乃是祂的大爱，

无它，乃是祂的大爱，

叫祂这样为我受害。

三 甚么感动你心，

叫你赐下圣灵，

将天上的平安，

充满我们心坎？

无它，乃是你的大爱，

无它，乃是你的大爱，

叫你这样差遣祂来。

四 神阿，你恩这大！

我爱实在太差！

我心应当涌出

感谢、赞美、欢呼，

求主使我因你大爱，

求主使我因你大爱，

向你歌颂直到万代。

010 6. 6. 6. 6. 8. 8.

  1. What was it, blessed God,

Led Thee to give Thy Son,

To yield Thy well be loved

For us by sin undone?

’Twas love unbounded led Thee thus,

’Twas love unbounded led Thee thus

To give Thy well be loved for us.

  1. What led Thy Son, O God,

To leave Thy throne on high,

To shed His precious blood,

To suffer and to die?

’Twas love—unbounded love to us

’Twas love—unbounded love to us

Led Him to die and suffer thus.

­­­­­­­­

  1. What moved Thee to impart

Thy Spirit from above,

Therewith to fill our heart

With heavenly peace and love?

’Twas love—unbounded love to us

’Twas love—unbounded love to us

Moved Thee to give Thy Spirit thus.

  1. What love to Thee we owe,

Our God, for all Thy grace!

Our hearts may well o’erflow

In everlasting praise!

Make us, O God, to praise Thee thus

Make us, O God, to praise Thee thus

For all Thy boundless love to us.

011 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的爱)

一 神的大爱真是远超

笔所能描、口所能陈；

它比最高星宿还高，

它比最深地狱还深。

始祖犯罪，惊恐自危，

神赐爱子来救；

当人痛悔，神就迎归，

所有过犯全勾。

和 哦，神的爱，何其丰富、

何其无法测量！

它是坚强，存到永古，

天使、圣徒同唱。

二 岁月消逝，荣华衰败，

天地废去，事物更变，

人今拒绝神的大爱，

那日惟有求助山岩；

神的大爱，不会稍改，

何其无法测量；

大施恩贷，免人罪债，

圣徒、天使同唱。

三 纵令洋海尽是墨汁，

无边穹苍都成白纸，

田间草杆根根笔枝，

世上众人个个文士；

若写神的大爱无极，

一切犹感缺欠；

墨干、笔弃、纸罄、人敝，

未能写出半点。

011 Irregular Meter

  1. The love of God is greater far

Than tongue or pen can ever tell.

It goes beyond the highest star

And reaches to the lowest hell.

The guilty pair, bowed down with care

His Son to win;

His erring child He reconciled

from his sin.

O love of God, how rich and pure!

How measureless and strong!

It shall forevermore endure

The saints’ and angels’ song.

  1. When hoary time shall pass away,

And earthly thrones and kingdoms fall;

When men who here refuse to pray,

On rocks and hills and mountains call;

God’s love, so sure, shall still endure,

All measureless and strong;

Redeeming grace to Adam’s race

The saints’ and angels’ song.

  1. Could we with ink the ocean fill,

And were the skies of parchment made;

Were every stalk on earth a quill,

And every man a scribe by trade;

To write the love of God above

Would drain the ocean dry;

Nor could the scroll contain the whole,

Though stretched from sky to sky.

012 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的救赎)

一 颂赞归于我神，

祂将独生爱子赐给我们，

恩中之恩，包罗所有神恩；

颂赞归于我神。

二 祂有甚么不舍！

既将至宝使人白白得著，

甚至赐给卑贱、不堪如我，

祂有甚么不舍？

三 神不吝惜爱子！

此意平息每次内心恐惧，

此意消除多少为难心绪；

神不吝惜爱子！

四 谁能定罪我们？

基督已经死而复活、升天，

神前代祷、担当我们罪愆，

谁能定罪我们？

五 是神称义我们！

谁能使祂撤回赦罪恩典？

谁能再扣祂所断开锁链？

是神称义我们！

六 我们完全得胜！

大能救主来向我们施恩；

祂为我们争战早已得胜：

我们完全得胜！

012 6. 10. 10. 6.

  1. Blessed be God, our God,

Who gave for us His well beloved Son,

The gift of gifts, all other gifts in one;

Blessed be God, our God!

  1. What will He not bestow!

Who freely gave this mighty gift unbought,

Unmerited, unheeded, and unsought,

What will He not bestow?

  1. He spared not His Son!

‘Tis this that silences each rising fear,

‘Tis this that bids the hard tho’t disappear;

He spared not His Son!

  1. Who shall condemn us now?

Since Christ has died, and ris’n, and gone above,

For us to plead at the right hand of Love;

Who shall condemn us now?

  1. ‘Tis God that justifies!

Who shall recall His pardon or His grace?

Or who the broken chain of guilt replace?

’Tis God that justifies!

  1. The victory is ours!

For us in might came forth the mighty One;

For us He fought the fight, the triumph won:

The victory is ours!

013 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的爱)

一 看哪，父神赐给我们

是何等的慈爱，

失丧罪人，得称神子，

怎不全心感戴！

和 看哪，何等的慈爱！

父神赐给我们

是何等无限的慈爱，

使我们竟得称为

神的儿女——祂心爱！

二 今靠宝血，不再远离，

得以与神相近；

在爱子里，得蒙悦纳，

神心所喜所珍。

三 在荣耀里将要如何，

现今尚未显明；

但若得见宝贝救主，

必要像祂荣形。

四 我们有此蒙福盼望，

就要更加圣洁，

更像复活、荣耀的主，

不久将要面谒。

013 8. 6. 8. 6. with chorus

  1. Behold, what love, what boundless love,

The Father hath bestowed

On sinners lost, that we should be

Now called the sons of God!

Behold, what manner of love!

What manner of love,

the Father hath bestowed upon us,

That we, that we should be called,

Should be called the sons of God.

  1. No longer far from Him, but now

By “precious blood” made nigh;

Accepted in the “Well-beloved,”

Near to God’s heart we lie.

  1. What we in glory soon shall be,

It doth not yet appear;

But when our precious Lord we see,

We shall his image bear.

  1. With such a blessed hope in view,

We would more holy be,

More like our risen, glorious Lord,

Whose face we soon shall see.

014 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的救赎)

一 父神阿，你在羔羊里

是我的盼望和安息，

你名所表一切慈仁，

都是为著赐福我们。

二 伟大、智慧、公义、慈仁，

你是我父，又是我神；

我们属你，是藉宝血，

作你儿女，永远联结。

三 既是这样，愿你施恩，

好叫我们亲近你身；

你的同在作我居所，

你的大爱作我喜乐。

四 这叫我们永远欢腾，

这叫黑夜变为光明；

若有微息尚能称颂，

必引弱声向你歌诵。

014 8.8.8.8.

  1. O God! we see Thee in the Lamb

To be our hope, our joy, our rest;

The glories that compose Thy name

Standing engaged to make us blest.

  1. Thou great and good! Thou just and wise!

Hail! as our Father and our God!

For we are Thine by sacred ties,

Thy sons and daughters—bought with blood.

  1. Then, Oh! to us this grace afford,

That far from Thee we ne’er may move;

Our guard—the presence of the Lord;

Our joy—Thy perfect present love.

  1. This gives us ever to rejoice,

Turning to light our darkest days;

And lifts on high each feeble voice,

While we have breath to pray or praise.

015 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的爱)

一 我们从前所有，不过

就是死亡、罪过；

我们现今所有福分，

都是来自我神。

二 我在罪中，你爱来寻，

感动我心相信；

叫我因信得著安乐，

因著基督得活。

三 我为圣徒，现在所享，

和我将来盼望，

无一是我自己配得，

都是因你恩泽。

四 神，你这样丰富的爱，

谁能还清这债？

你爱真是远超人意，

神圣！不可思议！

五 哦父，但愿你今使我，

时刻明白更多：

像你这样慈爱的神，

当得我命、我心！

六 我心若说要报你爱，

聊以表明感戴，

我就还是不知你爱，

深阔远超洋海！

七 但愿我们对你大爱，

不致当作买卖；

你向我们所有爱心，

我们怎能报尽！

八 因此我们不再说报，

(你爱实在太高，)

我们惟有满心感戴，

向你永远敬拜。

九 慈爱父神，我们欠你，

一切都欠了你，

我们只好一面感激，

一面因子安息。

015 8.6.8.6.

  1. All that we were—our sin, our guilt,

Our death—was all our own:

All that we are we owe to Thee,

Thou God of grace alone.

  1. Thy mercy found us in our sins,

And gave us to believe;

Then, in believing, peace we found,

And in Thy Christ we live.

  1. All that we are, as saints on earth,

All that we hope to be,

When Jesus comes and glory dawns,

We owe it all to Thee.

  1. O God, how rich, how vast Thy love,

Whoe’er can Thee repay?

Thy love is past man’s finding out,

Thy grace no man can say.

  1. But Lord, to me I pray Thee grant,

More clearly may I see,

That I may e’er more fully know

How much I owe to Thee.

  1. But if man’s heart should e’er suppose

He could repay Thy love,

It only means he nothing knows

Of love, all loves above.

  1. So may we never bargains make

With that dear love of Thine:

The love that made Thine heart once break,

Whoe’er that love could win?

  1. Then nevermore suggest return,

His love is far too high;

But let our hearts with rapture burn

That He for us should die.

  1. O Father God, we owe Thee all!

All that we are and have!

With grateful thanks before Thee fall,

’Tis all that we can give.

016 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的爱)

一 父阿，久在创世之前，

你选我们，爱无限！

这爱甘美、激励、深厚，

吸引我们亲耶稣。

还要保守，还要保守

我们今后永稳固。

我们今后永稳固。

二 不变的爱，四面围住，

我们得尝它丰富；

无穷大能，护卫我们，

带来神圣的安息。

爱的父神，爱的父神，

我们今向你拜礼。

我们今向你拜礼。

三 爱的神阿，我们心感，

仍要诉说你恩典，

直到那日，座前下拜，

还要将你名称扬；

赞美、敬拜，赞美、敬拜，

永远归神和羔羊！

永远归神和羔羊！

016 8.7.8.7.8.7.

  1. Father, ’twas Thy love that knew us

Earth’s foundation long before:

That same love to Jesus drew us

By its sweet constraining pow’r,

And will keep us, and will keep us,

Safely now, and evermore,

Safely now, and evermore.

  1. Now that changeless love enfolds us,

All its wealth on us bestows;

While its pow’r unchanging holds us

In a holy calm repose.

God and Father, God and Father,

Unto Thee our worship flows,

Unto Thee our worship flows.

  1. God of love, our souls adore Thee!

We would still Thy grace proclaim,

Till we cast our crowns before Thee,

And in glory praise Thy name;

Praise and ‘worship, praise and worship

Be to God and to the Lamb!

Be to God and to the Lamb!

017 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的尊贵)

一 神阿，你是何等奇妙！

何等威严庄重！

施恩宝座纯洁明耀，

无限光明之中。

二 永远的神，何等尊贵，

诸天是你座位；

众灵你前昼夜环跪，

不停、不住赞美。

三 何等奇妙，何等美丽！

在你圣洁光中；

无边智慧，无限能力，

并你荣耀无穷。

四 永生神前，我心敬畏，

惟恐任意妄为；

战兢、盼望，向你拜跪，

并带悔改眼泪。

五 亲爱的主，我深爱你，

虽然你是主宰；

因你降卑向我索取，

我这不配的爱。

六 地上无父如此慈爱，

无母如此仁慈，

像你这样背负、忍耐：

你的污秽孩子。

七 主的慈父，因你爱赏，

使我欢天喜地，

在你座前俯伏颂扬，

我得瞻仰于你。

017 8. 6. 8. 6.

  1. My God, how wonderful Thou art,

Thy majesty how bright,

How beautiful Thy mercy seat,

In depths of burning light.

  1. How dread are Thine eternal years,

O everlasting Lord,

By prostrate spirits day and night

Incessantly adored!

  1. How wonderful, how beautiful,

The sight of Thee must be,

Thine endless wisdom, boundless power,

And awful purity!

  1. Oh, how I fear Thee, living God,

With deepest, tenderest fears,

And worship Thee with trembling hope

And penitential tears!

  1. Yet I may love Thee, too, O Lord,

Almighty as Thou art,

For Thou hast stooped to ask of me

The love of my poor heart.

  1. No earthly father loves like Thee;

No mother, e’er so mild

Bears and forbears as Thou hast done

With me, Thy sinful child.

  1. Father of Jesus, love’s reward,

What rapture will it be

Prostrate before Thy throne to lie,

And gaze, and gaze on Thee.

018 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的怜悯)

一 神的怜悯何等深广，

阔逾洋海难测量；

祂是公义却又慈良，

完全自由归我享。

二 向著罪人敞开欢迎，

并赐恩典来供应；

救主之爱无限丰盈，

祂血有医治权柄。

三 神的大爱实在高深，

非人心所能测尽；

这位永存者的慈心，

最是奇妙可亲近。

四 但愿我们单纯爱祂，

从祂话中享受祂，

我们生命就更美佳，

因祂甘甜而长大。

018 8.7.8.7.

  1. There’s a wideness in God’s mercy

Like the wideness of the sea;

There’s a kindness in His justice

Which is more than liberty.

  1. There is welcome for the sinner

And more graces for the good;

There is mercy with the Savior;

There is healing in His blood.

  1. For the love of God is broader

Than the measure of man’s mind;

And the heart of the Eternal

Is most wonderfully kind.

  1. If our love were but more simple

We should take Him at His word,

And our lives would be all sunshine

In the sweetness of our Lord.

019 赞美和敬拜——圣父(呼叫阿爸)

在我里面的灵呼叫，“阿爸，阿爸！”

哦，我里面的灵呼叫，“阿爸，阿爸！”

哦，我里面的灵呼叫，“阿爸，阿爸！

父阿，我爱你！”

019 12.12.12.5.

And the Spirit in my heart cries, “Abba, Abba.”

Oh, the Spirit in my heart cries, “Abba, Abba.”

Oh, the Spirit in my heart cries, “Abba, Abba

Father I love You.”

020 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的爱)

一 父阿，久在创世之前，

你选我们，爱无限！

这爱甘美、激励、深厚，

吸引我们亲耶稣。

还要保守，还要保守

我们今后永稳固。

我们今后永稳固。

二 虽然宇宙逐渐改迁，

但是我神总不变；

祂的爱心，同祂话语，

向著我们永坚定；

神的儿女，神的儿女，

我们应当赞祂名。

我们应当赞祂名。

三 神的怜悯是我诗歌，

我口所夸心所乐；

从始至终，惟有白恩，

能得我命感我心。

神爱我们！神爱我们！

连祂爱子都不吝！

连祂爱子都不吝！

四 爱的神阿，我们现在

同心歌颂你奇爱，

直到天上，远离尘嚣，

我们仍是要称扬；

但愿荣耀，但愿荣耀，

永远归神和羔羊。

永远归神和羔羊。

020 8. 7. 8. 7.8.7.

  1. Father, long before creation,

Thou hadst chosen us in love;

And that love, so deep, so moving,

Draws us close to Christ above,

And will keep us, and will keep us,

Firmly fixed in Christ alone,

Firmly fixed in Christ alone.

  1. Tho’ the world may change its fashion,

Yet our God is e’er the same;

His compassion and His cov’nant

Through all ages will remain.

God’s own children, God’s own children,

Must forever praise His name,

Must forever praise His name.

  1. God’s compassion is my story,

Is my boasting all the day;

Mercy free and never failing

Moves my will, directs my way.

God so loved us, God so loved

That His only Son He gave,

That His only Son He gave.

  1. Loving Father, now before Thee

We will ever praise Thy love;

And our song will sound unceasing

Till we meet Thy Son above,

Giving glory, Giving glory,

To our God and to the Lamb,

To our God and to the Lamb.

021 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的信实)

主那坚定的爱永远不止息，

祂的怜悯也绝无终极。

每早晨都是新鲜，

每早晨新鲜，你的信实不变，

哦主，你的信实不变，

哦主，你的信实不变！

021 Irregular Meter

The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases,

His mercies never come to an end.

They are new ev‘ry morning, new ev‘ry morning,

Great is Thy faithfulness, O Lord,

Great is Thy faithfulness, O Lord,

Great is Thy faithfulness.

022 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的信实)

一 父阿，在你并无转动的影儿，

你的信实极其广大无边。

你是昔在、今在、以后永在者；

你的怜悯像你永远不变。

和 你的信实广大！你的信实无边！

你的怜悯每晨都是新鲜！

我所需要，一切全由你供给，

你的信实极其广大无边！

二 冬夏、寒暑、稼穑及时的供应，

日、月、星辰昼夜所有循环，

并大自然，多方全都在见证：

你的信实极其广大无边！

三 你的赦免所给平安与欢畅，

你的同在所赐安抚、引导，

今日力量、明日光明的盼望，

全都属我，福分一无缺少。

022 11.10.11.10. with chorus

  1. “Great is Thy faithfulness,” O God my Father,

There is no shadow of turning. with Thee;

Thou changest not, Thy compassions, they fail not; As Thou hast been Thou forever wilt be.

""Great is Th y faithfulness!"" ""Great is Thy faithfulness!"" Morning by morning new mercies I see;

All I have needed Thy hand hath provided-

""Great is Thy faithfulness,"" Lord, unto me!

  1. Summer and winter, and springtime and harvest,

Sun, moon and stars in their courses above,

Join with all nature in manifold witness

To Thy great faithfulness, mercy and love.

  1. Pardon for sin and a peace that, endureth,

Thy own dear presence to cheer and to guide;

Strength for today and bright hope for tomorrow,

Blessings all mine, with ten thousand beside!

023 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的救赎)

一 神，我赞美你，

差遣你的爱子，

钉死，复活又升天，

作我大祭司。

和 阿利路亚，荣耀归你，

阿利路亚，阿们！

阿利路亚，荣耀归你，

感谢你大恩。

二 神，我赞美你，

赐下亮光之灵，

启示我的救赎主，

开明我眼睛。

三 荣耀和赞美，

归给被杀羔羊，

祂已担当我罪孽，

洗净我天良。

四 赞美再赞美，

感激你的大爱，

心被你爱再焚烧，

向你献敬拜。

023 Irregular Meter

  1. We praise Thee, O God,

For the Son of Thy love,

For our Savior who died and

Is now gone above.

Hallelujah! Thine the glory,

Hallelujah! Amen;

Hallelujah! Thine the glory,

We praise Thee again.

  1. We praise Thee, O God,

For Thy Spirit of light,

Who has shown us our Savior,

And scattered our night.

  1. All glory and praise

To the Lamb that was slain,

Who has home all our sins,

And has cleansed every stain.

  1. We praise Thee again;

We are filled with Thy love,

And each heart is rekindled

With fire from above.

024 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的救赎)

一 荣耀归于父神，祂已作大事；

祂爱世人，甚至差遣祂儿子，

来为我们舍命，成功了救赎，

打开生命恩门，人人可进入。

和 赞美神！赞美神！

全地都当称祝！

赞美神！赞美神！

众人都要欢呼！

哦，来就近父神，藉著祂儿子，

并将荣耀归祂，祂已作大事！

二 何等完全救赎，宝血将我买；

这是神的应许，信者可倚赖；

就是极大罪人，若真肯相信，

在他相信之时，必得赦罪恩。

三 神已晓谕大事，祂已作大事，

我们也要大乐，藉著祂儿子；

但当看见主时，我们的惊喜

必要更纯、更高、更大得无比。

024 11.11.11.11. with chorus

  1. To God be the glory, great things He hath done,

So loved He the world that He gave us His Son,

Who yielded His life our redemption to win,

And opened the life-gate that all may go in.

Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,

Let the earth hear His voice;

Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,

Let the people rejoice;

Oh, come to the Father, thro’ Jesus the Son,

And give Him the glory; great things He hath done.

  1. Oh, perfect redemption, the purchase of blood,

To every believer the promise of God;

The vilest offender who truly believes,

That moment from Jesus a pardon receives.

  1. Great things He hath taught us, great things He hath done,

And great our rejoicing through Jesus the Son;

But purer, and higher, and greater will be

Our wonder, our transport when Jesus we see.

025 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的救赎)

一 父神，我今敬拜你，

恭敬向你来顶礼；

藉著基督作我祭：

父阿，我敬拜你。

二 你爱浩大，何深阔，

藉著祂死临及我；

公义要求已通过：

父阿，我敬拜你。

三 原是罪人何污秽，

今成神子何尊贵！

何等丰厚的恩惠：

父阿，我敬拜你。

四 今在灵中敬拜你，

并以基督为实际；

对你，祂是馨香祭：

父阿，我敬拜你。

五 我愿向你再献上

深处感戴的颂扬；

颂扬你爱永无疆：

父阿，我敬拜你。

025 7.7.7.6.

  1. Gracious God, we worship Thee,

Rev‘rently we bow the knee;

Jesus Christ, our only plea:

Father, we adore Thee.

  1. Vast Thy love, how deep, how wide,

In the gift of Him who died;

Righteous claims all satisfied:

Father, we adore Thee.

  1. Low we bow before Thy face,

Sons of God, O wondrous place;

Great the riches of Thy grace:

Father, we adore Thee.

  1. By Thy spirit grant that we

Worshipers in truth may be;

Praise, as incense sweet to Thee:

Father, we adore Thee.

  1. Yet again our song we raise,

Note of deep adoring praise;

Now, and soon through endless days:

Father, we adore Thee.

026 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的儿子名分)

一 荣耀父神，赞美你，

我是你恩对象；

今为使你心欢喜，

前来向你颂扬：

永世标出的众子，

豫定都进荣光，

同著基督你爱子，

作你至高对象。

二 哦父，除你有谁能

如此祝福我们：

使我有分你的灵，

蒙你生命之恩？

不久我们要永远

与祂同得荣耀；

永远与祂活你前，

将祂荣形返照！

026 7.6.7.6.D.

  1. We praise Thee, glorious Father,

As objects of Thy grace,

Who for Thine own heart’s pleasure

Are now before Thy face:

Thy sons marked out for glory

Known from eternity—

With Christ Thy Well-beloved,

Object supreme to Thee.

  1. Who else but Thee, O Father,

Could in Thine only Son

So bless us with Thy Spirit,

And have us for Thine own?

Soon shall we be forever

With Christ in glory; then

We’ll shine in His blest image

Eternally, Amen!

027 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的救赎)

一 阿爸，父阿，我们现在

因主到你面前来；

你的儿女到此聚集，

愿得应许的福气。

祂的宝血已洗我们，

我们藉祂来得恩；

你灵也已指教我们

呼喊阿爸，近你身。

二 我们从前好像浪子，

离你流荡真无知；

但你的恩比罪更多，

拯救我们脱灾祸。

给我们穿救恩衣裳，

给我们坐你席上；

我们快乐，你也欢喜，

因你恩典深无比。

三 你用为父的爱亲嘴，

表明你赦浪子罪；

你宰肥犊，你使我们

永远与你不再分。

“我们理当欢喜快乐，

”我们听你如此说：

“因我儿子死而复活，

曾经失去又得著。”

四 阿爸，父阿，我称颂你，

因你慈爱真希奇！

天上天军因著我们，

也要希奇你大恩。

不久我们都要聚集，

在你座前来温习：

阿爸的爱何等丰富！

阿爸的名何宽恕！

027 8.7.8.7.D.

  1. “Abba, Father,” We approach Thee

In our Savior’s precious name.

We, Thy Children, here assembling,

Now the promised blessing claim.

From our guilt His blood has washed us,

“Tis thro’ Him our sould draw nigh,

And Thy Spirit too has taught us

“Abba, Father,” thus to cry.

  1. Once as prodigals we wandered,

In our folly, far from Thee;

But Thy grace, o’er sin abounding,

Rescued us from misery.

Clothed in garments of salvation

At Thy table is our place;

We rejoice, and Thou rejoicest,

In the riches of Thy grace.

  1. Thou the prodigal hast pardoned,

“Kissed us” with a Father’s love;

“Killed the fatted calf,” and made us

Fit Thy purpose to approve.

“It is meet,” we hear Thee saying,

“We should merry be and glad;

I have found My once-lost children,

Now they live who once were dead.”

  1. “Abba, Father,” we adore Thee,

While the hosts in heaven above

E’en in us now learn the wonders

Of Thy wisdom, grace, and love.

Soon before Thy throne assembled,

All Thy children shall proclaim

Abba’s love as shown in Jesus,

And how full is Abba’s name!

028 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的荣耀)

一 我们不会疲倦不唱这首旧诗章，

荣耀归神，阿利路亚！

我们声浪依旧，信心比前更坚强，

荣耀归神，阿利路亚！

和 神的儿女有权利，可以大喊并大唱，

因为前途更光明，我们魂乐似飞翔，

不久我们到天上，就要朝见我君王，

荣耀归神，阿利路亚！

二 我们浸沉在那救赎大爱、极乐中；

荣耀归神，阿利路亚！

我们心中乐极有如插翅上高空；

荣耀归神，阿利路亚！

三 我们要去之地乃是精金所建造；

荣耀归神，阿利路亚！

那里，我可面觐我王所有的光耀；

荣耀归神，阿利路亚！

四 那里，我们要藉新诗喊出救赎恩；

荣耀归神，阿利路亚！

那里，我们要同众圣亲近耶稣身；

荣耀归神，阿利路亚！

028 13.8.13.8. with chorus

  1. We are never never weary of the grand old song;

Glory to God, hallelujah!

We can sing it loud as ever wih our faith more strong;

Glory to God, hallelujah!

O the children of the Lord have a right to shout and sing,

For the way is growing bright, and our souls are on the

wing,

We are going by and by to the presence of the King!

Glory to God, hallelujah!

  1. We are lost amid the rapture of redeeming love:

Glory to God, hallelujah!

We are seeking every moment all its grace to prove:

Glory to God, hallelujah!

  1. We are going on to glory as the Lord has told:

Glory to God, hallelujah!

Where the King in all His beauty we shall soon behold:

Glory to God, hallelujah!

  1. There we’ll shout redeeming mercy in a glad new song;

Glory to God, hallelujah!

There we’ll sing the praise of Jesus with the

blood-washed throng,

Glory to God, hallelujah!

029 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的救赎)

一 阿爸，我们来颂赞你！

我们谦卑敬拜你！

我们现今得认识你，

真是我们的福气。

我们得著这样权柄，

是因耶稣的尊名；

你灵也和我们的灵，

证明我们有生命。

二 世界还未起首时候，

你就在基督里头，

豫定我们作你儿子，

得你生命的恩赐。

哦父，你是何等慈爱，

竟使我们蒙恩待！

叫我们这败坏罪人，

得与你性情有分！

三 我们天性在亚当里，

真是败坏无可比；

但是你的永远旨意，

豫定我们归于你；

靠著救主我们得赎，

因重生称你为父；

救主、天父、教会合一，

哦，这恩典何希奇！

四 因此，境遇虽然转迁，

虽有患难和试炼，

你的慈爱总是不变，

要领我们直到天。

不久，你所赎的儿女，

要在宝座前相聚，

述说他们得救故事，

并向你赞美不置。

029 8.7.8.7.D.

  1. Abba, Father! we adore Thee,

Humbly now our homage pay;

‘Tis Thy children’s bliss to know Thee,

None but children “Abba” say

This high honor we inherit,

Thy free gift through Jesus’ blood;

God the Spirit, with our spirit,

Witnesseth we’re sons of God.

  1. Thine own purpose gave us being,

When in Christ, in that vast plan,

Thou in Christ didst choose Thy people

E’en before the world began.

Oh, what love Thou, Father, bore us!

Oh, how precious in Thy sight!

When to Thine own Son Thou gav’st us,

To Thy Son, Thy soul’s delight.

  1. Though our nature’s fall in Adam

Shut us wholly out from God,

Thine eternal counsel brought us

Nearer still, through Jesus’ blood;

For in Him we found redemption,

Grace and glory in Thy Son;

O the height and depth of mercy!

Christ and His redeemed are one.

  1. Hence, through all the changing seasons,

Trouble, sickness, sorrow, woe,

Nothing changeth Thine affections,

Love divine shall bring us through;

Soon shall all Thy blood-bought children

Round the throne their anthems raise,

And, in songs of rich salvation,

Shout to Thine eternal praise.

030 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的儿子名分)

一 哦神，你何等乐意，

启示在我心里：

基督里一切恩典，

和你祝福无限。

祂已进到你面前，

人子高升在天，

你荣耀集祂一身，

藉祂，你旨得成。

二 哦，你大爱正四布，

从祂脸上显露！

有福之光今照明！

发自荣耀之境！

这爱和光都宣示：

父神你的所是，

并你子和你奇恩，

都成我们永分。

三 哦，你这万福之源！

一切喜乐之泉！

欢然宣告你尊名，

众圣同心共庆！

从心底涌出美辞，

众口颂扬不止，

齐声呼应：“ 神是爱！”

向你俯伏敬拜。

030 7.6.7.6.D.

  1. O gracious God, Thy pleasure

Is in Thy Christ made known,

And tells the boundless measure

Of blessing for Thine own.

He has Thy presence entered,

As Man in heav’n is known;

In Him Thy glory’s centered,

In Him Thy purpose shown.

  1. And O what love is beaming

Refulgent in that face!

What blessed light is streaming

From that most glorious place!

Both love and light proclaiming

What Thou, the Father, art,

And wondrous grace revealing,

With Thine own Son, our part.

  1. Thou source of every blessing!

Thou spring of all delight!

Thy name with joy confessing

Let all the saints unite!

Each heart its praise outpouring

To Thee all praise above,

Each voice in strains adoring

Re-echoes—”God is love.”

031 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的救赎)

一 哦神，是你召我们

来看你的儿子，

祂是你心的奇珍，

祂行完你意思；

我们因你肯白舍

你的独一心爱，

才知你心是真切

要救我们脱害。

二 哦，圣父，怜悯的神，

我们因子的名，

才敢向你常求恩，

才有永远生命。

你耳所常爱听闻—

悠扬如音乐的，

已叫我们的灵魂，

脱尽所有猜疑。

三 战兢罪人心常怕

你永不忘先前，

但祂一次的受罚，

使你不再记念。

当无甚么可以使

我们得自由时，

父，你爱子的受死，

还了我们罪值。

四 你对我们(信祂的)

心中已无忿怒；

我们现今也无忌，

因知你已眷顾；

回家儿女你亲嘴，

并赐光明衣袍，

你的慈爱已安慰

我们心中苦恼。

031 7.6.7.6.D.

  1. By Thee, O God, invited,

We look unto the Son,

In whom Thy heart delighted,

Who all Thy will hath done;

And by the one chief treasure

Thy bosom freely gave,

Thine own pure love we measure,

Thy willing mind to save.

  1. O God of mercy—Father!

The one unchanging claim,

The brightest hopes, we gather

From Christ’s most precious name:

What always sounds so sweetly

In Thine unwearied ear,

Has freed our souls completely

From all our guilt and fear.

  1. The trembling sinner feareth

That God can ne’er forget;

But one full payment cleareth

His memory of all debt.

When nought beside could free us,

Or set our souls at large,

The death of God’s Beloved

Secured a full discharge.

  1. No wrath God’s heart retaineth

To usward who believe;

No dread in ours remaineth

As we His love receive;

Returning sons He kisses,

And with His robe invests;

His perfect love dismisses

All terror from our breasts.

032 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的儿子名分)

一 父阿，儿女称颂你名，

是受恩典教训；

我们欢乐，因你生命

使我们归羊群。

二 你所给的得救证实，

远超我们赞美；

我们的心现在直指

你在天上座位。

三 因在那里，祂为我们

预备永远居所，

你将生命分给罪人，

祂为罪人解脱。

四 永世虽久，不过就是：

显明你恩丰富，

好叫那些因你儿子

为儿女者，称祝。

五 我们现虽未见早晨，

却安心历世途，

等候祂来提接我们，

脱离死亡、坟墓。

六 我们欢乐，因你自己

就是我们“永分”

像你儿子！同祂一起！

享受光明早晨！

七 哦，求圣父因祂慈名，

保守我们在地，

无忧、无虑，随祂而行，

直到同乐那里。

032 8.6.8.6.

  1. Father, Thy name our souls would bless,

As children taught by grace,

Lift up our hearts in righteousness,

And joy before Thy face.

  1. Sweet is the confidence Thou giv’st,

Though high above our praise;

Our hearts resort to where Thou liv’st

In heaven’s unclouded rays.

  1. There in the purpose of Thy love,

Our place is now prepared;

As sons with Him who is above,

In bright etemity.

  1. Eternal ages shall declare,

The riches of Thy grace,

To those who with Thy Son shall share

A son’s eternal place.

  1. Absent as yet, we rest in hope,

Treading the desert path,

Waiting for Him who takes us up

Beyond the pow’r of death.

  1. We joy in Thee, Thy fullness shall

Our endless portion be,

Like Thine own Son, with whom we’ll dwell

Who all our sorrows shared.

  1. O Holy Father, keep us here

In that blest name of love,

Walking before Thee without fear,

Thy perfect will to prove.

033 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的伟大)

一 快乐，快乐，我们敬拜

荣耀之神、爱之主；

到主面前，心如花开；

主如旭日，光耀目。

愁云罪雾，求主消去；

疑惑黑荫求散开；

永远快乐，求主赐予，

旭日光辉满我怀！

二 主的造物全都欢乐，

天地反映主光辉，

群星、天使，围绕讴歌，

不断向祂献赞美。

高山、幽谷、森林、平原，

草场青翠、波平静，

清歌小鸟，轻注流泉，

感动我心乐无尽。

三 主既施恩，又施赦免，

永远赐福，我敬爱；

生活喜乐，活水泉源，

欢乐、安息似深海！

神是我父，基督我兄，

凡活爱里皆主民；

指教我们爱里交通，

同享神圣的欢欣。

四 晨星引发颂主歌声，

凡有气息都唱和；

父的慈爱掌管众圣，

爱心把我们联合。

我们前进，歌唱不停，

争战中的得胜者；

喜乐颂领我们前行，

高唱生命的凯歌。

033 8.7.8.7.D.

  1. Joyful, joyful, we adore Thee,

God of glory, Lord of love;

Hearts unfold like flow’rs before Thee,

Opening to the sun above.

Melt the clouds of sin and sadness;

Drive the dark of doubt away;

Giver of immortal gladness,

Fill us with the light of day!

  1. All Thy works with joy surround Thee,

Earth and heav’n reflect Thy rays,

Stars and angels sing around Thee,

Center of unbroken praise.

Field and forest, vale and mountain,

Flowery meadow, flashing sea,

Chanting bird and flowing fountain

Call us to rejoice in Thee.

  1. Thou art giving and forgiving,

Ever blessing, ever blest,

Wellspring of the joy of living,

Ocean depth of happy rest!

Thou our Father, Christ our Brother—

All who live in love are Thine;

Teach us how to love each other,

Lift us to the joy divine.

  1. Mortals join the mighty chorus

Which the morning stars began;

Father love is reigning o’er us,

Brother love binds man to man.

Ever singing, march we onward,

Victors in the midst of strife;

Joyful music leads us sunward

In the triumph song of life.

034 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的儿子名分)

一 父神，我们称颂你，

你前我们欢喜，

永远脱开了死亡，

与你儿子一起。

祂是一“人”活你前，

在那清明光中，

在你无限的爱里，

永远蒙你恩宠。

二 祂父就是我们父，

祂神就是我神；

祂是你爱的儿子，

你心所喜所珍。

祂是乐意带我们，

分享祂的地位，

来识你爱和你恩，

并你脸上光辉。

三 你爱已将我拥抱，

这爱永不消沉；

这爱全都集中在

你的爱子一身。

在祂里面，你众子

(祂的许多弟兄，)

与祂同享你这爱，

同受你的恩宠。

034 7.6.7.6.D.

  1. We bless thee, God and Father,

We joy before Thy face;

Beyond dark death forever,

We share Thy Son’s blest place.

He lives a Man before Thee,

In cloudless light above,

In Thine unbounded favor,

Thine everlasting love.

  1. His Father and our Father,

His God and ours Thou art;

And He is Thy Beloved,

The gladness of Thy heart.

We’re His, in joy He brings us

To share His part and place,

To know Thy love and favor,

The shining of Thy face.

  1. Thy love that now enfolds us

Can ne’er wax cold or dim;

In Him that love doth center,

And we are loved in Him.

In Him Thy love and glory

Find their eternal rest;

The many sons—His brethren—

In Him, how near, how blest!

035 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的儿子名分)

一 慈爱父神，对于你的大爱，

众子响应；

我们今能自由坦然前来，

是靠子名。

何等希奇，我们都能像祂，

作你喜悦，永远与祂无差。

二 你喜悦祂，我们挂祂身上，

藉著你恩；

祂是你爱所有独一对象，

我竟有分。

我们同祂享受你爱无限，

祂的荣耀，你前我们得见。

三 正当众子你前口唱﹑心和，

同声颂扬；

祂在率领，心中何等喜乐，

向你歌唱。

父神，在那爱的经营之中，

你是最高源头，配得称颂。

035 10.4.10.4.10.10.

  1. Our God and Father, we respond to Thee

As sons brought near,

Suited, in love and holy liberty,

To this blest sphere.

O wondrous thought, that many there should be

Like Christ, for Thy delight eternally!

  1. He, Thy delight, in whom we have our part,

Through grace to share

Thy love for Him, the object of Thy heart

Beyond compare.

His glory in Thy presence now we see,

As with Him there in love’s complacency.

  1. ’Tis here He sings—what joy His heart doth find,

Thyself to praise,

While many sons are stirred in heart and mind

One voice to raise

In worship, God and Father, unto Thee,

Supreme, Thou Source in love’s economy!

036 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的儿子名分)

一 宴筵方过，我们尚感甜美，

父，你爱子率领我们赞美；

祂领诗歌，于你何亲、何甜，

我们与祂一致，和声颂赞。

二 哦父，你外我们不需别惠，

有何比你恩爱更为宝贵！

我们敬拜，因为我们尝到

你那无穷生命丰美味道。

三 在你爱中我爱对你增长，

超越所有人情、属地捆绑；

你爱藉著大能，带领我心

享受你的同在与日俱深。

四 父阿，我们跟随你的爱子，

在此向你赞美颂扬不止；

饱享你的圣爱，心满意足，

众子尝到你名所有丰富。

036 10.10.10.10.

  1. Father, Thy Son beloved leads our praise

After the banquet feast is had and done;

How dear, how sweet to Thee the praise He leads,

And in His praises joining we are one.

  1. Father, we need no goodness more than Thee,

Nor do we seek a love that’s less than Thine;

How we adore Thee now that here we know

Thy searchless, uncreated life divine.

  1. Father, within Thy love our love to Thee

Grows, far transcending all our earthly ties;

Thine own dear love in power leads our hearts

Where Thine own presence deeply satisfies.

  1. Father, by joining with Thy Son beloved,

We all with gladness praise Thee now again;

Joyfully feasting on Thy holy love,

Tasting, as sons, the sweetness of Thy name.

037 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的儿子名分)

一 靠著我们救主流血作祭，

父阿，我们前来一同就你；

距离已去，藉恩已得自由，

前来敬拜向你赞美、歌讴。

二 哦父，我们愿在你前献上

你的爱子之名所有馨香；

藉著祂死为我所得恩赏，

在此凭信我们将祂瞻仰。

三 你的喜乐我今与祂同享，

在祂里面我心因你欢畅；

万人之上，祂比美者更美，

祂的荣耀永不衰落败褪。

四 在你座前我们俯伏仰望，

凭信看见你爱所有对象；

祂今在此率领许多弟兄—

你的众子，同声向你歌颂。

037 10.10.10.10.

  1. O God our Father, we would come to Thee

In virtue of our Savior’s precious blood;

All distance gone, our souls by grace set free,

We worship Thee, our Father and our God.

  1. We would, O God, present before Thy face

The fragrant name of Thy beloved Son;

By faith we view Him through Thy boundless grace,

Which, by His dying, He for us has won.

  1. Thy joy in Him who is with Thee we share;

Our hearts delight in Thy delight in Him;

Chiefest of thousands, fairer than the fair;

His glory nought can tarnish, nought can dim.

  1. We bow in worship now before Thy throne,

By faith the Object of Thy love would see;

Who, in the midst, His brethren’s song doth lead.

To Him, our Savior, shall the glory be!

038 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的儿子名分)

一 我父、我神，你爱在子显明，

对此我们再来你前响应。

祂行你旨，满足你的心意；

忍受十架，使我得你欢喜。

二 祂今率领许多弟兄歌唱，

我们和声，从心响应颂扬。

当祂在此引声向你赞美，

我们灵里共鸣，欢然跟随。

三 在你爱子里面蒙了拣选，

今得有分你前欢呼、颂赞；

创世之前己经蒙你豫定，

要我有分于你儿子生命。

四 蒙爱众子，全由你灵更新，

有你爱子作那无穷之分；

每个都有祂的一分特点，

供你喜悦欣赏，直到永远。

038 10.10.10.10.

  1. Our God and Father we respond anew

To love in Christ revealed, and praise Thy name.

He did Thy will; and for the joy in view,

Endured the cross, despising all the shame.

  1. He, midst His brethren, strikes the note of praise;

We hear His song, our hearts responsive swell;

And on this day when He His voice doth raise,

In spirit we do join and praise Thee well.

  1. Chosen in Him, Thy well-beloved Son,

We have our part in joy before Thy face;

Predestined, ere this world had yet begun,

For that blest world, where all bespeaks Thy grace.

  1. Sons loved and loving, whom Thy spirit fills,

Our endless portion Christ in us to be;

Each with some trait of Him whose love us thrills,

For Thy delight and joy eternally.

039 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的儿子名分)

一 父阿，我们在你面前拜礼，

尊敬郑重；

现在我们这些儿女聚集，

是要称颂：

奇恩如何带领我们回家，

与你儿子一同亲近阿爸！

二 知爱的人都知这里的爱，

何等的深；

从祂身上你爱已经布开，

我父我神！

现今祂在你的面前带同

所有称颂你爱的人称颂。

三 祂领诗歌，你耳何等乐听

祂的颂称；

你心岂不也是一样爱聆

我们和声；

你心爱祂远在时间起首，

你也定规我们与祂同俦。

039 10.4.10.4.10.10.

  1. Father, to Thee a joyful song we raise

With all Thine own;

And in Thy presence sound a note of praise

To Thee alone;

Bro’t nigh, bro’t home to Thee—O wondrous grace,

That gives us now with Thine own Son our place.

  1. How deep the holy joy that fills that scene,

Where love is known!

Thy love, our God and Father, now is seen,

In Him alone;

As, in the holy calm of Thine own rest,

He leads the praise of those Thy love has blessed.

  1. He leads the praise! How precious to Thine ear

The song He sings!

How precious, too, to Thee—how near, how dear

Are those He brings

To share His place: ’twas thus that Thou didst plan;

Thou lovedst Him before the world began.

040 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的伟大)

一 仰看穹苍，浩瀚无垠，

蔚蓝、深邃，没有止境；

其中千万星光闪烁，

共同宣告神的创作。

不息太阳日日奔驰，

将主创造大能显示，

普照天下一切受造，

说明全能手段奇妙。

二 夕阳西下，夜色来袭，

明月温柔静照大地；

长夜漫漫，一再自述：

当初主怎将它造出。

四围星辰发光如炽，

一一述说自己故事，

一面运行，一面传扬，

信息传遍地极、四方。

三 虽然星辰奔驰夜空，

庄严静默，来复运行；

紧依轨道发出光明，

无言无语，无声可听；

但在智者耳中常闻

它们发出荣耀声音，

一面照耀﹐一面颂称：

“ 造我的手何其神圣！”

040 8.8.8.8.D.

  1. The spacious firmament on high,

With all the blue ethereal sky,

And spangled heav’ns, a shining frame,

Their great Original proclaim.

Th’unwearied sun, from day to day,

Does his Creator’s pow’r display;

And publishes to every land

The work of an almighty hand.

  1. Soon as the evening shades prevail,

The moon takes up the wondrous tale;

And nightly to the listening earth

Repeats the story of her birth;

While all the stars that round her burn,

And all the planets in their turn,

Confirm the tidings as they roll,

And spread the truth from pole to pole.

  1. What though in solemn silence all

Move round the dark terrestrial ball?

What though no real voice nor sound

Amid the radiant orbs be found?

In reason’s ear they all rejoice,

And utter forth a glorious voice,

Forever singing as they shine,

“The hand that made us is divine.”

041 赞美和敬拜——圣父(祂的荣耀)

一 不能朽，不能见，独一至尊神，

隐藏在光辉中，肉眼不可寻；

最可颂，最荣耀，亘古永长存，

又全能，又全胜，颂赞神圣名。

二 你运作不停止，如光无声息，

无缺乏，无耗损，掌管以能力；

你公义不动摇，如高山屹立，

你施恩，又施爱，永作我遮蔽。

三 赐生命与气息予大小生灵，

你活在万有中，乃是真生命；

我们有如花草，今朝虽茂盛，

明朝到，即枯残，惟你不变更。

四 荣耀之父四射纯洁的光辉，

宝座前，众天使都俯首侍立；

我们向你赞美，使我们领会，

荣光中，你圣容，无其他遮蔽。

五 不能朽，不能见，独一至尊神，

隐藏在光辉中，肉眼不可寻；

最可颂，最荣耀，亘古永长存，

又全能，又全胜，颂赞神圣名。

041 11.11.11.11.

  1. Immortal, invisible, God only wise,

In light in accessible hid from our eyes,

Most blessed, most glorious, the Ancient of Days,

Almighty, victorious, Thy great name we praise.

  1. Unresting, unhasting, and silent as light,

Nor wanting, nor wasting, Thou rulest in might;

Thy justice like mountains high soaring above,

Thy clouds which are fountains of goodness and love.

  1. To all life Thou givest, to both great and small;

In all life Thou livest, the true life of all;

We blossom and flourish as leaves on the tree,

And wither and perish, but nought changeth Thee.

  1. Great Father of Glory, pure Father of Light,

Thine angels adore Thee, all veiling their sight;

All laud we would render, O help us to see:

’Tis only the splendor of light hideth Thee.

  1. Immortal, invisible, God only wise,

In light inaccessible hid from our eyes,

Most blessed, most glorious, the Ancient of Days,

Almighty, victorious, Thy great name we praise.

042 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的神性)

一 你乃是那永活的道，

父的独生儿子，

在你，神被听闻、看到，

天上蒙爱之子。

和 神的羔羊，惟你是配，

万众屈膝，万口赞美！

二 在你，父的荣耀照射，

完全显露无遗，

你有丰满神性、美德，

永远神圣至极！

三 你是“无限者”的真像，

神性丰盛蓄藏；

你是“非受造者”荣光，

神心从你显彰。

四 你名所含极大奥秘，

造物岂能知晓，

父神独一、荣耀心意，

惟子全部知道！

五 你是万有中心意义，

如日之于此世；

永世颂赞只此一题：

天上蒙爱之子。

042 8.6.8.6. with chorus

  1. Thou art the everlasting Word,

The Father’s only Son,

God manifestly seen and heard,

And heav’n’s beloved One.

Worthy, O Lamb of God, art Thou,

That ev’ry knee to Thee should bow!

  1. In Thee, most perfectly expressed,

The Father’s glories shine,

Of the full Deity possessed,

Eternally Divine!

  1. True image of the Infinite,

Whose essence is concealed;

Brightness of uncreated light,

The heart of God revealed.

  1. But the high myst’ries of His name

The creature’s grasp transcend;

The Father only [glorious claim]!

The Son can comprehend.

  1. Thro’out the universe of bliss,

The center Thou, and Sun,

Th’ eternal theme of praise is this,

To heav’n’s beloved One.

043 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的人性)

一 当基督寄居在地时的生活，

如诗篇十六篇所记的情形：

祂的态度、选择、喜好，

都述说住在神帐幕内之人的光景。

二 “神阿，保佑我，因为我投靠你；”

——祂以神为避难所，凡事倚赖。

“你是我的主，”祂不断向神提：

“神阿，我的好处不在你以外。”

三 “论到世上的圣民，又美又善；”

——祂说他们是祂所最喜悦的；

四福音书都证实这个恩言，

祂甚至为他们舍弃了自己。

四 “神是我的产业，我杯中的分；”

——无论何事，祂都以父为信托。

“我必要称颂那指教我的神。”

——祂否认自己，单靠神话而活。

五 祂因此灵里快乐、心里欢喜，

甚至在死里仍扬声赞美神；

神必不使祂魂在阴间被弃，

祂的身体要复活不见朽损。

六 神使祂复起，以荣耀为冠冕；

在神面前寻到满足的喜乐。

祂今已高升坐在神的右边，

从那里涌流出永远的福乐。

043 11.11.11.11.

  1. The living of Christ when He sojourned on earth,

The sixteenth Psalm shows us, was wholly of worth.

His attitudes, choices, and interests all tell

The man who in God’s tabernacle may dwell.

  1. “Preserve me, O God, for in Thee I confide”—

In God He took refuge whate’er did betide.

“O Thou art my Lord, I’ve no good beyond Thee”

He spoke in Himself unto God constantly.

  1. “As for all the saints who are dwelling on earth,”

To Him they’re the people of excellent worth.

Of them He has said He has all His delight—

In proving this all the four Gospels unite.

  1. “The Lord is my portion, the Lord is my cup”—

For everything He to the Father looked up.

“The Lord I will bless who my counsel doth give”

Himself He denied and by God’s word did live.

  1. His heart thus was glad and His spirit rejoiced,

And e’en in His death praise to God could be voiced;

His soul God would never abandon to hell,

But in resurrection His body would dwell.

  1. God raised Him, and He with God’s glory was crowned;

Then fullness of joy in God’s presence He found.

E’en now at the Father’s right hand is His seat,

Where flowing forever are pleasures complete.

044 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的人性)

一 哦，何感人的故事：

神的“尊严”、恩典，

带著荣光的启示，

深刻耶稣面间！

当我注目来观瞻

神这光明形像，

我心欢欣又感叹，

满了崇敬、欣赏！

二 你有完全的人性，

神性在你也显；

神的爱与人的情，

神性、人性俱全；

生、死、复活与升天，

显明是神而人，

在地卑微人出现，

在天万有之神。

三 荣耀无玷的光辉！

永远放光的脸！

丰富难测的作为，

藉恩将我改变！

不久与你全相像，

眼睛被爱点亮，

在你人子的身上，

见神敞开面光。

044 7.6.7.6.D.

  1. O soul inspiring story—

God’s majesty and grace

In lustrous strokes of glory

Deep-carved in Jesus’ face!

Hearts rapt in contemplation

Of Godhead’s Image bright,

Break forth in adoration,

In wonder and delight!

  1. There Manhood, all perfection,

And Godhead-fullness shine;

God’s love and Man’s affection,

The human, the divine;

A life, a death, transcendent,

Revealing God as love:

Here, lowly Man, dependent

God over all, above!

  1. Unsullied blaze of glory!

O ever-radiant Face!

Thy rich, unfathomed story

Transfigures us in grace!

Made like Thee, soon, completely,

With love-lit eyes we’ll scan

God’s face unveiled so sweetly

In Thine, Thou Son of man!

045 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 主对呼求祂名的人何等的相近！

每次呼求，祂的同在就刚强更新！

寻找耶稣，就必寻见；求祂，就相近；

我们心得安慰，因为祂可爱可亲！

和 耶稣，何等的名！

哦，主耶稣，赐生命名！

得胜的名，荣耀的名，

超越的名——何等的名！

耶稣，刚强的名！

哦，主耶稣，安慰的名！

名可常吸入，可随处呼出；

哦，主耶稣，何等的名！

二 只要呼求耶稣的名，你就必得救。

哦，主耶稣，阿利路亚，从此不被囚！

我们举起救恩之杯，呼求祂的名，

祂便拯救我们脱离诸般的困境！

三 犹太人或希利尼人，并没有差异，

主对呼求祂名的人都是丰厚的。

哦，主耶稣，呼求你名，活著有意义！

每当把你的名吸入，喜乐就满溢！

四 我们经常欣然享受施恩的救主，

无论祸福，无论乐苦，都呼求如故！

只要我们一息尚存，就必呼求主，

因祂乐意侧耳倾听，恩典常倾注！

五 我们如此乐而不疲呼求主的名，

对主赞美感激之情便油然而生。

我们乃是那些随处呼求主的人，

与那清心爱主的人同呼求蒙恩。

045 13.13.13.14. with chorus

  1. O how nigh the Lord is unto all who call on Him!

When we call, His very presence strengthens us within.

Seeking Jesus, He is found, and calling, He is near—

O what a comfort to our hearts to call His name so dear!

Jesus! O what a name!

O Lord Jesus! Life-giving name!

Name victorious, name all-glorious,

Name exalted—O what a name!

Jesus! Strengthening name!

O Lord Jesus! Comforting name!

Name to breathe in prayer, calling everywhere,

“O Lord Jesus!” O what a name!

  1. Call upon the name of Jesus, and you will be saved,

O Lord Jesus, hallelujah, nevermore enslaved!

We may take salvation’s cup by calling on the Lord;

Salvation from a host of things does His dear name

afford.

  1. To the Lord, the Jew, the Greek and everyone’s the same;

He is rich unto all men that call upon His name.

O Lord Jesus, what a joy to call and really live;

When breathing in Thy name, what pleasure Thou to us

dost give.

  1. In the God of our salvation we may take delight,

Calling on His name at all times, though in bliss or blight.

I will call upon His name as long as I shall live,

Because He has inclined His ear, and grace so full does

give.

  1. We will call upon the Lord, who’s worthy of our praise;

Thus our grateful hearts in worship we to Him may raise.

We are those who call upon His name in every place

With all the saints who from a pure heart call and taste

His grace.

046 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 因耶稣的圣名，

人人当俯伏；

祂是荣耀的王，

万口当称祝；

祂是父的喜悦，

我们称祂主；

又是太初之道，

藉祂造万物。

二 当祂出声命令，

万物就出现：

天上天使、天军，

光中显荣颜；

按著属天规律，

分层掌其权；

星辰各依轨道，

序列不紊乱。

三 降卑来到世上，

取了人的名；

历尽地上风霜，

为罪人称颂；

忠贞走祂路程，

无亏到路终；

冲过死亡疆域，

得胜归天庭。

四 带著人性光辉，

这名得荣耀；

远超一切受造，

升祂为至高；

登上神的宝座，

投入父怀抱；

披上无比荣耀，

安息因“成了”。

五 弟兄们，赞祂名，

以你全部爱！

心存恐惧战兢，

向祂献敬拜；

祂是救主基督，

与神永同在；

配得我们敬拜、

信靠并爱戴！

六 让祂在你心中，

登荣耀宝座；

一切不圣、不真，

因祂得解脱；

在这试探时刻，

让祂来领率；

以祂亮光、能力，

作你避难所。

七 耶稣还要再临，

荣耀的盼望！

伴著天上众军，

并父的荣光；

戴上荣耀冠冕，

显出祂是王；

我心今当尊祂，

是那荣耀王！

046 6.5.6.5.D.

  1. In the Name of Jesus

Ev’ry knee shall bow,

Ev’ry tongue confess Him

King of glory now;

‘Tis the Father’s pleasure

We should call Him Lord,

Who from the beginning

Was the Mighty Word.

  1. At His voice creation

Sprang at once to sight:

All the angel faces,

All the hosts of light,

Thrones and dominations,

Stars upon their way,

All the heav’nly orders,

In their great array.

  1. Humbled for a season,

To receive a Name

From the lips of sinners

Unto whom He came,

Faithfully He bore it

Spotless to the last,

Brought it back victorious,

When from death He passed.

  1. Bore it up triumphant,

With its human light,

Through all ranks of creatures,

To the central height;

To the throne of Godhead,

To the Father’s breast,

Filled it with the glory

Of that perfect rest.

  1. Name Him, brothers, name Him,

With love strong as death,

But with awe and wonder,

And with bated breath;

He is God the Savior,

He is Christ the Lord,

Ever to be worshiped,

Trusted, and adored.

  1. In your hearts enthrone Him;

There let Him subdue

All that is not holy,

All that is not true;

Crown Him as your Captain

In temptation’s hour;

Let His will enfold you

In its light and power.

  1. Brothers, this Lord Jesus

Shall return again,

With His Father’s glory,

With His angel train;

For all wreaths of empire

Meet upon His brow,

And our hearts confess Him

King of glory now.

047 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 高举主名！那荣耀名！

天地宣告祂的大能；

祂已得胜，祂要再临，

全地都要称颂祂名。

二 高举主名！祂是高台，

每逢试炼，免我受害，

安全荫蔽，自由满意，

因耶稣名就是胜利。

三 高举主名！直到那日，

万口都要认祂为主，

忧愁、叹息、罪恶、死亡，

不再存留，因主是王。

四 高举主名！耶稣是主，

所有君王都要归服；

高举主名！超越之名！

我们宝爱祂这尊名。

五 高举主名！耶稣是主，

万民屈膝向祂降服；

十架果效终于看见，

因祂是主、是王无间。

047 8.8.8.8.

  1. Lift that Name high! That glorious Name,

Let heav’n and earth its pow’r proclaim;

Our mighty, conqu’ring, coming King,

Earth yet shall with His praises ring.

  1. Lift that Name high! To that high tower

We flee in every trial hour,

Safe, sheltered, satisfied and free,

For Jesus’ Name is victory.

  1. Lift that Name high! Until one day

His mighty Name the earth shall sway,

And sin and death, distress and pain

Shall be no more, for Christ shall reign.

  1. Lift that Name high! Jesus shall reign,

And kings shall follow in His train;

Lift that Name high, all names above,

The Name of Him we own and love.

  1. Lift that Name high! For every knee

Shall bow to Him; Jesus shall see

Fruit of His Cross, when earth shall bring

Her tribute to her Lord and King.

048 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 你名如同倒出香膏，

耶稣，耶稣，耶稣，

你名如同倒出香膏，

你名如同倒出香膏。

二 所以众童女都爱你，

耶稣，耶稣，耶稣，

所以众童女都爱你，

所以众童女都爱你。

三 你的爱情比酒更美，

耶稣，耶稣，耶稣，

你的爱情比酒更美，

你的爱情比酒更美。

四 吸引我们快跑跟随，

耶稣，耶稣，耶稣，

吸引我们快跑跟随，

吸引我们快跑跟随。

五 我的良人，你甚可爱，

耶稣，耶稣，耶稣，

我的良人，你甚可爱，

我的良人，你甚可爱。

六 我已寻见我心所慕，

耶稣，耶稣，耶稣，

我已寻见我心所慕，

我已寻见我心所慕。

七 我拉住祂，不容祂走，

耶稣，耶稣，耶稣，

我拉住祂，不容祂走，

我拉住祂，不容祂走。

八 我的良人，愿你快来，

耶稣，耶稣，耶稣，

我的良人，愿你快来，

我的良人，愿你快来。

九 主阿！我们全心爱你，

耶稣，耶稣，耶稣，

主阿！我们全心爱你，

主阿！我们全心爱你。

048 8.8.8.8.

  1. Thy name is as ointment poured forth:

Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Jesus,

Thy name is as ointment poured forth,

Thy name is as ointment poured forth.

  1. Therefore do the virgins love Thee:

Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Jesus!

Therefore do the virgins love Thee,

Therefore do the virgins love Thee.

  1. Thy love is much better than wine:

Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Jesus!

Thy love is much better than wine,

Thy love is much better than wine.

  1. Draw me, we will run after Thee:

Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Jesus!

Draw me, we will run after Thee,

Draw me, we will run after Thee.

  1. Behold, Thou art fair, my Beloved:

Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Jesus!

Behold, Thou art fair, my Beloved,

Behold, Thou art fair, my Beloved.

  1. I found Him whom my soul doth love:

Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Jesus!

I found Him whom my soul doth love,

I found Him whom my soul doth love.

  1. I held Him and would not let go:

Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Jesus!

I held Him and would not let go,

I held Him and would not let go.

  1. Make haste, my Beloved, to come:

Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Jesus!

Make haste, my Beloved, to come,

Make haste, my Beloved, to come.

  1. We love Thee with all of our heart:

Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Jesus!

We love Thee with all of our heart,

We love Thee with all of our heart.

049 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 耶稣这名何其甘甜，

犹如音乐我爱称赞，

它使我乐丰满完全，

耶稣宝贵之名。

和 耶稣！这名何甘甜，

耶稣！天天不改变；

耶稣！圣徒当称赞

它的价值到永远。

二 我爱那爱我者之名，

祂知我苦，分担、同情，

吩咐忧惧从我隐形，

我爱耶稣之名。

三 这名迷人，我爱听见，

一听我心不禁狂欢，

其乐将我眼泪擦干，

高举耶稣之名。

四 无人话语能以尽言

我爱之名何其甘甜，

愿人将它永远称赞，

称赞耶稣之名。

049 8.8.8.7. with chorus

  1. The name of Jesus is so sweet,

I love its music to repeat;

It makes my joys full and complete,

The precious name of Jesus.

Jesus! Oh, how sweet the name,

Jesus! Ev’ry day the same;

Jesus! Let all saints proclaim

Its worthy praise forever.

  1. I love the name of Him whose heart

Knows all my griefs and bears a part;

Who bids all anxious fears depart,

I love the name of Jesus.

  1. That name I fondly love to hear,

It never fails my heart to cheer,

Its music dries the failing tear;

Exalt the name of Jesus.

  1. No word of man can ever tell

How sweet the name I love so well,

Oh, let its praises ever swell,

Oh, praise the name of Jesus.

050 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 主耶稣，我爱你名！

谦卑俯伏在你前；

荣耀、权柄、颂赞、尊敬，

我活时必向你献；

向你高歌歌声沛，

心口同声来歌唱，

我魂感佩，因你是配，

你的美丽真非常！

二 主耶稣，我爱你名！

未有天地未有时，

神爱无际，就已显明，

要施恩典救亡世；

这爱真是永远爱！

堕落如我也眷顾！

爱叫你来，为我负债，

使我成为你珍物。

三 主耶稣，我爱你名！

你的降生何寒微！

你的德馨满有恩情，

你的道路孤且卑；

我的痛苦你替背，

我的荆冕你替戴，

我的祸杯你替尝备，

常经忧患是为爱。

四 主耶稣，我爱你名！

“神的羔羊”何清洁！

你被豫定为我受刑，

流出宝血洗罪孽；

现在你坐高天上，

尊贵、荣耀为冠冕；

你打胜仗，我得释放，

阿利路亚主名甜！

050 7.7.8.7.D.

  1. Thy name we love, Lord Jesus,

And lowly bow before Thee;

And while we live, to Thee we give

All blessing, worship, glory.

We sing aloud Thy praises, :

Our hearts and voices blending,

‘Tis Thou alone we worthy own,

Thy beauty’s all-transcending.

  1. Thy name we love, Lord Jesus:

It tells God’s love unbounded

To ruined man, ere time began,

Or heav’n and earth were founded:

Thine is a love eternal,

That found in us its pleasure,

That brought Thee low to bear our woe

And make us Thine own treasure.

  1. Thy name we love, Lord Jesus;

It tells Thy birth so lowly,

Thy patience, grace, and gentleness.

Thy lonely path, so holy;

Thou wast the “Man of Sorrows”

Our grief, too, Thou didst bear it;

Our bitter cup Thou drankest up;

The thorny crown, didst wear it.

  1. Thy name we love, Lord Jesus;

God’s Lamb—Thou wast ordained,

To bear our sins (Thyself all clean)

And hast our guilt sustained.

We see Thee crowned in glory,

Above the heavens now seated,

The vict’ry won, Thy work well done,

Our righteousness completed.

051 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 被杀羔羊，耶稣基督，

已经被神高举；

罪人朋友，荣耀救主，

配得永远称许。

和 颂赞主圣名，颂赞主圣名，

颂赞、荣耀，归主圣名；

颂赞主圣名，颂赞主圣名，

颂赞、荣耀，归主圣名。

二 超乎万名之上的名，

已经赐给耶稣；

在神右边，大工已成，

天使敬拜俯伏。

三 蒙恩罪人也要欢呼，

和声颂赞救主：

为我流血，将我救赎，

使我永远得福。

四 祂名称为和平的王，

全能、奇妙、策士，

祂是全地的得胜王，

掌权直到永世。

051 8.6.8.6. with chorus

  1. All praise to Him who reigns on high,

In majesty supreme,

Who gave His life for man to die,

That He might man redeem.

Blessed be the name, Blessed be the name,

Blessed be the name of the Lord;

Blessed be the name, Blessed be the name,

Blessed be the name of the Lord.

  1. His name above all names shall stand,

Exalted more and more,

At God the Father’s own right hand,

Where angel hosts adore.

  1. Redeemer, Savior, Friend of man

Once ruined by the fall,

Thou hast devised salvation’s plan,

For Thou hast died for all.

  1. His name shall be the counsellor,

The mighty Prince of Peace,

Of all earth’s Kingdoms, conqueror,

Whose reign shall never cease.

052 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

祂名高过其他一切的名，

祂名是耶稣，祂名是主。

祂的名是奇妙，祂的名是策士，

又是和平的君，全能的神。

祂名高过其他一切的名，

祂名是耶稣，祂名是主。

052 Irregular Meter

His name is higher than any other,

His name is Jesus, His name is Lord.

His name is Wonderful,—His name is Counsellor,

His name is Prince of Peace, the mighty God.

His name is higher than any other—

His name is Jesus, His name is Lord.

053 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 汇集一切权能、

智慧、爱的尊名，

世人所未曾识，

天使也未曾知，

无法说出祂的价值，

更难表明救主所是。

二 我神的大先知，

口颂你名不置；

神的救恩佳音，

藉你传入我心；

罪得赦免，大喜信息，

与神和好，我心安息。

三 耶稣是大祭司，

献上己血、受死；

我的定罪良心，

无需别的牺牲：

一次流血，救赎完全，

神前为我说出美言。

四 祂的声音招呼，

祂的眼目看顾，

在祂万千羊中，

关心我的行踪；

祂常喂养，按名呼唤，

怀抱提挈，祂爱无限。

五 我的救主、君王，

你得胜且刚强，

你王权和宝剑，

藉恩作王掌权；

我今甘心坐你脚前，

作爱俘虏直到永远。

053 6.6.6.6.8.8.

  1. Join all the glorious names

Of wisdom, love, and pow’r,

That mortals ever knew,

That angels ever bore;:

All are too mean to speak His worth,

Too mean to set my Savior forth.

  1. Great Prophet of my God,

My tongue would bless Thy name;

By Thee the joyful news

Of our salvation came;

The joyful news of sins forgiv’n,

Of hell subdued, and peace with heaven.

  1. Jesus, my great High Priest,

Offered His blood, and died;

My guilty conscience seeks

No sacrifice beside

His pow’rful blood did once atone,

And now it pleads before the throne.

  1. I love my Shepherd’s voice:

His watchful eye shall keep

My wand’ring soul among

The thousands of His sheep:

He feeds His flock, He calls their names,

His bosom bears the tender lambs.

  1. My Savior and my Lord,

My conqu’ror and my King,

Thy scepter and Thy sword,

Thy reigning grace I sing:

Thine is the pow’r; behold I sit

In willing bonds beneath Thy feet.

054 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

“耶稣”，远超过万名；

可爱的救主，荣耀的主。

以马内利，神人同住；

可称祝的主，永活的道。

054 7.8.7.8.D.

Jesus, name above all names,

Beautiful Savior, glorious Lord.

Emmanuel, God is with us,

Blessed Redeemer, living Word.

055 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 耶稣！你名何等芬芳，

在蒙恩人身上！

得救罪人，心里所念，

无一像你这甜。

二 神来为人，所表恩义，

你名包含无遗，

天上生命、世间生活，

神在你身显著！

三 “耶稣”这名表明大爱，

如何忍受祸灾，

这名说出我们零丁，

天上如何同情。

四 耶稣无罪，为我成罪，

使我蒙恩受惠；

你舍你身，来得我心，

今后你重我轻。

五 题起你名，我心即伏，

敬拜救主我主；

你爱救我，我今归你

这超人上的你！

055 8.6.8.6.

  1. Jesus! how much Thy name unfolds

To ev’ry opened ear;

The pardoned sinner’s mem’ry holds

None other half so dear.

  1. Thy name encircles every grace

That God as man could show;

There only could He fully trace

A life divine below.

  1. Jesus—it speaks a life of love,

Of sorrows meekly home;

It tells of sympathy above,

Whatever makes us mourn.

  1. Jesus, the One who knew no sin,

Made sin to make us just;

Thou gav’st Thyself our love to win,

Our full confiding trust.

  1. The mention of Thy name shall bow

Our hearts to worship Thee;

The chiefest of ten thousand Thou,

Whose love has set us free.

056 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 我们何等爱这名，

耶稣你的圣名！

你名远超天上地下一切的名。

当我们呼吸这名，

死亡、黑暗立即遁形。

我们得著你，因呼求你的名！

二 亲爱主，我们嘴唇，

乐意承认你名！

荣耀归给我们在天上的父神。

我们在此赞你名，

就能喜乐享受不尽。

我们能爱你，因呼求你的名！

056 Irregular Meter

  1. How we love the glorious name,

The name of Jesus!

‘Tis the name above all names on earth or in heav’n.

As we breath this precious name,

Darkness and death cannot remain;

For we call and get the Person of that name!

  1. Dear Lord Jesus, with our tongues

We gladly confess Thy name,

To the glory of the Father God above.

For to us to speak Thy praise,

Is the enjoyment of our days;

Calling JESUS is to call the One we love!

057 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 耶稣，这名甜美、芬芳，

在蒙恩人耳中！

消除忧愁，医治创伤，

驱尽所有惊恐。

二 这名医治忧伤的灵，

安慰痛苦心情；

是饥饿者的生命饼，

是疲倦者安宁。

三 耶稣这名是我磐石，

我盾牌、避难所；

这名积蓄无穷恩赐，

取用永不短绌。

四 是我牧人、朋友、救主，

先知、祭司、君王；

是我生命、标竿、道路，

我要向祂颂扬。

五 我心疲弱，祂来鼓舞，

冷淡，祂来焚烧；

祂之所是，如此丰富，

配得我口称道。

六 我要高声，尽情称颂，

宣告祂爱无极；

在祂名里，我要夸胜，

消除死亡能力。

057 8.6.8.6. with repeat

  1. How sweet the Name of Jesus sounds

In a believer’s ear!

It soothes his sorrow, heals his wounds,

And drives away his fear.

  1. It makes the wounded spirit whole,

And calms the troubled breast;

’Tis manna to the hungry soul,

And to the weary rest.

  1. Dear Name! the rock on which we build;

Our shield and hiding-place;

Our never-failing treasury, filled

With boundless stores of grace.

  1. Jesus, our Savior, Shepherd, Friend,

Our Prophet, Priest, and King;

Our Lord, our Life, our Way, our End,

Accept the praise we bring.

  1. Weak is the effort of our heart,

And cold our warmest thought;

But when we see Thee as Thou art,

We’ll praise Thee as we ought.

  1. Till then we would Thy love proclaim

With every fleeting breath;

And triumph in that blessed Name

Which quells the pow’r of death.

058 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 耶稣！我爱这名，耶稣我主！

耶稣！远超万名，耶稣我主！

主，你作我一切，

你外我无基业，

有你我无所缺，耶稣我主！

二 你曾成为人子， 耶稣我主！

你曾替我受死， 耶稣我主！

你爱真是殊优，

远超人世所有，

救恩因你成就， 耶稣我主！

三 我惟因你得生， 耶稣我主！

我惟靠你得胜， 耶稣我主！

我们还怕甚么

忧虑、苦难、鬼魔！

因为有你相佐， 耶稣我主！

四 不久你要再临， 耶稣我主！

我们快要欢欣， 耶稣我主！

那时我们见你，

我们就要像你，

并要永远偕你， 耶稣我主！

058 6.4.6.4.6.6.6.4.

  1. Jesus! that name we love, Jesus, our Lord!

Jesus, all names above, Jesus, the Lord!

Thou, Lord, our all must be;

Nothing that’s good have we,

Nothing apart from Thee, Jesus, our Lord!

  1. As Son of Man it was, Jesus, the Lord!

Thou gav’st Thy life for us, Jesus, our Lord!

Great was indeed Thy love,

All other loves above,

Love Thou didst dearly prove, Jesus, our Lord!

  1. Righteous alone in Thee, Jesus, the Lord!

Thou wilt a refuge be, Jesus, our Lord!

Whom, then, have we to fear,

What trouble, grief, or care,

Since Thou art ever near, Jesus, our Lord!

  1. Soon Thou wilt come again, Jesus, the Lord!

We shall be happy then, Jesus, our Lord!

When Thine own face we see,

Then shall we like Thee be,

Then evermore with Thee, Jesus, our Lord!

059 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 耶稣大名，荣耀、有能，

是我投靠、是我倚；

“坐在天上，”我今赞美，

你名就是我胜利。

二 可颂耶稣，大能救主，

我所需要在你名；

只要呼吸耶稣这名，

就得饮于你生命。

三 耶稣大名，荣耀、有能，

天地宣告它大能；

然而只有蒙恩罪人，

知道这名的丰盛！

四 耶稣！耶稣！最贵之名，

战时兵器、病时膏；

在你名里生活、争战，

就有喜乐和荣耀。

059 8.7.8.7.

  1. Glorious, mighty Name of Jesus,

Into Thy dear name I flee;

“Set aloft,” I praise and worship,

For Thy Name is victory!

  1. Blessed Jesus! Mighty Savior!

In Thy Name is all I need;

Just to breathe the Name of Jesus,

Is to drink of Life indeed.

  1. Glorious, mighty Name of Jesus,

Heav’n and earth its pow’r proclaim;

But forgiven sinners only,

Know the balm of Jesus’ Name.

  1. Jesus! Jesus! Name most precious,

Balm in pain or mighty sword;

In Thy Name, we live and conquer,

Blessed, glorious, coming Lord.

060 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 耶稣这名超乎万名，

天上、地上、阴间：

天使和人无不尊敬，

魔鬼惧怕、逃窜。

二 耶稣这名可亲、可爱，

赐给罪人之名；

定罪、惧怕，为我赶开，

带来天上安宁。

三 耶稣打碎罪囚枷锁，

打伤撒但的头；

祂用大能吞灭软弱，

祂用生命拯救。

四 但愿世人都能尝到

祂的丰富恩典！

都能享受祂的怀抱，

投在祂的胸间。

五 我愿彰显祂的公义，

把祂救恩传扬；

一生一世，只此信息：

“看哪，神的羔羊！”

六 耶稣这名永远可靠，

够我度过今生；

直到永世可爱、可宝，

永远是我见证。

060 8.6.8.6.

  1. Jesus, the name high over all,

In hell, or earth, or sky:

Angels and men before it fall,

And devils fear and fly.

  1. Jesus, the name to sinners dear,

The name to sinners giv’n;

It scatters all their guilty fear,

It turns their hell to heav’n.

  1. Jesus the prisoner’s fetters breaks,

And bruises Satan’s head;

Pow’r into strengthless souls He speaks,

And life into the dead.

  1. Oh, that the world might taste and see,

The riches of His grace!

The arms of love that compass me,

Would all mankind embrace.

  1. His only righteousness I show,

His saving truth proclaim:

’Tis all my business here below,

To cry, Behold the Lamb!

  1. Happy, if with my latest breath

I may but gasp His name:

Preach Him to all, and cry in death,

“Behold, behold the Lamb!”

061 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 耶稣这名，至尊名！

天地同颂这圣名！

神心所乐，祂爱聆！

感动我心来共鸣。

二 耶稣这名，活水泉！

干渴之心，已满足；

涌流不息，到永远！

我的嘴唇，当称祝！

三 耶稣之名，何甘甜！

天上之粮，爱之膏；

喜乐之油，丰无限，

积存在天，我珍宝。

四 惟有耶稣，至美名！

生命、安息，真丰博！

耶稣我主，永坚定！

我是属祂，祂属我！

061 7.7.7.7.

  1. Name of Jesus! highest Name!

Name that earth and heav’n adore!

From the heart of God it came,

Leads me to God’s heart once more.

  1. Name of Jesus! living tide!

Days of drought for me are past;

How much more than satisfied

Are the thirsty lips at last!

  1. Name of Jesus! dearest Name!

Bread of heav’n, and balm of love,

Oil of gladness, surest claim

To the treasures stored above.

  1. Only Jesus! fairest Name!

Life and rest and peace and bliss;

Jesus, evermore the same,

He is mine and I am His!

062 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

赞美耶稣的名，

赞美耶稣的名：

我磐石，我的山寨，

更是我的拯救，

我安然信靠。

赞美耶稣的名！

062 Irregular Meter

Praise the name of Jesus,

Praise the name of Jesus:

He’s my rock, He’s my fortress,

He’s my deliverer,

In Him will I trust.

Praise the name of Jesus.

063 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 耶稣，耶稣，耶稣！

地上最甜名；

像我这样罪徒，

竟识其恩情。

二 哦，我真觉羞愧，

哦，我真懊悔，

从前我竟蒙昧，

不知这名美。

三 从未觉其甘甜，

从未识恩典，

从未见祂容颜——

显深切爱怜。

四 也从未曾领悟，

这名的丰富；

耶稣，耶稣，耶稣！

亲爱的救主。

五 我的亏欠、羞耻，

因主的引领，

现今都已过去，

荣耀归祂名！

六 哦，奇妙的大爱，

竟然临及我；

我灵谦卑下拜，

作爱的俘虏。

七 耶稣，耶稣，耶稣！

爱不堪如我。

我今欢欣、鼓舞，

这名真宽博！

063 6.5.6.5.

  1. Jesus, Jesus, Jesus!

Sweetest Name on earth;

How can I, a sinner,

Come to know its worth?

  1. Oh! the sinful sorrow,

Oh! the strangest shame,

That I saw no beauty

In that sacred Name.

  1. Never felt the sweetness!

Never knew the grace,

Never saw the love-pain

In that wounded face!

  1. Never found the mystery

In that simple word—

Jesus, Jesus, Jesus,

Savior, Lover, Lord.

  1. Now ’tis past and over.

Gone my guilt and shame;

Jesus, Jesus did it,

Glory to His Name!

  1. Wonderful compassion,

Reaching even me;

Bows my humbled spirit

In captivity.

  1. Jesus! Jesus! Jesus!

Loved me in my shame.

Oh! the joy and rapture

Of that sacred Name.

064 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 耶稣，你是最甜美的名。

耶稣，当我呼求，你必垂听。

哦，耶稣！当我跌倒，你来复兴；

你是最甜，是最甜美的名。

二 耶稣，我爱赞美你的名。

耶稣，你是始﹑终，永远坚定。

哦，耶稣！为我受死，将我洁净；

你是最甜，是最甜美的名。

三 耶稣，你是快再临的王。

耶稣，你赐我们爱的心肠。

哦，耶稣，我们一同高声歌唱；

你是最甜，是最甜美的名。

064 Irregular Meter

  1. Jesus, You’re the sweetest name of all.

Jesus,—You always hear me when I call.

Oh, Jesus,—You pick me up each time I fall,

You’re the sweetest, the sweetest name of all.

  1. Jesus, how I love to praise Your name.

Jesus, you’re still the first, the last, the same.

Oh, Jesus, You died and took away my shame,

You’re the sweetest, the sweetest name of all.

  1. Jesus, You’re the soon and coming King.

Jesus, we need the love that You can bring.

Oh, Jesus, we lift our voices up and sing,

You’re the sweetest, the sweetest name of all.

065 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 大地无名甜至如此！

名甜至此高天无！

祂离荣耀来世界时，

神将这名赐救主。

和 我们爱唱：基督神子，

并且称祂为耶稣；

因为从来未有文字，

这宝、这甜，如“耶稣”。

二 当人将祂挂在木上，

他们同时挂这名，

好叫天下都能欣赏

我们爱祂的究竟。

三 当祂上升高坐宝座，

神将这名赏赐祂，

万膝跪拜、万口唱和，

天上地下都迎驾！

四 主，藉你这名的无比

恩典永不至疲倦；

今日、昨日，你不更易，

你是一样到永远！

065 8.7.8.7.D.

  1. There is no name so sweet on earth,

No name so sweet in heaven,

The name, before his wondrous birth

To Christ the Savior given.

We love to sing of Christ our King,

And hail Him, blessed Jesus;

For there’s no word ear ever heard

So dear, so sweet as “Jesus.”

  1. And when He hung upon the tree,

They wrote this name above Him;

That all might see the reason we

Forevermore must love Him.

  1. So now, upon His Father’s throne,

Almighty to release us

From sin and pain, He gladly reigns,

The Prince and Savior, Jesus.

  1. O Jesus, by that matchless name,

Thy grace shall fail us never;

Today as yesterday the same,

Thou art the same forever.

066 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的名)

一 曾听地上许多美好的名，

但从没有一名如此好听，

我心真爱戴这神圣的名，

耶稣这宝贵、宝贵的名。

和 耶稣是最甜美的圣名，

祂一生所是，正合祂圣名，

故我愿爱主、奉献我生命，

哦，耶稣，耶稣，最甜美的名。

二 天上地下没有其他的名，

使我们欢欣、喜爱和尊敬，

这神圣的名，我们当欢迎，

耶稣这奇妙、荣耀的名。

三 不日我将要与祂面对面，

称谢赞美祂奇妙的恩典，

白白恩典，使我自由、完全；

颂赞耶稣之名到永远！

066 10.10.10.9. with chorus

  1. There have been names that I have loved to hear,

But never has there been a name so dear

To this heart of mine, as the name divine,

The precious name of Jesus.

Jesus is the sweetest name I know,

And He’s just the same as His lovely name.

And that’s the reason why I love Him so;

O Jesus is the sweetest name I know.

  1. There is no name in earth or heav’n above,

That we should give such honor and such love

As the blessed name; let us all acclaim

That wondrous, glorious name of Jesus.

  1. And someday I shall see Him face to face

To thank and praise Him for His wondrous grace

Which He gave to me when He made me free;

The blessed Son of God called Jesus.

067 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的道成肉身)

一 普世欢腾！救主下降，

大地接祂为王；

惟愿众心豫备地方；

诸天万物歌唱，

诸天万物歌唱，

诸天，诸天万物歌唱。

二 普世欢腾！主治万方，

万民都当歌唱；

田野、洪涛、平原、山冈，

响应歌声嘹亮，

响应歌声嘹亮，

响应，响应歌声嘹亮。

三 罪恶、忧愁无处立足，

再无荆棘四布；

救主带来无限祝福，

漫过一切咒诅，

漫过一切咒诅，

漫过，漫过一切咒诅。

四 祂以真理、恩典引导，

并使万邦宣告：

祂的公义荣光四照，

祂爱何等奇妙，

祂爱何等奇妙，

祂爱，祂爱何等奇妙。

067 8.6.8.6.6.8.

  1. Joy to the world! the Lord is come;

Let earth receive her King;

Let ev’ry heart prepare Him room,

And heav’n and nature sing,

And heav’n and nature sing,

And heav’n, and heav’n and nature sing.

  1. Joy to the earth! the Savior reigns;

Let men their songs employ;

While fields and floods, rocks, hills, and plains

Repeat the sounding joy,

Repeat the sounding joy,

Repeat, repeat the sounding joy.

  1. No more let sins and sorrows grow.

Nor thorns infest the ground;

He comes to make His blessings flow

Far as the curse is found,

Far as the curse is found,

Far as, far as the curse is found.

  1. He rules the world with truth and grace,

And makes the nations prove

The glories of His righteousness,

And wonders of His love,

And wonders of His love,

And wonders, wonders of His love.

068 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的道成肉身)

一 永活的故事，

撇下荣耀降世，

神来作我救主，

成人，名叫耶稣。

生在马槽里，

像根出于干地，

成为忧患的人，常受痛苦。

和 我何等爱祂！何等敬拜祂！

我命，我日光，我的一切！

伟大创造主，作了我救主，

带来神丰满，取用不竭。

二 何等的低就，

为要使我得救；

使那荫中丧亡，

无一至于失望；

神何柔而爱，

撇开祂的光彩，

降卑来苦、来爱、来救丧亡。

三 丝毫不勉强，

祂将血肉穿上，

取了人的形状，

将神计划显彰。

荣耀的奥秘，

神人竟成为一，

你这伟大“我是”， 我今得享。

068 Irregular Meter

  1. Down from His glory,

Ever living story,

My God and Savior came,

And Jesus was His name.

Born in a manger,

To His own a stranger,

A man of sorrows, tears and agony.

O how I love Him! How I adore Him!

My breath, my sunshine, my all in all!

The great Creator became my Savior,

And all God’s fullness dwelleth in Him.

  1. What condescension,

Bringing us redemption;

That in the dead of night,

Not one faint hope in sight,

God, gracious, tender,

Laid aside His splendor,

Stooping to woo, to win, to save my soul.

  1. Without reluctance,

Flesh and blood His substance,

He took the form of man,

Revealed the hidden plan.

O glorious myst’ry,

Sacrifice of Calv’ry,

And now I know Thou art the great “I AM.”

069 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的人性)

一 温和而又君尊，人性透著神性，

和谐显在一身，祂是神而人。

永远常在的主，在肉身里居住，

甚至谦卑蹲俯，为我们洗足。

和 哦，何等的奥秘，温和而又君尊；

当屈膝拜礼，因这是我神。

二 父的纯洁光辉，完全圣洁、无罪；

顺服神旨所给，尝十架苦味。

受苦为赐生命，牺牲以至得胜；

十字架上受钉，犹为人求恳。

三 神的智慧无边，活神，眼不能见，

竟因无限慈怜，在肉身显现。

原为无限之神，今竟俯就、亲近；

提升我的人性，座前永沐恩。

069 12.11.12.11.12.10.

  1. Meekness and majesty, manhood and Diety,

In perfect harmony, the Man who is God.

Lord of eternity, dwells in humanity;

Kneels in humility and washes our feet.

O what a mystery, meekness and majesty;

Bow down and worship, for this is your God.

  1. Father’s pure radiance, perfect in innocence;

Yet learns obedience to death on a cross.

Suff’ring to give us life, conquering through sacrifice;

And as they crucify prays, “Father, forgive.”

  1. Wisdom unsearchable, God, the invisible;

Love indestructible in frailty appears.

Lord of infinity, stooping so tenderly;

Lifts our humanity to the heights of His throne.

070 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的道成肉身)

一 哦来，蒙恩群众，喜乐而又欢腾，

哦，让我们一同来到伯利恒！

来向祂朝觐，天国君王降生。

和 哦来，欢欣敬拜祂；

哦来，欢欣敬拜祂；

哦来，欢欣敬拜祂——

尊主为大！

二 唱阿！天使天军，扬起欢乐歌声！

唱阿！诸天子民，一同发欢声：

“荣耀归给神，荣耀归至高神！”

三 阿们！称谢救主！为拯救我降生！

愿耶稣我恩主永远受尊敬；

神永活的话，今在肉身显大。

070 Irregular Meter

  1. O come, all ye faithful, joyful and triumphant,

O come ye, O come ye to Bethlehem!

Come and behold Him, born the king of angels;

O come, let us adore Him,

O come, let us adore Him,

O come, let us adore Him,

Christ the Lord!

  1. Sing, choirs of angels, sing in exultation!

O sing, all ye citizens of heav’n above;

Glory to God, all glory in the highest;

  1. Amen! Lord, we bless Thee, born for our salvation!

O Jesus! forever be Thy Name adored;

Word of the Father, now in flesh appearing;

071 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的道成肉身)

一 听阿，天使高声唱：

“荣耀归给新生王！

恩典临地平安到，

神人此后能和好。”

兴起！地上万国民，

响应天上赞美声；

天唱地和乐欢腾，

基督降生伯利恒。

(重复最后两行)

二 基督本有神形像，

基督原是永远王，

竟在末世从天降，

生于童女成人状；

神性穿上血肉体，

道成肉身何奥秘，

甘愿作人同人住，

以马内利是耶稣。

三 欢迎，天来和平王！

欢迎，公义的太阳！

带来生命与亮光，

使人复活，医人伤；

虚己，撇下祂荣光，

降生救人免死亡，

降生使人得重生，

降生使人能高升。

四 万国“羡慕”万民“望”，

愿你安家我心房；

女人后裔——得胜者，

在我里面毁古蛇；

亚当旧样全除尽，

你的形像将我印；

末后亚当已降临，

藉爱将我全复兴。

071 7.7.7.7.D. with repeat

  1. Hark! the herald angels sing,

“Glory to the new-born King;

Peace on earth, and mercy mild;

God and sinners reconciled.”

Joyful, all ye nations, rise,

Join the triumph of the skies;

With angelic hosts proclaim,

“Christ is born in Bethlehem.”

(Repeat the last two lines)

  1. Christ, by highest heav’n adored,

Christ, the everlasting Lord:

Late in time behold Him come,

Offspring of a virgin’s womb.

Veiled in flesh the Godhead see,

Hail th’incarnate Deity!

Pleased as man with man to dwell,

Jesus our Emmanuel.

  1. Hail the heav’n-born Prince of Peace!

Hail the Sun of righteousness!

Light and life to all He brings,

Ris’n with healing in His wings:

Mild He lays His glory by,

Born that man no more may die;

Born to raise the sons of earth;

Born to give them second birth.

  1. Come, Desire of nations, come!

Fix in us Thy humble home:

Rise, the woman’s conjuring seed,

Bruise in us the serpent’s head;

Adam’s likeness now efface,

Stamp Thine image in its place:

Final Adam from above,

Reinstate us in Thy love.

072 赞美和敬拜——圣子(呼求祂)

一 神爱子，自天降临！

阿利路亚！

因舍命，完成救恩，

荣耀归神！

神亲自来成为人，

祂生命我得有分。

和 为此我呼求祂，

并献所有给祂。

二 为我们祂被钉死，

阿利路亚！

祂一人替众人死，

荣耀归神！

一粒麦种在地里，

就长出许多子粒。

三 祂得胜，因祂复活，

阿利路亚！

出坟墓，祂得解脱，

荣耀归神！

现今祂在复活里，

化身为灵活我里。

四 从深处向祂求呼，

阿利路亚！

一呼求，祂就进入，

荣耀归神！

只呼求祂的圣名，

你就会被祂更新。

和 我们都呼求祂，

并献所有给祂。

072 7.4.7.4.7.7.6.6.

  1. Praise the Lord, God sent His Son,

Hallelujah!

And salvation’s work was done,

Glory to God!

God Himself became a man,

So that we might live in Him.

That’s why I call on Him,

I give my all to Him.

  1. For us He was crucified,

Hallelujah!

For the many, one Man died,

Glory to God!

One grain fell into the earth,

Many grains to bring to birth.

  1. He arose in victory,

Hallelujah!

From the grave, triumphantly,

Glory to God!

Now in resurrection He

As the Spirit lives in me.

  1. Call on Him from deep within,

Hallelujah!

Just by calling, He comes in,

Glory to God!

Once you call upon His name,

Nevermore you’ll be the same.

We all must call on Him,

We give our all to Him.

073 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的一生)

一 哦主，当我们想到你

在世所历路程：

(你以恩爱对待群黎，

你以忠诚对神。

二 你爱虽然被人辜负，

显为比死更强；

刺你的枪，不过引出

血、水，洗人天良。

三 你虽自己常经忧患，

你却到处行善；

虽然你的路途艰难，

你却不想怨叹。

四 四围不忠，你却赤忠；

黑暗，你却光明。

父的喜乐，你心所重，

从未违祂命令。

五 不因撒但诡计摇动，

不顾苦难、损失；

你的行径，无人同情，

孤单一直到死。)

六 我们不禁奇你谦卑，

盼望能以像你；

主，我们愿学你式微，

因这里有安息。

073 8.6.8.6.

  1. O lord! When we the path retrace

Which Thou on earth hast trod,

To men Thy wondrous love and grace,

Thy faithfulness to God;

  1. Thy love, by man so sorely tried,

Proved stronger than the grave;

The very spear that pierced Thy side

Drew forth the blood to save;

  1. Though Thou didst pass through woes and grief,

Thy works were ever good;

Although midst sorrows all Thy life,

Thou spak’st no murmuring word.

  1. Faithful amidst unfaithfulness,

‘Mid darkness only light,

Thou didst Thy Father’s name confess,

And in His will delight;

  1. Unmoved by Satan’s subtle wiles,

Or suffering, shame, and loss,

Thy path, uncheered by earthly smiles,

Led only to the cross.

  1. We wonder at Thy lowly mind,

And fain would like Thee be,

And all our rest and pleasure find

In learning, Lord, of Thee.

074 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的一生)

一 主，你温柔所留印记，

照耀神圣，何其美丽！

在你所行孤单路中，

你脚留下爱的行踪。

二 你这人子，光中之光，

有谁像你柔细、明亮？

有谁像你如此忍耐，

经过这一忧患尘埃？

三 被人辱骂向不还口，

遭受苦害从无怨尤；

何其温柔、何其谦卑，

谦和之中又何高贵！

四 为使罪囚得著自由，

囚犯之死甘愿忍受；

借此你爱显明无留，

怜悯随著你血涌流。

五 奇妙的主，我心渴望：

更多模成你的形像，

像你谦卑，学你式微，

你的脚踪终生跟随。

074 8.8.8.8.

  1. How beauteous were the marks divine,

That in Thy meekness used to shine,

That lit Thy lonely pathway, trod

In wondrous love, O Son of God!

  1. O who like Thee, so mild, so bright,

Thou Son of man, Thou Light of light?

O who like Thee did ever go

So patient, through a world of woe?

  1. O who like Thee so humbly bore

The scorn, the scoffs of men, before?

So meek, so lowly, yet so high,

So glorious in humility?

  1. And death, that sets the prisoner free,

Was pang, and scoff, and scorn to Thee;

Yet love through all Thy torture glowed,

And mercy with Thy life-blood flowed.

  1. O wondrous Lord, my soul would be

Still more and more conformed to Thee,

And learn of Thee, the lowly One,

And like Thee, all my journey run.

075 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的受苦)

一 主，接纳我们的诗歌，

虽然声音顶柔弱；

我们述说你的恩笃，

因你是我们救主。

二 因你舍去荣耀、丰富，

你的信徒才得福；

你变贫穷，叫你信徒

因你享荣耀、丰富。

三 天上有何使你心厌？

世界有何使你羡？

因而你就离天临世，

孤单、凄凉直到死？

四 你在天上何等荣耀！

你在世上何萧条！

你早已知此行苦恼，

只因爱我竟甘冒。

五 当我想到你的良善，

就不禁又喜又惭！

喜，因你能这样爱好；

惭，因我这样还报。

六 但我们望那日快到，

脱尽所有的阻挠；

那时我们进荣耀里，

要照本分服事你。

七 现今我们等在这里，

因这盼望受策励；

主，使我们活著为你，

直到你前同聚集。

075 7.7.7.7.

  1. Lord, accept our feeble song!

Pow’r and praise to Thee belong;

We would all Thy grace record,

Holy, gracious, loving Lord!

  1. Rich in glory, Thou didst stoop,

Thence is all Thy people’s hope;

Thou wast poor, that we might be

Rich in glory, Lord, with Thee.

  1. Wherefore Thou high heaven didst spurn?

Wherefore Thou to earth didst turn?

Why leave heav’n to come to earth

Lonely, scorned, e’en suffering death?

  1. Thou in heav’n-the glorious One!

Thou on earth-the outcast Man!

Though this suffering Thou didst know,

Love would come to bear our woe.

  1. When we think of love like this,

Joy and shame our hearts possess;

Joy, that Thou couldst pity thus;

Shame, for such returns from us.

  1. Yet we hope the day to see

When from every hindrance free,

When to Thee, in glory, brought,

We shall serve Thee as we ought.

  1. Now, O Lord, we wait for Thee,

Wait “the blessed hope” to see.

May we ever for Thee live,

Till Thy saints Thou dost receive.

076 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的受苦)

一 耶稣！永远生命之源！

耶稣！我气息之始！

你已胜过阴府黑暗，

藉著忍辱与受死。

你曾历经患难、艰苦，

屈尊为我成功救赎：

千千万万的赞美，

荣耀救主，惟你配！

(重复最后两行)

二 神的儿子，你曾忍受

讥诮、妒恨与苦害！

荣耀的王，为我愆尤，

荆棘冠冕你竟戴；

受死为要将我救援，

使我脱离罪的锁链：

千千万万的赞美，

荣耀救主，惟你配！

三 人所给你一切羞辱，

你全无声的忍受；

甚至忍受死的痛苦，

为使救赎得成就。

你的降卑令人惊奇，

竟肯来到受死之地：

千千万万的赞美，

宝贵救主，惟你配！

四 因著你曾降卑尘埃，

因著你死使我生；

心中赞美、灵里敬拜，

救主，全都向你呈。

所有忧患你已担当，

所有祝福我今得享：

这要成为我诗题，

永远赞美你不已。

076 8.7.8.7.8.8.7.7.

  1. Jesus! Source of life eternal!

Jesus, Author of our breath!

Victor o’er the hosts infernal,

By defeat, and shame, and death,

Thou thro’ deepest tribulation

Deigned to pass for our salvation:

Thousand, thousand praises be,

Lord of glory, unto Thee!

(Repeat the last two lines)

  1. Thou, O Son of God! wert bearing

Cruel mockings, hatred, scorn;

Thou, the King of glory, wearing,

For our sake, the crown of thorn:

Dying, Thou didst us deliver

From the chains of sin for ever;

Thousand, thousand praises be,

Precious Savior, unto Thee!

  1. All the shame men heaped upon

The Thou didst patiently endure;

Not the pains of death too bitter,

Our redemption to procure;

Wondrous Thy humiliation

To accomplish our salvation:

Thousand, thousand praises be,

Precious Savior, unto Thee!

  1. Heart-felt praise and adoration,

Savior, thus to Thee we give:

For Thy life’s humiliation,

For Thy death, whereby we live;

All the grief Thou wert enduring,

All the bliss Thou wert securing,

Evermore the theme shall be,

Of thanksgivings, Lord, to Thee.

077 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的受苦)

一 我每静念那十字架，

并主如何在上受熬，

我就不禁浑忘身家，

鄙视从前所有倨傲。

二 愿主禁我别有所夸，

除了基督的十字架；

前所珍爱虚空荣华，

今为祂血情愿丢下。

三 看从祂头！祂脚！祂手！

忧情、慈爱和血而流！

那有爱忧如此相遘？

荆棘编成如此冕旒？

四 看祂全身满被水血，

如同穿上朱红衣饰！

因此，我与世界断绝，

世界向我也像已死。

五 假若宇宙都归我手，

尽献我主仍觉可羞；

爱既如此奇妙、深厚，

当得我心、我命——所有。

077 8.8.8.8.

  1. When I survey the wondrous cross

On which the Prince of glory died

My richest gain I count but loss,

And pour contempt on all my pride.

  1. Forbid it, Lord, that I should boast,

Save in the cross of Christ my God;

All the vain things that charm me most,

I sacrifice them to His blood.

  1. See from His head, His hands, His feet,

Sorrow and love flow mingled down;

Did e’er such love and sorrow meet,

Or thorns compose so rich a crown?

  1. His dying crimson like a robe,

Spreads o’er His body on the tree;

Then am I dead to all the globe,

And all the globe is dead to me.

  1. Were the whole realm of nature mine,

That were an offering far too small:

Love so amazing, so divine,

Demands my heart, my life, my all!

078 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的受苦)

一 哦，满了伤痕的头，

满了痛苦、谇诟，

受尽万般的试炼，

又戴荆棘冠冕；

这头今日已得荣，

已得圣徒诵咏，

可怜当日受死伤，

在加略木头上。

二 你的面容原超凡，

如同光明太阳，

父神一见就悦纳，

竟受罪人唾打。

主，你所受的一切，

都为我们罪孽；

我们债务得清付，

你却被人剪除。

三 我们救主——危难友，

我们报恩无由！

当你为我流血时，

你的痛苦谁知？

求你使我从今后，

天天记念髑髅，

直到被提进荣耀，

永远与你相交。

078 7.6.7.6.D.

  1. O Head once full of bruises,

So full of pain and scorn!

Mid other sore abuses,

Mocked with a crown of thorn:

O Head e’en now surronded

With brightest majesty,

In death once bowed and wounded

On the accursed tree:

  1. Thou Countenance transcendent!

Thou life-creating Sun!

To worlds on Thee dependent

Yet bruised and spit upon:

O Lord, what Thee tormented

Was our sins’ heavy load,

We had the debt augmented

Which Thou didst pay in blood.

  1. We give Thee thanks unfeigned,

O Savior, Friend in need,

For what Thy soul sustained

When Thou for us didst bleed.

Grant us to lean unshaken

Upon Thy faithfulness,

Until, to glory taken,

We see Thee face to face.

079 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的受苦)

一 哦主，甚么使你头垂？

我罪压你身上！

你是站在罪人地位，

将我罪孽担当。

成我祭牲，流血赎罪，

现今我得释放。

二 我杯满了咒诅、死亡，

是我应得之分，

然而其中每滴苦汤，

你都为我喝尽。

苦杯，你爱为我尽尝；

福杯，我今得饮。

三 耶和华曾举起祂杖，

哦，主，向你打下！

你被父神痛苦击伤，

使我免受刑罚；

你泪、你血因此流淌，

作了我的赎价。

四 狂风大起，怒涛骇浪，

哦主，向你进迫！

你的胸怀为我抵挡，

作我安息之所。

因你为我受死、受伤，

平安我今得著。

五 耶和华曾吩咐祂刀，

哦主，向你兴起！

它的残酷火刃闪耀，

须将你血饮吸；

既已满足神之所要，

它的要求遂息。

六 哦主，你曾为我受死，

我也在你死了；

你已复活，将我开释，

今在我里活著。

经过炼净、纯洁、无疵，

就得进你荣耀。

079 8.6.8.6.8.6.

  1. O Christ, what burdens bow’d

Our load was laid on Thee;

Thou stoodest in the sinner’s stead,

Didst bear all ill for me.

A victim led; Thy blood was shed;

Now there’s no load for me.

  1. Death and the curse were in our cup;

O Christ, ’twas full for Thee!

But Thou hast drained the last dark drop—

’Tis empty now for me.

That bitter cup—love drank it up;

Now blessings’ draught for me.

  1. Jehovah lifted up His rod,

O Christ, it fell on Thee!

Thou wast sore stricken of Thy God;

There’s not one stroke for me.

Thy tears, Thy blood, beneath it flowed;

Thy bruising healeth me.

  1. The tempest’s awful voice was heard,

O Christ, it broke on Thee!

Thy open bosom was my ward,

It braved the storm for me.

Thy form was scarred, Thy visage marred;

Now cloudless peace for me.
