我们也爱唱吟

你是最美丽。

二 地上所有安逸，

尽都是空虚；

天上缺少了你，

成黑夜之域。

基督，你的荣耀，

是天上之光；

耶稣，你的荣耀，

使地也明亮。

三 如果与你分开，

生命变死亡；

若是有你同在，

死中生仍旺。

宇宙、人类、天使，

全由你造成，

然而你肯降世，

穿上了肉身。

四 耶稣！一切美善，

始终全在你；

神的荣耀光线，

乃是你自己。

人若得见你面，

是蒙了奇恩；

但愿你这恩典，

我也满有分。

147 6.5.6.5.D.

  1. Jesus, wondrous Savior!

Christ, of kings the King!

Angels fall before Thee,

Prostrate, worshipping;

Fairest they confess Thee

In the heav’n above.

We would sing Thee fairest

Here in hymns of love.

  1. All earth’s flowing pleasures

Were a wintry sea;

Heav’n itself without Thee

Dark as night would be.

Lamb of God! Thy glory

Is the light above.

Lamb of God! Thy glory

Is the life of love.

  1. Life is death, if severed

From Thy throbbing heart.

Death with life abundant

At Thy touch would start.

Worlds and men and angels

All consist in Thee,

Yet Thou earnest to us

In humility.

  1. Jesus! all perfections

Rise and end in Thee;

Brightness of God’s glory

Thou, eternally.

Favored beyond measure

They Thy face who see;

May we, gracious Savior,

Share this ecstasy.

148 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的美丽)

一 最美的耶稣！

管理造物的主！

神子、人子！永活的道，

我心所珍爱，

我灵所感戴，

我的喜乐、我的夸耀！

二 草地何青绿！

树木更加悦目！

披著春花，盛开争艳！

耶稣更鲜艳！

耶稣更香甜！

伤痛之心因祂欢赞。

三 日光何晴美！

月光更加明媚！

群星闪烁，光辉夺目！

耶稣更明亮！

耶稣更晴朗！

胜过天上一切景物！

四 所有的美丽，

在天或是在地，

在你身上全都见到；

无何更光彩，

无何更可爱！

惟我救主，你最高超！

148 5.6.8.5.5.8.

  1. Fairest Lord Jesus!

Ruler of all nature!

O Thou of God and man the Son!

Thee will I cherish,

Thee will I honor,

Thou, my soul’s glory, joy and crown!

  1. Fair are the meadows,

Fairer still the woodlands,

Robed in the blooming garb of spring;

Jesus is fairer,

Jesus is purer,

Who makes the woeful heart to sing!

  1. Fair is the sunshine,

Fairer still the moonlight,

And all the twinkling starry host;

Jesus shines brighter,

Jesus shines purer,

Than all the angels heav’n can boast!

  1. All fairest beauty,

Heavenly and earthly,

Wondrously, Jesus, is found in Thee;

None can be nearer,

Fairer, or dearer,

Than Thou my Savior art to me.

149 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的美丽)

一 我们的心满是基督，

切望倾倒此中丰富；

你是我们诗歌题目，

你是我们心爱救主；

我们舌头急要唱出

天上君王荣耀万古！

二 你比世上一切众生，

都更美丽、都更成圣；

你心有爱，你口有恩；

你既受苦、你又舍身；

你这永受颂赞的神！

我们敬拜以灵以诚。

149 8.8.8.8.8.8.

  1. Our hearts are full of Christ and long

Their glorious matter to declare!

Of Him we make our loftier song,

We cannot from His praise forbear:

Our ready tongues make haste to sing

The glories of the heav’nly King.

  1. Fairer than all the earthborn race,

Perfect in comeliness Thou art;

Replenished are Thy lips with grace,

And full of love Thy tender heart.

God ever-blest! we bow the knee,

And own all fullness dwells in Thee.

150 赞美和敬拜——圣子(因祂满足)

一 主耶稣，当我们想到

你的一切恩爱，

我们的灵盼望最好

当面见你丰采。

二 虽然我们行在野地，

寂寞、干渴、骇惊，

左右荆棘，前后蒺藜，

四围仇敌陷阱。

三 我们却从深处著想，

知道你爱价值；

我们因此心里明亮，

赞美你恩不置。

四 你是我们生命、力量、

盾牌、磐石、诗歌，

无论怎样把你思想，

总叫我们快乐。

五 可爱的主，保守我们

紧紧跟随你行，

直到我们进入天门，

面见你的荣形。

150. 8.6.8.6.

  1. Lord Jesus! when we think of Thee,

Of all Thy love and grace,

Our spirits long and fain would see

Thy beauty face to face.

  1. And though the wilderness we tread,

A barren, thirsty ground,

With thorns and briars overspread,

Where foes and snares abound;

  1. Yet in Thy love such depths we see,

Our hearts o’erflow with praise—

Content ourselves, while, Lord to Thee

A joyful song we raise.

  1. Our Lord, our Life, our Rest, our Shield,

Our Rock, our Food, our Light;

Each thought of Thee doth constant yield

Unchanging, fresh delight.

  1. Blest Savior, keep our spirits stayed

Hard following after Thee,

Till we, in robes of white arrayed,

Thy face in glory see.

151 赞美和敬拜——圣子(因祂满足)

一 恩主，你是生命源，

深而且甜之泉：

你的活水我已尝，

永不再渴再干。

你的怜悯时扩展，

丰满如同海洋；

你的恩典够我用，

是你智慧所量。

二 我乃是属我良人，

我的良人属我；

你将污秽的罪人，

带进你宴筵所。

你的功绩我所倚，

你外别无可投；

隐藏在你面光中，

享受你的保守。

三 新妇所爱非妆饰，

乃是良人自己；

我所注视非荣耀，

乃是你的美丽：

非你所赐的冠冕，

乃你被钉之手；

恩主，你是我荣耀，

我的永远倚投。

151 7.6.7.6.D.

  1. O Christ, He is the fountain,

The deep, sweet well of life:

Its living streams I’ve tasted

Which save from grief and stife.

And to an ocean fullnes,

His mercy doth expand;

His grace is all-sufficient

As by His wisdom planned.

  1. O I am my Beloved’s,

And my Beloved’s mine;

He brings a poor vile sinner

Into His house of wine!

I stand upon His merit;

I know no other stand.

I’m hidden in His presence

And held by His own hand.

  1. The Bride eyes not her garment,

But her dear Bridegroom’s face;

I will not gaze at glory,

But on my King of grace:

Not at the crown He giveth,

But on His pierced hand;

The Lamb is all the glory,

And my eternal stand!

152 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的配得)

一 荣耀归于我主，

天地齐来欢呼，

向祂赞美；

祂的恩典、慈爱，

除我死亡、悲哀；

高唱直到万代，

“羔羊是配。”

二 蒙恩人们都来，

环绕宝座敬拜，

向祂赞美；

为我宝血流出，

与神和好无阻；

赞颂之声四布，

“羔羊是配。”

三 被赎族类都来，

同心向主敬拜，

向祂赞美；

因祂我得欢乐，

发出感恩诗歌，

起来，口唱心和，

“羔羊是配。”

四 事物虽然改迁，

但我依旧不变，

向祂赞美；

诗歌不绝颂扬，

尊祂我主我王，

欢声上达穹苍，

“羔羊是配。”

152 6.6.4.6.6.6.4.

  1. Glory to Christ on high!

Let praises fill the sky!

Praise ye His name:

He all our sorrows bore;

Angels His name adore,

And saints cry evermore,

“Worthy the Lamb!”

  1. All they around the throne

Cheerfully join in one,

Praising His name:

We who have known His blood

Sealing our peace with God,

Spread His dear name abroad;

Worthy the Lamb!

  1. Join all the human race

Our Lord, God’s Christ, to bless,

Praise ye His name:

In Him we will rejoice,

Making a cheerful noise,

Saying with heart and voice,

“Worthy the Lamb!”

  1. Though we must change our place,

Our hearts shall never cease

Praising His name:

To Him we’ll tribute bring,

Laud Him, our gracious King,

And, without ceasing, sing,

“Worthy the Lamb!”

153 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的配得)

一 听哪，这是教会凯歌：

羔羊是配！

听哪，天军正在应和：

羔羊是配！

王位、政权伏祂脚前，

馨香歌颂绕祂身边，

乐声悠扬赞祂恩典，

羔羊是配！

二 各族、各方蒙爱的人，

羔羊是配！

齐来歌唱这大救恩，

羔羊是配！

万圣欢呼声若雷动，

又如众水奔腾匉訇；

伏主脚前同心尊崇，

羔羊是配！

三 赞美、感谢永无中辍，

羔羊是配！

洪恩比罪显为更多，

羔羊是配！

迷途流浪，祂来寻找，

流血救赎，使成新造；

带领我们进入荣耀，

羔羊是配！

四 今日蒙恩先唱此诗，

羔羊是配！

声音广播弥漫人世，

羔羊是配！

韵和调美，天乐四起，

“羔羊是配”，永颂不已；

传扬虽久，犹难尽意，

羔羊是配！

153 8.4.8.4.8.8.8.4.

  1. “Tis the Church triumphant singing,

Worthy the Lamb;

Heav’n throughout with praises ringing,

Worthy the Lamb.

Thrones and pow’rs before Him bending,

Odors sweet with voice ascending,

Swell the chorus never ending,

Worthy the Lamb.

  1. Every kindred, tongue and nation,

Worthy the Lamb;

Join to sing the great salvation,

Worthy the Lamb;

Loud as mighty thunders roaring,

Floods of mighty waters pouring,

Prostrate at His feet adoring,

Worthy the Lamb.

  1. Harps and songs forever sounding,

Worthy the Lamb;

Mighty grace o’er sin abounding,

Worthy the Lamb;

By His blood He dearly bought us:

Wand’ring from the fold He sought us.

And to glory safely brought us;

Worthy the Lamb.

  1. Sing with blest anticipation,

Worthy the Lamb;

Through the vale of tribulation.

Worthy the Lamb;

Sweetest notes, all notes excelling,

On the theme forever dwelling.

Still untold, though ever telling.

Worthy the Lamb.

154 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的配得)

一 恩主耶稣，阿利路亚

向你高声唱，

永远赞美你的价值

超万人之上。

和 赞美羔羊！你真是配！

永远的歌声。

阿利路亚！阿利路亚！

赞美主！阿们！

二 赞美羔羊！你真是配！

你宝血流出，

赎回我们归神，作王

并祭司、国度。

三 阿利路亚！恩主耶稣，

你爱不止息；

我们属你，永远属你，

与你永合一。

四 赞美恩主！阿利路亚！

谁不唱此歌？

来自各族、各方、各国

众圣同唱和。

154 8.5.8.5.D.

  1. Blessed Lord, our hallelujahs

Now to Thee we raise.

Never could we fully utter

A Thy worth and praise!

Praise the Lamb, for He is worthy!

Sweet eternal strain.

Hallelujah! Hallelujah!

Praise the Lord! Amen

  1. Praise the Lamb! Yes, Thou art worthy,

Who didst shed Thy blood

To redeem Thy saints, and make us

Kings and priests to God!

  1. Hallelujah! Thou, Lord Jesus,

Canst not cease to love;

Thine we are and Thine forever,

One with Thee above.

  1. Praise the Lord! Yes, hallelujah!

Who would hush the song?

Join with saints from every nation,

Every tribe and tongue.

155 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的配得)

一 哦主耶稣，我的心向著宝座，

何等喜乐，向你献上赞美！

因著蒙福，我敬拜，我也述说，

承认你配，惟有你真是配。

和 主，你真是配！主，你真是配！

赞美，因为惟有你真是配！

因著蒙福，我敬拜，我也述说

你的荣耀，因为你真是配。

二 你这神人，是真神，又是真人，

低于天使，为我们作牺牲；

女人后裔，曾如何亲临嚣尘，

败坏古蛇，伤其头，踏其身！

三 创造的主，竟然被受造的人

钉十字架，你是如何降卑！

你不自救，被神弃又被人恨！

你不退缩，经黑暗，喝苦杯！

四 接战死亡，你如何退其狂澜，

荣耀得胜，全得胜，大得胜！

思念及此，怎能不歌颂弥漫！

阴府的门，到如今全溃崩。

155 11.10.11.10. with chorus

  1. Jesus, our Lord, with what joy we adore Thee,

Chanting our praise to Thyself on the throne!

Blest in Thy presence, we worship before Thee,

Own Thou art worthy, and worthy alone.

Lord, Thou art worthy: Lord, Thou art worthy;

Lord, Thou art worthy, and worthy alone!

Blest in Thy presence, we worship before Thee,

Own Thou art worthy, and worthy alone!

  1. Verily God, yet become truly human,

Lower than angels to die in our stead;

How has that long promised “Seed of the woman”

Trod on the serpent and bruised his head!

  1. How didst Thou humble Thyself to be taken,

Led by Thy creatures and nailed to the cross,

Hated of men, and of God too forsaken,

Shunning not darkness, the curse, and the loss.

  1. How hast Thou triumphed, and triumphed with glory,

Battled death’s forces, rolled back every wave!

Can we refrain then from telling the story?

Lord, Thou art Victor o’er death and the grave.

156 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的配得)

一 我们当来同声欢呼，

称颂神的基督；

我们若有千万舌头，

诗题只有一首。

二 “升天羔羊，你真是配，

来得这样赞美！”

我们喊说：“你真是配，

因你为我降卑！”

三 救主耶稣配得尊贵、

权柄、荣耀、智慧；

还有许多献上不及，

主阿，永都归你！

四 不久圣徒快要上升，

同发赞美之声；

一切住在青天之下，

都要颂扬不暇！

五 待赎宇宙合而为一，

颂赞羔羊不已；

因祂降世，亲临死地，

现今荣耀无比。

156 8.6.8.6.

  1. Come, let us join our cheerful songs,

And thus approach the throne;

Had we ten thousand thousand tongues,

Our theme of joy’s but one:

  1. “Worthy the Lamb that’s gone on high,

To be exalted thus!”

“Worthy the Lamb that died!” we cry,

“For He was slain for us.”

  1. Jesus is worthy to receive

Honor and pow’r divine;

And blessings more than we can give

Be, Lord, forever Thine.

  1. Soon shall the saints, exalted high,

A glorious anthem raise,

And all that dwell beneath the sky

Speak forth Thine endless praise.

  1. Redeemed creation join in one,

T’adore the sacred name

Of Him that sits upon the throne,

And to exalt the Lamb.

157 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的配得)

一 荣耀归于爱我之主，

洗清我的众罪污，

并使我作祭司﹑君王，

与祂掌权在国度；

荣耀、敬拜、赞美、欢呼，

归被杀羔羊基督。

二 荣耀、敬拜、赞美、欢呼，

蒙恩群众高声唱；

尊贵、权柄、能力、丰富，

受造之物同颂扬；

主，你是配；主，你是配；

万主之主，王中王。

三 荣耀归于天使之王，

荣耀归于教会王，

荣耀归于万国君王，

天地都欢声歌唱；

但愿荣耀，永远归祂——

归于那荣耀之王。

157 8.7.8.7.8.7.

  1. Glory be to Him who loved us,

Washed us from each sinful stain;

Glory be to Him who made us

Priests and kings with Him to reign;

Glory, worship, laud and blessing

To the Lamb who once was slain.

  1. Glory, worship, laud and blessing,

Thus the choir triumphant sings;

Honor, riches, power, dominion,

Thus its praise creation brings;

Thou art worthy, Thou art worthy,

Lord of lords, and King of kings.

  1. Glory to the King of angels,

Glory to the Church’s King,

Glory to the King of nations,

Heaven and earth His praises sing:

Glory ever and forever

To the King of Glory bring.

158 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的全备)

一 同来朝见基督，

你是神而人者，

万有藉你造出，

生命从你开始：

在你里面，行动、生活；

在你爱里，我得存活。

二 你是归神之路，

你血将我救赎；

因你我蒙宽恕，

神前坦然进入。

审判台前安然站住，

律法要求，你爱已付。

三 你是活的真理，

蕴藏一切智慧，

恩赐惟你供给，

永恒真理齐备！

伟大“我是！”你里安息，

你已应付一切问题。

四 你是真实生命，

此世不能赐予；

认识你这生命，

使我生活丰裕。

复活救主，我活你里；

你活我里，永世不移。

五 同来敬拜基督，

我们君王、救主，

心存感激、爱慕，

把我一切让出：

愿你充满，从我活出，

世人目睹，向你拜服！

158 6.6.6.6.8.8.

  1. We come, O Christ, to Thee,

True Son of God and man,

By whom al things consist,

In whom all life began:

In Thee alone we live and move

And have our being in Thy love.

  1. Thou art the Way to God,

Thy blood our ransom paid;

In Thee we face our Judge

And Maker unafraid.

Before the Throne absolved we stand:

Thy love has met Thy law’s demand.

  1. Thou art the living Truth!

All wisdom dwells in Thee,

Thou Source of every skill,

Eternal Verity!

Thou great I Am! In Thee we rest,

True answer to our every quest.

  1. Thou only art true Life,

To know Thee is to live

The more abundant life

That earth can never give:

O Risen Lord! We live in Thee

And Thou in us eternally!

  1. We worship Thee Lord Christ,

Our Savior and our King,

To Thee our youth and strength

Adoringly we bring:

So fill our hearts that men may see

Thy life in us and turn to Thee!

159 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的全备)

一 惟有耶稣是我题目，

我的信息是耶稣；

惟有耶稣是我歌赋，

我所仰望是耶稣。

和 惟有耶稣，永是耶稣，

我们歌颂这耶稣，

祂是救主、生命、大夫，

祂是君王建国度。

二 惟有耶稣是我救主，

担当我的所有罪，

是我公义直到永古，

天天加力满恩惠。

三 惟有耶稣是我生命，

救我脱离罪与己；

惟有耶稣用祂圣灵，

充满我心、作我力。

四 惟有耶稣是我大夫，

担当我的病与疾；

复活生命、升天丰富，

祂都分赐祂肢体。

五 惟有耶稣是我能力，

是祂赐下五旬节；

哦主，求你使我得以

充满圣灵、常胜捷。

六 我们现在等候耶稣，

要听祂来的招呼；

但是始终惟有耶稣，

惟有耶稣万有主。

159 8.7.8.7.D.

  1. Jesus only is our message,

Jesus all our theme shall be;

We will lift up Jesus ever,

Jesus only will we see.

Jesus only, Jesus ever,

Jesus all in all we sing,

Savior, Sanctifier, and Healer,

Glorious Lord and coming King.

  1. Jesus only is our Savior,

All our guilt He bore away,

He, our righteousness forever,

All our strength from day to day.

  1. Jesus is our Sanctifier,

Saving us from self and sin,

And with all His Spirit’s fullness,

Filling all our hearts within.

  1. Jesus only is our Healer,

All our sicknesses He bare,

And His risen life and fullness,

All His members still may share.

  1. Jesus only is our Power,

He the gift of Pentecost;

Jesus, breathe Thy pow’r upon us.

Fill us with the Holy Ghost.

  1. And for Jesus we are waiting,

List’ning for the Advent Call;

But ‘twill still be Jesus only,

Jesus ever, all in all.

160 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂是父的喜悦)

一 哦主，在你名里聚集，

不见一人惟见你，

你的同在使我欢喜，

呼召我心来归依。

二 爱我之爱，不知其限，

除了父对你的爱；

父神对你所有意念，

我心宝贵又感戴。

三 父的喜悦、安息、喜乐，

一切全都在于你；

惟有你心能够测度，

父在你身之珍惜。

四 父将祂爱全置于你，

称你作祂的爱子；

然而为我未曾爱惜，

为我得生，要你死。

五 将来见你，如你所是，

我要如何的欢唱！

哦，主耶稣，你的名字，

在神心中永馨香！

六 喜乐音调、不息歌唱、

永远赞美的颂词、

荣耀诗章、永增欢畅，

一直继续到永世。

160 8.7.8.7.

  1. Gathered in Thy name, Lord Jesus,

Losing sight of all but Thee,

O what joy Thy presence gives us,

Calling up our hearts to Thee!

  1. Loved with love which knows no measure,

Save the Father’s love to Thee,

Blessed Lord, our hearts would treasure

All the Father’s thoughts of Thee.

  1. All His joy, His rest, His pleasure—

All His deep delight in Thee—

Lord, Thy heart alone can measure

What Thy Father found in Thee.

  1. How He set His love upon Thee—

Called Thee His beloved Son;

Yet for us He did not spare Thee,

By Thy death our life was won.

  1. O the joy, the wondrous singing,

When we see Thee as Thou art!

Thy blest name, Lord Jesus, bringing

Sweetest music to God’s heart.

  1. Notes of gladness, songs unceasing,

Hymns of everlasting praise,

Psalms of glory, joy increasing,

Through God’s endless day of days.

161 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的降卑)

一 哦，主耶稣，我们在你前聚集，

为著饼、杯我们感激不已；

同心赞美，你竟作生命之粮，

将你自己多方供人饱尝。

和 我心、我灵真要涌出赞美，

你竟为我如此降卑。

直至永世还要将你饱尝，

你何丰富，你何无量。

二 何等可怜——当基督来到人群，

满带丰盛，作人生命供应，

人竟拒绝，反倚靠道理教训，

不肯到祂跟前来得生命，

和 我们所需乃是把你享受，

何等奇妙，何等丰厚！

如此享受，里面就得饱足，

长大成人，活出基督。

三 哦，主耶稣，你降卑来到尘世，

非为作王，在人外面管治；

乃作灵粮，供我们享受得饱，

藉你生命，在人里面引导。

(第一节和诗)

四 主，赞美你，你实在伟大荣耀，

能力无穷，威严、丰富、奥妙，

但你竟作生命之粮，真奇妙，

直到永远，我们仍要称道。

(第一节和诗)

161 11.10.11.10. with chorus

  1. O Jesus Lord, when present at Thy table,

And on the bread and on the wine we gaze;

We praise Thee, Lord, that Thou as food art able

To be enjoyed by man in many ways.

So all our being sings in praise to Thee,

How small Thou art, how small Thou art!

Of Thee we’ll eat through all eternity,

How small Thou art, how small Thou art!

  1. O what a shame—when Christ with all His riches,

Has come into the world, life to supply—

That man would live, not by Him, but by teachings,

So powerless these riches to apply.

But all we need to do is eat the Lord;

He’s marvelous, He’s wonderful!

And as we eat, we’re inwardly restored;

Christ grows in us, grows to the full.

  1. O Jesus Christ, Thou camest not to mankind

To be a king, to rule us outwardly.

But Thou hast come as food to satisfy us,

And by Thy life to guide us inwardly.

(First chorus)

  1. We praise Thee, Lord, for all Thy glorious grandeur,

For all Thy strength and majesty replete;

And yet, O Lord, what special thanks we give Thee,

That all Thou art is small enough to eat.

(First chorus)

162 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂作我们的祭物)

一 主是我们平安祭，

我们按手于你；

在这真正实际里，

我们与你合一。

在此聚会的帐幕，

将你献上给父，

神、人同享这祭物——

你自己作食物。

和 基督乃是我们平安！

我们将你颂赞！

对神和对人的平安，

都已恢复完全。

二 一见所洒之宝血，

带来何等安歇。

所献平安祭之血，

使我与神和谐。

我们能够对仇敌，

大胆传此信息：

“靠耶稣血有安息！

”这是何等安息。

三 我们今以献燔祭、

素祭作为根基，

我主耶稣今好比

真正的平安祭。

我们越多吸取祂

人性里的美佳，

就能越过越像祂，

众圣同享不暇。

四 神也享受祂的分——

甘甜、内里、隐密；

祭司家族都有分

此一胸肉摇祭。

献祭祭司——何宝贵——

分得最好部分：

他得举祭的右腿，

并美好无酵饼。

五 摇祭胸肉何甘甜，

它是丰满大爱

在基督复活里面

使我们蒙恩待。

吃升天者的腿肉，

何等刚强有力，

加上饼滋养丰厚，

行事与祂无异。

六 与众圣一同享用

基督何等丰富！

哦，这是真实交通，

惟一聚会之路。

我们今满怀感激，

并将心愿重申——

我们为主的旨意，

正如祂为我们。

和 看，这是何等的交通！

神人在此一同！

何等盛筵！何等欢腾！

神子民都与共！

162 7.6.7.6.D. with chorus

  1. Lord, Thou art our peace off’ring;

We lay our hands on Thee.

We’re one with Thee, Lord Jesus,

In fact and practically.

Here in the tent of meeting

We offer Thee to God

And with the Father feasting

Enjoy Thee as our food.

Christ is our peace! Christ is our peace!

We praise Thee, blessed, Lord!

Our peace with God, our peace with man

Have fully been restored.

  1. O what a peace it gives us

To see the sprinkled blood.

The blood of our peace offering

Has brought us peace with God.

With boldness we’re proclaiming—

Now hear this, enemy—

“Peace by the blood of Jesus!”

This is our victory.

  1. Based on the burnt oblation

And the meal offering too,

We now may offer Jesus

As our peace offering true.

The more we eat and drink Him

In His humanity,

The more we may enjoy Him

While feasting corporately.

  1. Here God enjoys His portion—

’Tis inward, hidden, sweet—

And all the priestly family

May here the wave breast eat.

The offering priest—how precious—

May of the best partake:

He gets the right heave shoulder

And one unleavened cake.

  1. How sweet to eat the wave breast,

The all-embracing love

Of Christ in resurrection!

It sets us all above.

What strength to eat the shoulder

Of the ascended One

And with the cake be nourished

To walk as He has done.

  1. With all the cleansed ones feasting,

How rich the Christ we eat!

Oh, this is true communion,

The only way to meet.

We bring our full thanksgiving

And e’en would make a vow

We’re for the Lord’s great purpose

As He is for us now.

What fellowship, what fellowship

With God and man we share!

O what a joy, O what a feast

With all God’s people here.

163 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的救赎)

一 赞美！赞美！赞美耶稣，我救赎主！

圣徒歌唱，将祂奇爱宣明；

称颂！称颂！称颂基督，天使俯伏；

能力、尊贵，归于祂的圣名！

有如牧者，主使祂的羊饱足，

祂的膀臂怀抱他们安宁。

你们众圣，当在光中与祂同住；

赞美！称颂，带著快乐心情。

二 赞美！赞美！赞美耶稣，我救赎主！

祂为我罪受苦、流血、受刑；

称颂！称颂！称颂祂是磐石稳固，

为成永远救恩，十架被钉！

爱的救主，祂担当我的痛苦，

头戴荆冕，为我忍受羞辱；

从前为我，被人弃绝、受人轻忽，

永远得胜，作我荣耀之主！

三 赞美！赞美！赞美耶稣，我救赎主！

响彻天门，“和散那”声飞扬！

加冠！加冠！加冠祂作万有之主，

复兴万物，永作祭司、君王！

死已废除！我们当欢乐宣布：

死阿，那里是你所夸坟场？

耶稣活著！不要静默，同来欢呼；

耶稣活著，救恩有力、刚强！

163 Irregular Meter

  1. Praise Him! praise Him! Jesus our blessed Redeemer!

Sing, ye saints! His wonderful love proclaim!

Hail Him! hail Him Mightiest angels in glory;

Strength and honor give to His holy name!

Like a shepherd, Jesus will feed His people,

In His arms He carries them all day long;

O ye saints that live in the light of His presence,

Praise Him! praise Him! ever in joyful song!

  1. Praise Him! praise Him! Jesus, our blessed Redeemer,

For our sins He sufferedand bled and died;

He, our Rock, our Hope of eternal salvation,

Hail Him! hail Him! Jesus, the Crucified;

Loving Savior, meekly enduring sorrow,

Crowned with thorns that cruelly pierced His brow;

Once for us rejected, despised, and forsaken,

Prince of Glory, ever triumphant now.

  1. Praise Him! praise Him! Jesus, our blessed Redeemer,

Heavenly portals, loud with hosannahs ring!

Jesus, Savior, reigneth for ever and ever;

Crown Him! crown Him! Prophet and Priest and King!

Death is vanquished! Tell it with joy, ye faithful,

Where is now thy victory, boasting grave?

Jesus lives! No longer thy portals are cheerless;

Jesus lives, the mighty and strong to save.

164 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的荣耀)

一 从我一生，

主得荣耀，主得荣耀；

从我一生，

主今就得荣耀。

二 在教会中，

主得荣耀，主得荣耀；

在教会中，

主今就得荣耀。

164 4.8.4.6.

  1. In my life, Lord,

Be glorified, be glorified.

In my life, Lord,

Be glorified today.

  1. In Your church, Lord,

Be glorified, be glorified.

In Your church, Lord,

Be glorified today.

165 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的救赎)

一 神的羔羊，我敬拜你！

当我注视你荣面，

你脸闪耀明亮光辉，

全是父爱所彰显。

天地万物都见证你，

智慧、能力何无限，

并且证实你乃“我是”，

永远常在、不改变！

二 神的羔羊，父的爱子！

原本住在父怀里 ；

你是父的喜乐、满足，

同有父的恩与力；

竟然为了爱怜我们，

离开荣耀的天域，

作神羔羊，代人受死，

配得我们的拜礼。

三 神的羔羊，降生人世，

马槽起始历艰苦，

飘泊人间，被人轻视，

谁识你是创造主？

客西马尼，汗如血滴，

知否为谁向父哭？

奇恩临我，使我觉醒，

羔羊乃是救我主！

四 看你身悬十字苦架，

忿怒、咒诅，你担当！

人间罪恶、世上污秽，

审判都归你身上。

见你因爱所流宝血，

知我罪债已清偿。

惟你配得永远感戴，

颂赞、荣耀神羔羊！

五 神的羔羊，不久还要

荣耀归回这地上；

你的仇敌都要战兢，

抗拒你者都悲伤；

圣徒却要欢聚你前，

在你国里同为王；

且要永远赞美、歌唱，

曾被杀的神羔羊！

165 8.7.8.7.D.

  1. Lamb of God! our souls adore Thee,

While upon Thy face we gaze;

There the Father’s love and glory

Shine in all their brightest rays;

Thine Almighty pow’r and wisdom

All creation’s works proclaim;

Heav’n and earth alike confess Thee

As the ever great “I AM.”

  1. Lamb of God! Thy Father’s bosom

Ever was Thy dwelling place;

His delight, in Him rejoicing,

One with Him in pow’r and grace;

O what wondrus love and mercy!

Whou didst lay Thy glory by;

And for us didst come from heaven

As the Lamb of God to die.

  1. Lamb of God! When we behold Thee

Lowly in the manger laid,

Wand’ring as a homeless stranger

In the world Thy hands had made;

When we see Thee in the garden

In Thine agony of blood,

At Thy grace we are confounded,

Holy, spotless Lamb of God!

  1. When we see Thee, as the victim,

Bound to the accursed tree,

For our guilt and folly stricken,

All our judgment borne by Thee,

Lord, we own, with hearts adoring,

Thou hast loved us unto blood;

Glory, glory everlasting

Be to Thee, Thou Lamb of God.

  1. Lamb of God, Thou soon in glory

Wilt to this sad earth return;

All Thy foes shall quake before Thee,

All that now despise Thee mourn;

Then Thy saints all gathered to Thee,

With Thee in Thy kingdom reign;

Thine the praise and Thine the glory,

Lamb of God, for sinners slain!

166 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的配得)

一 哦来，欢欣敬拜祂；

哦来，欢欣敬拜祂；

哦来，欢欣敬拜祂——

基督我主。

二 永远赞美祂的名；

永远赞美祂的名；

永远赞美祂的名——

基督我主。

三 将荣耀全都归祂；

将荣耀全都归祂；

将荣耀全都归祂——

基督我主。

四 惟有祂配得荣耀；

惟有祂配得荣耀；

惟有祂配得荣耀——

基督我主。

166 7.7.7.3.

  1. O come, let us adore Him,

O come, let us adore Him,

O come, let us adore Him,

Christ the Lord.

  1. We’ll praise His name forever,

We’ll praise His name forever,

We’ll praise His name forever,

Christ the Lord.

  1. We’ll give Him all the glory,

We’ll give Him all the glory,

We’ll give Him all the glory,

Christ the Lord.

  1. For He alone is worthy,

For He alone is worthy,

For He alone is worthy,

Christ the lord.

167 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的救赎)

一 千万感谢归耶稣，

舍命赎价全付，

宝血为人而流出，

使世人归天父。

千万心将祂爱慕，

万有都来欢呼；

千万感谢归耶稣，

我们君王、救主。

和 千万感谢，千万感谢，

我们赞祂不绝；

我要一生与祂同偕，

并且赞美不歇。

二 千万颗心归耶稣，

我们甘心奉献；

千万条命归耶稣，

若我能活长远；

千万舌头都称祝，

千万颂赞高升，

归给可颂的救主，

我们最亲友朋。

三 千万感谢归耶稣，

时刻赐我祝福；

千千万万的歌赋，

献给爱我的主。

当祂荣耀里再显，

将要见祂荣脸，

祂爱丰满又无限，

配得永远颂赞。

167 7.6.7.6.D. with chorus

  1. Ten thousand thanks to Jesus,

Whose life our ransom paid,

Whose blood a full redemption

For all the world has made:

Let ev’ry heart adore Him;

Let ev’ry creature sing

Ten thousand thanks to Jesus,

Our Savior and our King.

Ten thousand thanks, then thousand thanks.

We’ll praise Him o’er and o’er,

And for the life with Him to live,

Ten thousand thousand more.

  1. Ten thousand hearts to Jesus

How gladly would we give;

Ten thousand lives to Jesus,

Had we so long to live;

Ten thousand tongues shall praise Him,

Ten thousand songs ascend

To Him, our blest Redeemer,

To Him, our dearest Friend.

  1. Ten thousand thanks to Jesus

For blessing ev’ry hour;

Ten thousand times ten thousand,

For love’s redeeming pow’r;

And when He comes in glory

His blessed face we’ll see,

His love thro’ endless ages

Our sweetest song shall be.

168 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的配得)

颂赞与尊贵与荣耀归你，

与荣耀归你，与荣耀归你。

颂赞与尊贵与荣耀归你，

从今直到永远。

赞祂！赞祂！圣徒都要拜祂！

赞祂！赞祂！从今直到永远。

阿利路亚！

颂赞与尊贵与荣耀归你，

与荣耀归你，与荣耀归你。

颂赞与尊贵与荣耀归你，

从今直到永远。

168 Irregular Meter

Blessing and honor and glory be Thine,

And glory be Thine, And glory be Thine.

Blessing and honor and glory be Thine,

Both now and evermore.

Praise Him! Praise Him! All ye saints adore Him.

Praise Him! Praise Him! Both now and evermore.

Hallelujah!

Blessing and honor and glory be Thine,

And glory be Thine, And glory be Thine.

Blessing and honor and glory be Thine,

Both now and evermore.

169 赞美和敬拜——圣子(祂的配得)

一 晨光掠天而过，

我心醒来喊说：

愿颂赞归耶稣！

不论工作、祷告，

我要向主倚靠：

愿颂赞归耶稣！

二 我爱逐渐加增，

向神前来事奉：

愿颂赞归耶稣！

这个喜乐诗歌，

永远不会闭塞：

愿颂赞归耶稣！

三 有时我有感喟，

在此我得安慰，

愿颂赞归耶稣！

有时快乐消逝，

我的安慰在此，

愿颂赞归耶稣！

四 恶念时扰我怀，

我有上好盾牌：

愿颂赞归耶稣！

黑暗权势怕听，

此一甜美歌声：

愿颂赞归耶稣！

五 有时不得安眠，

只须灵里吁叹：

愿颂赞归耶稣！

黑夜要变白昼，

当我衷心歌讴：

愿颂赞归耶稣！

六 只要一息尚存，

仍要如此歌吟：

愿颂赞归耶稣！

这是不朽诗章，

永世仍要颂扬：

愿颂赞归耶稣！

169 6.6.6.6.6.6.

  1. When morning gilds the skies,

My heart awaking cries:

May Jesus Christ be praised!

Alike at work and prayer

To Jesus I repair:

May Jesus Christ be praised!

  1. To Thee, my God above,

I cry with glowing love,

May Jesus Christ be praised!

The fairest graces spring

In hearts that ever sing,

May Jesus Christ be praised!

  1. Does sadness fill my mind?

A solace here I find,

May Jesus Christ be praised!

Or fades my earthly bliss?

My comfort still is this,

May Jesus Christ be praised!

  1. When evil thoughts molest,

With this I shield my breast,

May Jesus Christ be praised!

The powers of darkness fear,

When this sweet chant they hear,

May Jesus Christ be praised!

  1. When sleep her balm denies,

My silent spirit sighs,

May Jesus Christ be praised!

The night becomes as day,

When from the heart we say,

May Jesus Christ be praised!

  1. Be this, while life is mine,

My canticle divine,

May Jesus Christ be praised!

Be this th’eternal song

Through all the ages long,

May Jesus Christ be praised!

170 赞美和敬拜——圣子(在祂里面喜乐)

主，我爱你，我扬声赞美，

赞美你名。哦，我魂，欢欣！

愿我声音，在你耳里，

是一个甜美、甜美的声音。

170 Irregular Meter

I love You, Lord, and I lift my voice

To worship You, O my soul, rejoice.

Take joy, my King, in what You hear,

May it be a sweet, sweet sound in Your ear.

171 圣灵——保惠师

一 应当将此消息，

遍传有人之地；

只要有人有心，

只要有人饮泣；

信徒就当殷勤，

传此喜乐信息：

保惠师已经来！

和 保惠师已经来！

保惠师已经来！

照主应许之恩，

圣灵从天降临；

应当将此消息，

遍传有人之地，

保惠师已经来！

二 漫漫黑夜已过，

最终晨晓已破，

悲哭声音停止，

哀求声音不作，

远山现出金丝，

晨曦已在炳烁：

保惠师已经来！

三 请看万王之王，

带著医治之光，

来使属灵囚犯，

都得完全释放；

现今空虚牢监，

响彻凯歌声浪：

保惠师已经来！

四 无限神圣的爱！

我的拙口缺才，

向著流浪的人，

说你无比恩爱－

我怎是个罪身，

你竟肯来同在：

保惠师已经来！

171 12.12.12.6. with chorus

  1. Oh, spread the tidings ‘round,

wherever man is found,

Wherever human hearts

and human woes abound;

Let ev’ry Christian tongue

proclaim the joyful sound:

The Comforter has come!

The Comforter has come,

The Comforter has come!

The Holy Ghost from heav’n,

The Lord’s dear promise giv’n;

Oh, spread the tidings ‘round,

Wherever man is found—

The Comforter has come!

  1. The long, long night is past,

the morning breaks at last;

And hushed the dreadful

wail and fury of the blast,

As o’er the golden hills

the day advances fast!

The Comforter has come!

  1. Lo, the great King of kings,

with healing in His wings,

To every captive soul

a full deliv’rance brings;

And through the vacant cells

the song of triumph rings:

The Comforter has come!

  1. O boundless love divine!

how shall this tongue of mine

To wond’ring mortals tell

the matchless grace divine—

That I, a child of hell,

should in His image shine!

The Comforter has come!

172 圣灵——活水

一 在旷野加低斯，以色列百姓，

因干渴快要死，神就发命令：

吩咐磐石发出活水来！

击打勿再施，因早已裂开；

只要吩咐，活水就流开。

和 吩咐磐石发出活水来！

圣灵早已赐，早与你同在；

一切的丰富，等著你接受；

你若肯信服，必享祂所有。

二 那永久的磐石，今仍是裂开，

神圣灵的恩赐，要充溢你怀；

祂仍在说，挣扎果为何？

只向灵求索，立解你干渴；

只要吩咐，就涌流成河。

三 但愿心肯简单，完全的相信！

但愿心能平安，不再苦求寻！

如同婴孩，静卧主怀间，

向世界断奶，饱尝祂爱甜，

灵得安息，祝福真无限。

172 Irregular Meter

  1. Fainting in the desert, Israel’s thousands stand

At the rock of Kadesh. Hark! The Lord’s command,

Speak to the Rock, Bid the waters flow,

Strike not its bosom Opened long ago,

Speak to the Rock, ‘Till the waters flow.

Speak to the Rock, Bid the waters flow,

Doubt not the Spirit, Given long ago;

Take what He waiteth, Freely to bestow,

Drink till its fullness All Thy being know.

  1. Blessed Rock of Ages, Thou art open still;
    Blessed Holy Spirit, All our being fill;
    Still Thou dost say, Wherefore struggle so?
    Call for the Spirit, Whisper soft and low,
    Speak to the Rock Bid the waters flow.

  2. Oh, for trust more simple, Fully to believe;

Oh, for hearts more childlike, Freely to receive;

E’en as a babe, On its mother’s breast,

So on Thy bosom Let my spirit rest,

Filled with Thy life, With Thy blessing blest.

173 圣灵——保惠师

一 喜乐涌流有如河海，

自从主赐保惠师；

祂是永远与我同在，

祂以我心作居室。

和 有福的安静，圣洁的安静，

我心有确定把握；

海虽起波澜，祂在说平安，

我心不再有起落。

二 生命丰盛、康健、丰富，

自从主赐保惠师；

赶走疑惑，消灭愁苦，

使我疲倦全消逝。

三 有如甘霖从天而降，

有如日光从天照；

圣灵同样显出力量，

使我满受神恩膏。

四 现今果园已满果实，

其中所出惟公义；

生命水流涌流不滞，

在那荒漠孤苦地。

五 这是何等奇妙救拔，

我能时常见主面！

这是何等完全的家，

平静安息又甘甜。

173 8.7.8.7. with chorus

  1. Joys are flowing like a river,

Since the Comforter has come;

He abides with us forever,

Makes the trusting heart His home.

Blessed quietness, holy quietness—

What assurance in my soul!

On the stormy sea He speaks peace to me.

How the billows cease to roll!

  1. Bringing life and health and gladness

All around, this heavenly Guest

Banished unbelief and sadness,

Changed our weariness to rest.

  1. Like the rain that falls from heaven,

Like the sunlight from the sky,

So the Holy Ghost is given,

Coming to us from on high.

  1. See a fruitful field is growing

Blessed fruits of righteousness,

And the streams of life are flowing

In the lonely wilderness.

  1. What a wonderful salvation

Where we always see His face!

What a perfect habitation!

What a quiet resting place!

174 圣灵——活水

一 生命活水的江河，

流自天上的宝座，

满带祝福而流著，

从神基督流到我。

和 生命活水的江河，

人人可以白喝；

愿这活水通过我，

流到众人，解干渴。

二 活水明亮如水晶，

带著丰盛的供应，

渴者喝了得生命，

不需代价，不用银。

三 哦主，修理、洁净我，

使我成为你运河；

倒空、充满、使用我，

使我顺服无阻隔。

四 这时，也惟有这时，

水流才能无阻止；

如此，也惟有如此，

你的丰盛人才知。

五 今将一切全奉献，

全都带到主脚前；

凡事只有一心愿，

事奉我主到永远。

174 7.7.8.7. with chorus

  1. Rivers of living water,

Rivers that flow from the throne,

Rivers o’erflowing with blessing,

Coming from Jesus alone.

River of living water,

Rivers of life so free,

Flowing from Thee, my Savior,

Send now the rivers thro’ me.

  1. Whoso is thirsty come hither,

Here is abundant supply;
Water transparent as crystal,
Come without money and buy.

  1. Cleanse me, oh, cleanse me, my Savior,

Make me a channel today;

Empty me, fill me and use me,

Teach me to trust and obey.

  1. Then, and then only, Lord Jesus,

Thro’ me the rivers can flow;

Thus and thus only will others

Learn Thy great fullness to know.

  1. Now I surrender to Jesus,

Here I lay all at His feet;

Anything, anywhere only,

Just for His service made meet!

175 圣灵——活水

一 有一生命江河——从我里涌流，

叫瞎眼的看见、叫瘸子行走；

打开监狱的门——释放被囚。

有一生命江河——从我里涌流。

和 我的井阿！在我里面！

涌上水来！使我痊愈；

我的井阿！涌上水来！

生命丰满有余。

二 有一泉源流自救主的肋旁，

这宝血洗净我，从罪得释放；

耶稣付赎价——祂为我而亡。

有一泉源流自救主的肋旁。

三 有一复活救主在父宝座前，

不断为祂的人代求父赦免；

倾倒祂祝福并丰富恩典。

有一复活救主在父宝座前。

四 有一位保惠师，祂来自天上，

赐下祂的一切荣耀的恩赏；

除去我帕子，启示主荣光。

有一位保惠师，祂来自天上。

五 有一安息之地今我能进入，

不再劳苦、不再受撒但欺侮；

只须每时刻安息于我主。

有一安息之地我今能进入。

六 有一完全救恩为著你和我，

藉信以致于信，荣耀且丰博；

哦，献上我命为主而生活，

有一完全救恩为著你和我。

175 Irregular Meter

  1. There’s a river of life flowing out thru me,

It makes the lame to walk and the blind to see;

Opens prison doors, sets the captives free,

There’s a river of life flowing out thru me.

Spring up, O well, within my soul,

Spring up, O well, and make me whole;

Spring up , O well, and give to me

That life abundantly.

  1. There’s a fountain flowing from the Savior’s side,

All my sin’s forgiven in that precious tide;

Jesus paid the price. When for me He died,

There’s a fountain flowing from the Savior’s side.

  1. There’s a risen Savior at the Father’s throne,

Ever interceding for His very own;

Pouring down the blessings that are His alone,

There’s a risen Savior at the Father’s throne.

  1. There’s a holy Comforter who’s sent from heaven,

All the glorious gifts are His, and have been given.

He’ll show us more of Jesus ‘til the veil is riven.

There’s a holy Comforter who’s sent from heaven.

  1. There’s a land of rest that we may enter now,

Freed from all our works and freed from Satan’s power,

Just resting in the Lord each moment and each hour.

There’s a land of rest that we may enter now.

  1. There’s a full salvation wrought for you and me,

From faith to faith and glory to glory eternally,

O Lord, just take this life and let me live for thee,

There’s a full salvation wrought for you and me.

176 圣灵——气和风

一 主，求你向我吹圣灵，

教我如何吸入你；

助我向你胸怀一倾

我的犯罪与自己。

和 我是呼出我的愁苦，

呼出我罪污；

我是吸入，一直吸入，

你所有丰富。

二 我是呼出我的生命，

我才可能被充满；

放弃软弱或是力劲，

吸入怜悯和恩湛。

三 呼出我的罪律桎梏，

你已为我全除摒；

吸入你的圣洁丰富，

发现惟你是生命。

四 我正呼出我的忧愁

在你慈爱的胸臆；

吸入你的喜乐、保守，

吸入你的甜安息。

五 我正呼出我的病势，

你早已为我负担；

我正吸入你的医治，

因你早已赐平安。

六 我今呼出我的羡慕，

入你慈爱的耳中；

我今吸入你的答复，

平静疑惑和惊恐。

七 我今每刻都在呼吸

你的生命作生命；

一呼一吸都在乎你，

求你由我来显明。

176 8.7.8.7. with chorus

  1. O Lord, breathe Thy Spirit on me,

Teach me how to breathe Thee in;

Help me pour into Thy bosom

All my life of self and sin.

I am breathing out my sorrow,

Breathing out my sin;

I am breathing, breathing, breathing,

All Thy fullness in.

  1. I am breathing out my own life,

That I may be filled with Thine;
Letting go my strength and weakness,
Breathing in Thy life divine.

  1. Breathing out my sinful nature,

Thou hast borne it all for me;
Breathing in Thy cleansing fullness,
Finding all my life in Thee.

  1. I am breathing out my sorrow,
    On Thy kind and gentle breast;
    Breathing in Thy joy and comfort,
    Breathing in Thy peace and rest.

  2. I am breathing out my sickness,

Thou hast borne its burden too;

I am breathing in Thy healing,

Ever promised, ever new.

  1. I am breathing out my longings

In Thy listening, loving ear;

I am breathing in Thy answers,

Stilling every doubt and fear.

  1. I am breathing every moment,

Drawing all my life from Thee;

Breath by breath I live upon Thee,

Lord, Thy Spirit breathe in me.

177 圣灵——降雨

一 从蒙爱的子民院庭，

向你发出赞颂；

脱离撒但权势圣众，

阿利路亚声隆。

求你圣灵感动我心，

欢然唱诗咏吟；

洗净我罪、将我嘴唇

用你圣火洁净。

二 神阿，赞美你的作为，

并你应许恩惠；

信心之眼所见云堆，

灵恩降如雨沛。

主，我赞美你的道路，

我们虽未领悟，

但你计划一旦展露，

知你带领无误。

三 求主扩大我们度量，

运河挖掘深广，

好叫你的祝福流畅，

照你应许奖赏。

求主垂听我们呼吁，

正当赞美、感谢，

打开天门，降下能力，

使经历五旬节。

177 8.6.8.6.D.

  1. Praise waiteth Thee in Zion’s Courts,

Where Thy beloved dwell;

Ransomed, redeemed from Satan’s thrall,

Their Hallelujahs swell.

Come, blessed Holy Ghost, today,

Our songs of praise inspire;

Purge the iniquity, and touch

Our lips with living fire.

  1. Praise for what Thou our God hast wrought;

For promised blessings ours;

The cloud on faith’s horizon seen,

The pentecostal showers.

Praise for Thine own right way, dear Lord,

We did not understand,

But as Thy plans unfolded lie,

We see Thy guiding hand.

  1. Enlarge our soul’s capacity,

Cut deeper channels, Lord;

Room for the floods of blessing now,

According to Thy Word.

E’en while we praise, the heavens rend,

In power come from on high;

Make this another Pentecost,

Answer our spirit’s cry.

178 圣灵——火

一 神赐祂的能力

在我穷苦心内，

时刻保守提挈，

灌以必需恩惠，

藉灵住我里面，

掌管我的全人，

用爱发出火燄，

在我心内直焚。

和 焚烧在我心内，

焚烧在我心内；

爱燄自天倾下，

焚烧在我心内！

圣灵已来保惠，

主名应当赞美，

爱燄自天倾下，

焚烧在我心内！

二 我在架下低头，

我在坛上奉献，

此生一切所有，

都呈我主脚前；

祂为我付赎价，

祂召我得安息，

祂使天火降下，

悦纳我的活祭。

三 我无任何功行，

惟有神的应许；

我藉爱子受刑，

蒙恩作神儿女。

荣耀归于我神，

阿利路亚，阿们；

这爱激励至深，

如火内心在焚。

178 6.6.6.6.D. with chorus

  1. God sent His mighty pow’r

To this poor, sinful heart,

To keep me every hour,

And needful grace impart;

And since His Spirit came,

To take supreme control,

The love-enkindled flame

Is burning in my soul.

’Tis burning in my soul,

’Tis burning in my soul;

The fire of heav’nly love is

burning in my soul;

The Holy Spirit came,

All glory to His name!

The fire of heav’nly love is

burning in my soul.

  1. Before the cross I bow,

Upon the altar lay

A willing off’ring now,

My all from day to day.

My Savior paid the price,

My name He sweetly calls;

Upon the sacrifice

The fire from heaven falls.

  1. No good that I have done,

His promise I embrace;

Accepted in the Son,

He saves me by His grace.

All glory be to God!

Let hallelujahs roll;

His love is shed abroad,

The fire is in my soul.

179 圣灵——住我里面

一 如今三一神已住在我里面，

祂是奇妙之灵在我里。

我已与主调和联成为一灵，

祂是生命之灵在我里。

和 哦，祂是奇妙之灵住我里，

祂是奇妙之灵住我里。

如今神在子里，子就是那灵——

祂是奇妙之灵住我里。

二 “阿爸，父！”我今从深处呼喊你，

喊自奇妙之灵在我里；

也就是子之灵向父神呼喊，

祂是生命之灵在我里。

三 如今主耶稣基督住在我里，

祂是奇妙之灵住我里；

祂已死而复活，我今领受祂，

祂是生命之灵在我里。

四 如今那实际之灵已经来到，

祂是奇妙之灵住我里；

今基督的一切，亲切又实际，

藉著生命之灵住我里。

五 我愿常挑旺这深处的恩赐，

这是奇妙之灵住我里；

呼叫：“主耶稣！”，这使我灵跳跃，

因著生命之灵在我里。

179 11.9.11.9. with chorus

  1. Now the Triune God has come to dwell within

As the wonderful Spirit in us.

We are mingled with the Lord, we’re one with Him

As the life-giving Spirit in us.

Oh, He’s the wonderful Spirit in us,

He’s the wonderful Spirit in us!

God is in the Son, the Son’s the Spirit now—

He’s the wonderful Spirit in us!

  1. ""Abba Father” is the cry from deep within

From the wonderful Spirit in us.

’Tis the Spirit of the Son who cries to Him

As the life-giving Spirit in us.

  1. Jesus Christ the Lord is living now in us

As the wonderful Spirit within.

He has been transfigured, we enjoy Him thus,

As the life-giving Spirit within.

  1. Now the Spirit of reality is here

As the wonderful Spirit within.

Now the things of Christ are all so real and clear

By the life-giving Spirit within.

  1. We will all stir up this gift that’s deep within

As the wonderful Spirit in us.

When we call “Lord Jesus” how our spirits spring

With this life-giving Spirit in us!

180 圣灵——重新临我

活神的圣灵，

今日再临到我！

活神的圣灵，

今日再临到我！

擘我、镕我、

模我、满我，

活神的圣灵，

今日再临到我！

180 11.11.8.11

.

Spirit of the Living God,

Fall afresh on me.

Spirit of the Living God,

Fall fresh on me.

Melt me, mold me,

Fill me, use me.

Spirit of the Living God,

Fall fresh on me.

181 圣灵——充满我

一 让神儿子以祂圣灵

和祂大爱来围绕你，

充满你的一生，使你心欢喜。

让祂担负你一切挂虑，

祂灵如鸽临到你，

使你一生完全而活在主里。

和 耶稣，哦，耶稣，

充满你小羊。

耶稣，哦，耶稣，

充满你小羊。

二 哦来，欢乐唱此诗歌，

好让你心快乐欢腾，

举起双手甘愿顺服祂的名。

将你痛苦岁月交给祂，

让祂安抚你悲情，

好使你靠祂的名进入生命。

(再唱和诗)

181 16.11.16.11. with chorus

  1. O let the Son of God enfold you

with His Spirit and His love,

Let Him fill your life and satisfy your soul.

O let Him have the things that hold you

and His Spirit, like a dove

Will descend upon your life and make you whole.

Jesus, O Jesus,

Come and fill your lambs.

Jesus, O Jesus,

Come and fill your lambs.

  1. O come and sing this song with gladness

as your hearts are filled with joy,

Lift your hands in sweet surrender to His name.

O give Him all your tears and sadness,

give Him all your years of pain

And you’ll enter into life in Jesus’ name.

(Repeat Chorus)

182 圣灵——充满我

一 何等荣耀，何等福气，

真理圣灵在我心，

见证救主，启示真理，

光照、安慰并指引。

和 充满我！充满我！

愿主圣灵充满我；

将我倒空，将我剥夺，

愿主圣灵充满我。

二 愿主所说在我证实，

生命圣灵将我释，

使我脱离罪律辖制，

脱离死亡的权势。

三 我如困鹿切慕溪水，

深愿圣灵解我渴，

使我尝到丰满滋味，

流出活水的江河。

四 愿我自己被置死地，

使我充满主圣灵；

愿我全人归主管理，

使我变成主荣形。

182 8.7.8.7. with chorus

  1. What a glory! What a blessing!

Now the Spirit dwells in me;

Testifying, truth revealing,

Shining, leading constantly.

Fill me, Lord! Fill me, Lord!

Fill me with Thy Spirit now;

Make me empty, strip me thoroughly,

Fill me with Thy Spirit now!

  1. Word of promise, real within me,

Life divine now freeing me

From sin’s cruel control releasing,

From death’s power setting free.

  1. Deepest springs of life desiring,

Like the hart I thirst for Thee;

May I drink, Lord, of Thy fullness

Till Thy river flows through me.

  1. May my self be put to death, Lord,

Till I’m fully filled by Thee;

Transformed to Thy glorious image,

I’d forever flow out Thee.

183 圣灵——膏我

一 赞美我神，祂把我们

坚固联结于基督，

并且用膏膏了我们，

使我们有分于主。

二 今在基督和恩膏里，

我们成了受膏者。

哦，这何等大的福气，

恩膏将我们联合。

三 阿利路亚，因著受膏，

神的性情临到我；

今在我里内住、引导，

凡事都来教导我。

四 我们是主恩爱标本，

祂用己血买我们。

神的印记已刻我身，

标出我们是为神。

五 我们天天被主印刻，

时时有分祂形像。

祂的自己，将我铭刻，

使我显出祂模样。

六 我们今有保证、豫尝，

不久即将面见主。

我们渴望将祂饱享，

享受活神到永古。

七 为这目的，神来作工，

赐给我们这凭质，

担保神必成全我们，

完满有分祂所是。

八 恩膏、印记、以及保证，

三样都在我灵里。

如此奇妙、有福贮存，

都已赐给我和你。

183 8.7.8.7.

  1. Praise the Lord, who firmly joined us

Unto the Anointed One.

Thus we all have been anointed

With th’anointing of the Son.

  1. Now in Christ, in the anointing,
    We are the anointed ones.
    Oh, how blessed is this ointment
    Poured upon the many sons!

  2. Hallelujah, the anointing
    Unto us God’s essence brings;
    It is now abiding in us,
    And it teaches us all things.

  3. We’re the Lord’s peculiar treasure,

Purchased by His precious blood.

He has put His seal upon us,

We are those marked out by God.

  1. Day by day we’re under sealing,

That we may His likeness share.

By the impress of His Person

We will Jesus’ image bear.

  1. Now we have the pledge, the foretaste,

Of the Christ we soon will see.

We are longing for the full taste

God, our feast eternally.

  1. God has wrought us for this purpose,

Giving us the earnest here,

Guarantee of full enjoyment

Of our Lord Himself, so dear.

  1. The anointing, seal, and earnest

In our spirit are all three.

Such a wondrous, blest deposit

God has given you and me.

184 圣灵——印我

一 神的圣灵乃是印记，

就是豫尝、凭质、担保；

指定我们属神自己，

保证基业给我得到。

二 只要我们相信基督，

听见福音真理的话，

圣灵便将我们标出，

指明我们今后属祂。

三 圣灵乃是活的印记，

分赐我们神的形像，

将它刻在我们心里，

就得模成爱子模样。

四 圣灵又是一个凭质，

做为我们担保、豫尝。

见证我们是神众子，

神的基业我们得享。

五 藉著这灵，神将自己，

扩展到我心思、情、意；

里面各部，受此印记，

祂就充满全人内里。

六 哦主，我们愿意和你

灵的运行配合、工作；

为著达成永远旨意，

好使我们成你杰作。

184 8.8.8.8.

  1. The Holy Spirit is the seal,

The foretaste, earnest, and the pledge.

He designates us as God’s own

And guarantees our heritage.

  1. ’Twas after we believed in Christ,
    The word of truth, the gospel, heard,

The Holy Spirit us did seal
To show that we belong to God.

  1. This Spirit as the living seal,

To us God’s image now imparts;

Conforming us unto the Son,

He stamps His image in our hearts.

  1. This Spirit also is the pledge,

Our earnest and our foretaste true.

He witnesses that we are sons,

With God’s inheritance in view.

  1. ’Tis by this Spirit God does spread

Into our mind, emotion, will;

By sealing every inward part,

He will our very being fill.

  1. Oh Lord, we would cooperate
    With all Thy Spirit’s inward move;
    That we become Thy masterpiece,
    Th’eternal purpose thus to prove.

185 圣灵——充满我

一 求主宝血洁净我，

洗净所有罪过，

将你圣洁的膏油，

重新为我涂抹。

我认我事奉、生活，

真是失败、软弱，

我望充满你的灵，

完全为你而活。

和 哦，求主救我脱离

这个可怜的自己！

求主使我从今后，

完全充满了你。

二 我心何等的干旱，

常为软弱悲叹；

我是何等的盼望，

能被圣灵充满。

求主让我今隐藏

在你击伤石磐；

求主今听我呼求，

让你活水泛滥。

三 我心何等的冷淡，

顺服何等迟慢；

愿主圣灵充满我，

使我不再背叛。

我今躺卧在祭坛，

不敢稍为动弹，

求主烈火从天降，

把我所有烧干。

四 求主十架在我身，

天天作工更深，

把我度量扩充大，

使我化为灰尘；

好叫圣灵充满我，

天天比前更多，

你的活水到处流，

解除众人干渴。

185 7.6.7.6.D. with chorus

  1. Lord, may Thy blood now cleanse me,

Wash all my sins away,

That with Thy Holy Spirit

Thou may anoint, I pary.

My service, I confess, Lord,

Is falilure-full and weak;

The filling of Thy Spirit

To live for Thee I seek.

Oh, from myself deliver,

From all its misery;

I’d henceforth be forever

Completely filled with Thee.

  1. Oh, Lord, how dry my heart is,
    It yearns and pants for Thee;
    The filling of Thy Spirit
    Is now my fervent plea.
    Within the smitten Rock, Lord,
    I would entirely hide;
    Pour thru Thy living water,
    Till I am satisfied.

  2. How cold my heart has been, Lord,

How slow obeying Thee;

So fill me with Thy Spirit,

I’ll ne’er rebellious be.

I lie upon Thy altar

And dare not move away;

Oh, may Thy flame descending

Consume my all, I pray.

  1. Oh, may Thy Cross within me

Deepen its work and burn,

In me enlarge Thy measure.

And me to ashes turn.

Oh, may Thy Spirit fill me

Each day more than before,

And may Thy living water

On me and thru me pour.

186 圣灵——七灵

一 看哪，时代已转移，

随主转入圣灵里，

神宝座前的七灵，

在众教会中运行。

和 哦，神七灵，我恳求，

愿你工作得成就！

将我鉴察并焚烧，

为著教会的建造，

鉴察，焚烧，

为著教会的建造。

二 圣灵今又是七灵，

应付教会的光景，

圣徒转回得苏醒，

使主教会得复兴。

三 现今我们神的灵，

成为教会的供应，

若是我们祷告勤，

祂赐丰富无穷尽！

四 神的七灵是七灯，

七盏烧著的火灯，

不单是为著教导，

也是为将我焚烧。

五 看哪！现在神七灵，

如同七眼火照明，

洁净教会每角落，

肉体、情欲皆暴露。

六 主今赐下祂七灵，

带著丰盛的生命，

今在主的教会里，

供我享受并经历。

186 7.7.7.7. with chorus

  1. “Seven Spirits” of our God—

See, the age has now been turned

To the Spirit with the Son.

For the churches He’s concerned.

Come, O seven Spirits, come

Thy recovery work be done!

Burn and search us thoroughly,

All the churches are for Thee.

Burn us, search us,

All the churches are for Thee!

  1. Sevenfold the Spirit is

For the deadness of the church,

That the saints may turn and live,

That the Lord may burn and search.

  1. Now the Spirit of our God

Has become intensified:

’Tis not one but sevenfold

That the church may be supplied!

  1. Now the seven Spirits are

Seven lamps of burning fire,

Not to teach us, but to burn,

Satisfying God’s desire.

  1. See the seven Spirits now

Seven piercing, searching eyes.

In the church exposing us,

All the church He purifies.

  1. Seven Spirits doth the Lord

For the churches now employ;

All the churches of the Lord

May this Spirit now enjoy.

187 圣灵——气和风

一 生命之气，来扫荡我们，

用你灵力复兴教会；

生命之气，来更新我们，

使你教会与你相配。

二 神的大风，来折服我们，

直到我们谦卑、顺服；

继以柔和来再造我们，

祈使我们完全复苏。

三 爱的气息，来吹进我们，

更新我们心思、情、意；

基督之爱，来复新我们，

复兴教会每一肢体。

四 主的心肠，曾为我破碎，

是我力量、安息之源；

今成安慰，若我心痛悔，

愿你教会多蒙恩眷。

五 复兴我们！使热心不颓，

众多庄稼今已成熟。

复兴我们！装备你教会，

明光照耀，使成祝福。

187 9.8.9.8.

  1. O Breath of Life, come sweeping through us,

Revive Thy Church with life and power;

O Breath of Life, come, cleanse, renew us,

And fit Thy Church to meet this hour.

  1. O Wind of God, come bend us, break us,

Till humbly we confess our need;

Then in Thy tenderness remake us,

Revive, restore, for this we plead.

  1. O Breath of Love, come breathe within us,

Renewing thought and will and heart;

Come, Love of Christ, afresh to win us,

Revive Thy Church in every part.

  1. O Heart of Christ, once broken for us,

’Tis there we find our strength and rest;

Our broken, contrite hearts now solace,

And let Thy waiting Church be blest.

  1. Revive us, Lord! Is zeal abating,

While harvest fields are vast and white?

Revive us, Lord, the world is waiting,

Equip Thy Church to spread the light.

188 圣灵——灵与教会

一 出于圣灵，生于圣灵，

耶稣原本出于此。

充满那灵，属于那灵，

这个乃是祂素质。

在那灵里，随著那灵，

耶稣来成为那灵。

现今我主乃是那灵，

我们与祂成一灵。

二 我们受浸归于圣灵，

乃是被浸入灵里。

教会一切由灵而生，

活水涌流不止息。

在那灵里，在那灵里，

这是我们的需要。

现今教会须在灵里，

不在教训与规条。

三 我们同享灵的交通，

我们有分于这灵。

不论姊妹，或是弟兄，

都该只顾及这灵。

这灵在教会中发命，

凡有耳的都要听。

为著教会，七灵行动，

带来有福的供应。

四 灵与新妇一同说：“来，

取这生命的水喝。”

教会与灵同声传开，

完全合一无间隔。

凡事跟随那灵引领，

我们就成祂新妇。

在教会中只凭那灵，

这是主所要恢复。

188 8.7.8.7. D.

  1. Of the Spirit, born of Spirit—

This the source of Jesusis;

Filled with Spirit, all of Spirit—

This the essence truly His.

In the Spirit, with the Spirit,

As the Spirit Jesus came;

Now the Lord is just that Spirit

And in spirit we’re the same.

  1. Baptized in the Holy Spirit,

In the Spirit we’re immersed;

All the church is born of Spirit,

Living water has outburst.

In the Spirit, in the Spirit

Brothers, this is all we need.

Now the church must be in Spirit,

Not in teaching, form, or creed.

  1. The communion of the Spirit

Is the fellowship we share;

All the brothers, all the sisters

Only for the Spirit care.

Now the Spirit in the churches

Speaks to those who have an ear.

Seven Spirits for the churches

Are our blessed portion here.

  1. “Come and drink the living water,”

Say the Spirit and the Bride—

Church and Spirit speak together,

Utterly identified.

Just according to the Spirit

Must be our reality;

Just the Spirit in the churches

Is the Lord’s recovery.

189 圣灵——活水

以西结书第47章

一 我们来，我们来，到神殿里来；

我们来，因神殿有水流出来。

这水流，在殿右，昼夜涌流著，

滋润我们，结出生命的美果。

二 从这殿，从这殿，涌出这水流，

从这殿到全地，生命在涌流，

愿这水流加深，主，听我们求，

我们就必被你量过并占有。

三 量我们，量我们，天天量又量，

量我们，量更多，一直量又量，

直等到我们见水流成江河，

流通全地，使人全被主点活。

四 领我们，领我们，从水流经过，

领我们从水流，经过再经过，

水流涨，不可 ，成可洑的水，

我们被浸透，永远享神恩惠。

五 都必活，都必活，一切都必活，

都必活，真正活，百物随流活，

愿这水流带来丰盛的生命，

使教会在荒漠地一一显明。

189 11.11.11.11.

  1. We have come, we have come to the house of God;

We have come to the house, whence out flows the flood.

On the right, day and night, constant is its flow,

Watering us and causing fruits of life to grow.

  1. From the house, from the house flows this living stream,

From the house, to the earth, with the life supreme.

Yet more deep, Lord, we seek that the flow may be;

Thus we must be measured and possessed by Thee.

  1. Measure us, measure us, measure every day;

Measure us, measure more, measure all the way,

Till we know that the flow is a mighty flood,

Sweeping over all the earth for Christ the Lord.

  1. Take us through, take us through, take us through the flow;

Take us through, through and through, everywhere we go.

Flow increase, never cease, till we swim in Thee,

Till we are immersed in God eternally.

  1. All shall live, all shall live where the river comes;

All shall live, really live, everywhere it runs.

Let the fount from this mount life abundant bring,

Till the deserts of the earth with churches spring!

190 圣灵——主是那灵

一 主，当无人认识父时，

父在你里藉你来地，

好叫我们虽然无知，

如要识父只要识你。

二 但是，当你在世时候，

识你的人何等的少！

与你好像间隔很厚，

虽在挤你，摸你不到。

三 你今却在灵里再来，

有如当初父在你里，

我要识父是看父怀，

我要识你在于灵力。

四 你今不是披前肉体，

四处奔波劳碌不息，

你今乃是住我灵里，

时刻用灵供应自己。

五 曾有一次你就是父，

现今的你就是圣灵，

祂是你的另一态度，

祂是你的第二情形。

六 我今因为认识圣灵，

我就认识你的荣耀、

你的性情和你生命，

认识你的本质奇妙。

七 赞美你名，我们的心

认识你是何等实在；

没有亲的比你可亲，

没有爱的比你可爱。

190 8.8.8.8.

  1. Lord, when the Father ne’er was known,

The Father came through Thee below,

That we who lived in ignorance

Might through Thyself the Father know.

  1. But, Lord, when Thou wast here on earth,

How scarce were those Thyself who knew;

A veil there was twixt Thee and them;

The crowded ‘round, but saw not through.

  1. Now as the Spirit Thou hast come

E’en as the Father came in Thee;

As we through Thee the Father know,

Now through the Spirit we know Thee.

  1. Not with the flesh Thou now art clothed—

Then must Thou walk with toil around;

But as the Spirit in our heart

Thou dost supply Thyself unbound.

  1. Thou, Lord, the Father once wast called,

But now the Holy Spirit art;

The Spirit is Thine other form,

Thyself to dwell within our heart.

  1. By knowing Thee as Spirit, Lord,

We realize Thy life’s outflow,

Thy glory and Thy character,

And all Thy being’s wonders know.

  1. Praise to Thy Name now floods our heart;

There is no one as dear as Thee;

For since we know how real Thou art,

No other one could lovelier be.

191 圣灵——主是那灵

一 主，你所有一切工作，

并非到了十架为止；

你今乃是仍旧生活，

从你另一形态表示。

二 你今仍旧施行拯救，

仍旧说话，仍旧引导；

你与圣灵已成一流，

仍旧光照，使人仆倒。

三 藉祂，你不停止能力，

藉祂，你不停止运行；

你的感动、你的鼓励；

你仍安慰，你仍命令。

四 因为你已成为那灵，

祂来就是你又来地，

祂的内住是你充盈，

祂代表你，祂又是你。

五 祂今在我的心执行

你的一切命令、希冀 ；

有如从前你在世境，

执行父的所有旨意。

六 我们识祂就是识你，

服祂就是服你旨意；

我们被祂渗透、洋溢，

就是充满你的自己。

七 你今不是远在高天，

不是一去就不复返，

乃是仍旧在这世间，

奇哉！并住在我心坎。

191 8.8.8.8.

  1. In all thy work, O Lord, Thou didst

At Calv’ry’s cross once come to rest;

Yet Thou art working still today,

But in another form expressed.

  1. Thy saving pow’r Thou still dost show;

Thou still dost speak, enlighten, guide;

Thou and the Spirit in one stream

Sweep many in Thy living tide.

  1. Through Him Thy power’s not witheld;

Through Him Thy working does not cease;

Thou still dost comfort and command,

Encourage, strengthen, and release.

  1. Since Thou art with the Spirit one

His coming means that Thou hast come,

And His indwelling is Thine own,

Since Thou the Spirit hast become.

  1. He executes within my heart

All Thy desires and Thy demands,

As for the Father here on earth

Thou hast performed all His commands.

  1. By knowing Him we know Thyself;

Obeying Him we Thee obey;

Allowing Him ourselves to fill,

We’re filled with Thee, O wondrous way!

  1. Thou art not far away in heav’n,

Leaving us here alone, apart;

But Thou art still on earth; how grand!

Thou livest right within my heart.

192 圣灵——主是那灵

一 当你住在肉身生命，

知我识你至不深刻，

你就定规住在圣灵，

要住我灵启示明白。

二 从前你是我救赎主，

现今你是我保惠师，

不再是那外面接触，

乃是里面合一不弛。

三 我今因你所成圣灵，

住在灵里不断启示

你的自己、你的性情，

觉你同在，感你真实。

四 我能认识你的生命，

远超当日门徒经历；

虽然他们与你同行、

同食、同住、同劳、同息。

五 哦主，因著内住圣灵，

你是何等实在、实在！

不摸，比摸更为可凭；

不见，但已心中深爱。

六 圣灵现今是从衷里，

时刻将你供应给我，

作我救赎、圣洁、公义，

作我智慧和我结果。

七 因你的灵，住我灵里，

将你供应，与我合一，

时时刻刻是我自己，

时时刻刻也都是你。

192 8.8.8.8.

  1. Lord, Thou didst know when in the flesh,

As such I’d know Thee shallowly;

Then as the Spirit Thou didst come

Within my spirit, known to be.

  1. In flesh Redeemer mine Thou art;

As Spirit now my Comforter.

The outward touch has passed away

For inward union worthier.

  1. Because Thou art the Spirit now,

Thyself revealing ceaselessly,

Within my spirit I may know

Thy presence and reality.

  1. I know Thy life surpassing far

The knowledge Thy disciples had,

Although they walked and lived with Thee,

When Thou on earth in flesh wast clad.

  1. Because Thy Spirit dwells within,

How real, O Lord, Thou art to me;

Not touched, yet more reliable,

Not seen, yet loved more fervently.

  1. Thy Holy Spirit deep within

Supplies Thyself as righteousness,

As holiness, redemption full,

As wisdom and as fruitfulness.

  1. Thy Spirit in my spirit now

Supplies Thyself, unites with me,

Thus I am all the time myself

And constantly am also Thee.

193 圣灵——主是那灵

一 哦，主耶稣，当你在地，

他们与你多年同处；

但是他们对你自己，

似识不识，似悟不悟。

二 他们听过你的声音，

他们见过你的丰姿，

他们挤过你的肉身，

但你是谁，似知不知。

三 我们好像盖重幔子，

仿佛知道，又不透明，

说不认识，早已认识，

说已认识，认识不清。

四 但你今日已在灵里，

成为另一位保惠师，

并且住在我的心里，

将你自己向我启示。

五 但愿你用圣灵充满

在我全人每一角落，

没有一处不受你感，

没有一处不被你摸。

六 求你自己藉灵显现，

加倍实在，在我心怀；

无耳所听，无目所见，

无手所摸，如此实在。

七 当你怜悯，肯来启示，

将你自己给了我们，

世上有谁比你更实？

世上有何比你更真？

八 求你用灵从我的灵，

如同洪水漫溢全人：

到处荣耀，到处光明，

到处是你，到处是神。

九 这个生活何等亲近！

你已使我在地若天：

赞美满口，喜乐满心，

同在满魂，一切甘甜。

193 8.8.8.8.

  1. Oh, Jesus, Lord, when Thou on earth

Accompanied Thy faithful band,

It seemed they knew, but knew Thee not,

Thyself they did not understand.

  1. They heart Thy voice, beheld Thy form,

Thy beauteous stature unforgot;

They crowded ‘round Thee, met Thy gaze,

But who Thou art, they knew it not.

  1. As they of old we too are veiled;

We’ve known Thee long apparently;

Yet if we say we know, at best

We know Thee not transparently.

  1. But as the Spirit now Thou art,

Another Comforter become;

Reveal Thyself within my heart,

Since to Thy temple Thou hast come.

  1. With Thy blest Spirit, Lord, fill me,

Fill every corner of my soul;

May Thou inspire my every part,

Oh may Thou touch, renew the whole.

  1. The Spirit then revealing make

Thyself more real within my heart,

That ear not hear, nor eye may see

How very real to me Thou art.

  1. When Thou in mercy dost reveal

And give Thyself as Spirit thus,

What in the world can be more real,

More true than what Thou art to us?

  1. Thy Spirit, Lord, in mine, I pray,

O’erflow my being as a flood,

That every part with glory shine

And everywhere be Thee and God.

  1. How close we are in such a life,

In one is blended earth with heav’n;

Thy presence sweetly fills our souls;

Our hearts are to Thy praises giv’n.

194 神的话——爱慕神的话

一 我们喜爱这圣经——

神的宝贵话语；

主的丰富与丰盛，在这话里蕴藏。

带著恩典的供应，产生属天能力；

它所传输的生命，将我释放。

和 话语！话语！我们爱神话语。

生命、亮光、和主自己，藉它充满我心。

话语！话语！喜乐从它吸取！

丰富宝藏，我们掘取，永远取用不尽。

二 每晨亲近这圣经，

这是我们最爱；

曙曦蒙眬尚未明，话中之光照亮。

启示基督的丰盈，好将祂活出来；

揭开新鲜的供应，作我力量。

和 话语！话语！我们领受话语。

它来运行、浸透、变化，使我完全像祂。

话语！话语！哦，让我们吸取！

属天丰富，全都包括，供应我需无差。

三 哦主，我们真喜爱

在主话上用功，

且一同追求不息，更多亮光显明。

它的奥秘如深海，我愿追寻不停，

它使智慧得开启，凡事引领。

和 话语！话语！内中金脉藏蓄，

我们在此经营劳力，丰富无法言喻。

话语！话语！哦，来探查宝域，

好让我们在此学习，辨明神圣奥秘。

四 话语为著主身体——

使众圣徒得见

祂的丰富之洋溢，并祂经营无限。

与众圣一同得悉，

长阔高深无边。

我们齐心来努力，追求不厌。

和 话语！话语！祂对教会发言，

用话变化、妆饰、洗濯，

祂所寻得新妇。

话语！话语！众圣与神相连，

圣灵、新妇，同心喊说：“愿你快来，我主！”

194 Irregular Meter

  1. We’ve come to love the Bible,

the precious Word of God;

It fills us with the riches and fullness of the Lord.

The grace it is infusing yields holy energy,

And life to us transfusing, it sets us free.

The Word! The Word! We love the Word of God.

Its life and light is our delight, it fills us with the Lord.

The Word! The Word, the key to all our joy!

Its jewels fine we love to mine, its riches to employ.

  1. The Bible every morning

is our supreme delight,

And ere the day is dawning, we’re here receiving light.

It ever is revealing a Christ for us to live,

And fresh supply unsealing, the power does give.

The Word! The Word! We love to take it in.

It operates and saturates, conforming us to Him.

The Word! The Word! Oh, let us on it feed!

Its rich supply He’ll then apply to meet our every need.

  1. Oh, how we love to labor

upon this precious Word,

And laboring together, more light it does afford.

We love its depths to fathom, its mysteries to know,

And in its matchless wisdom to daily grow.

The Word! The Word, with hidden veins of gold!

Our laboring upon it yields a treasury untold.

The Word! The Word! Oh, come explore the mine!

Come let us learn and here discern the mysteries divine.

  1. The Word is for the Body,

’tis corporately we see

The fullness of His riches, His vast economy.

’Tis with the saints we’re viewing

the breadth and length and height.

And with the saints pursuing with corporate might.

The Word! The Word! It’s to the church He speaks.

His Word transforms, His Word adorns the Bride

for whom He seeks.

The Word! The Word unites us to the Lord

Until the Spirit and the Bride say, Come! in one accord.

195 神的话——爱慕神的话

一 我们爱主宝贵的话！

犹如美地丰足绝伦；

充满基督超绝图画，

荣耀基督作我永分。

和 阿利路亚，宝贵的话！

耳未曾闻、眼未曾见，

心也未曾思想过它；

这话赐给奇妙恩典。

二 我们爱主宝贵的话！

它的供应丰盈充足；

活的圣灵感动、启发，

我们得以彰显基督。

三 我们爱主宝贵的话！

我们立志以及行事，

因神藉话运行、生发，

浸透全人，成就美旨。

四 我们爱主宝贵的话！

完全救恩，话中寻见；

脱离埋怨、讲理、挣扎，

真正合一得以实现。

五 我们爱主宝贵的话！

它是神那活的呼出！

我们被话纯净无瑕，

明光照耀，彰显恩主。

六 我们爱主宝贵的话！

它使我们联于基督；

藉著表明生命活话，

荣耀基督就被显出。

七 我们爱主宝贵的话！

天天藉它得著基督，

被祂得著；也因这话，

信心之义，乃得展出。

195 8.8.8.8.D.

  1. Oh, how we love the precious Word!

It is a rich, good land to us,

Filled with the knowledge excellent

Of Christ, our portion glorious.

Oh, hallelujah for the Word!

No eye has seen, nor ear has heard,

Nor e’er has come up in our hearts

What wondrous grace the Word imparts.

  1. Oh, how we love the precious Word!

It is the bountiful supply,

The living Spirit, causing us

Our Christ to live and magnify.

  1. Oh, how we love the precious Word!

By it in us God operates

The willing and the working too,

And all our being saturates.

  1. Oh, how we love the precious Word!

Our full salvation here is found

From murmurings, reasonings, rivalry,

That we in oneness may abound.

  1. Oh, how we love the precious Word!

The living breathing of our God!

Blameless and guileless thru the Word,

We shine as lights for Christ our Lord.

  1. Oh, how we love the precious Word!

It constitutes us all with Christ.

Then we express this glorious One

By holding forth the word of life.

  1. Oh, how we love the precious Word!

By it we’re gaining Christ each day;

‘Tis by it we in Him are found

And righteousness of faith display.

196 神的话——爱慕神的话

一 我心宝爱主的圣言，

说出主的救赎恩典，

新郎所写爱的书简，

如镜返照救主荣脸。

二 我心宝爱主的圣言，

藉它支取丰富属天，

天上产业在它里面，

是我爱主遗留心愿。

三 我心宝爱主的圣言，

望远之镜，我得窥见，

奇妙世界将要出现，

永远荣耀，常新不变。

四 我心宝爱主的圣言，

一生道路都蒙指点：

黑暗时刻——如灯光线；

光明之时——如日灿烂。

196 8.8.8.8.

  1. Oh, how I love this blessed Book!

The story of redeeming grace,

Love letter of my Bridegroom’s heart

And mirror of my Savior’s face.

  1. Oh, how I love this blessed Book!

My checkbook on the bank above,

Deed of my heavenly heritage

And dying will of Him I love.

  1. Oh, how I love this blessed Book!

Bright telescope through which I view

The wonders of the world to come

And gaze on glories ever new.

  1. Oh, how I love this blessed Book!

My Guide Book all my earthly way,

The lamp that cheers my darkest night,

The sunshine of my brightest day.

197 神的话——寻求神的话

一 求主静中发言，

当我在等候；

我心在此静听，

望允我所求。

二 恩主，求来发言，

在这安静时；

让我见你荣面，

感到你所指。

三 你所说的话语，

是灵、是生命；

天上来的活粮，

将我灵供应。

四 一切全都归你，

不再属自己；

甘心乐意降服，

我只属于你。

五 请说，仆人敬听，

哦主，勿静默；

我灵向你仰望，

活话愿得著。

六 用你丰富话语，

将我心充满；

使你一切美意，

在我得成全。

七 像一灌溉花园，

充满了香气，

给你进来欣赏，

满足你心意。

197 6.5.6.5.

  1. Speak, Lord, in the stillness,

While I wait on Thee;

Hush’d my heart ot listen,

In expectantancy.

  1. Speak, O blessed Master,

In this quiet hour;

Let me see Thy face, Lord,

Feel Thy touch of power.

  1. For the words Thou speakest,

They are life indeed;

Living bread from heaven,

Now my spirit feed!

  1. All to Thee is yielded,

I am not my own;

Blissful, glad surrender,

I am Thine alone.

  1. Speak, Thy servant heareth,

Be not silent, Lord;

Waits my soul upon Thee

For the quickening word.

  1. Fill me with the knowledge

Of Thy glorious will;

All Thine own good pleasure

In Thy child fulfill.

  1. Like a watered garden,

Full of fragrance rare,

Lingering in Thy presence,

Let my life appear.

198 神的话——寻求神的话

一 主，你有否一句为我？

使我更能向你信托，

使我更能逃避私欲，

一句，我主，求赐一句。

二 一句来显我的软弱，

当我欣赏自己工作；

我空劳碌，我空叹吁，

一句，我主，求赐一句。

三 一句来示你的相亲，

因你乃是住在我心，

你的生命我也同豫，

一句，我主，求赐一句。

四 一句，求将有力应许，

显在许多畏惧、挂虑，

你微而清所说话语，

一句，我主，求赐一句。

五 一句最终得胜呼喊，

得你应许甘甜充满，

与你永远快乐同居，

一句，我主，求赐一句。

198 8.8.8.8.

  1. Lord, hast Thou not one word for me

To bind my soul more close to Thee,

That ev’ry evil I may flee;

One word, O Lord! One word from Thee?

  1. One word, to show how weak am I

When in my strength alone I try,

In vain I toil, in vain I sigh;

One word, O Lord! One word from Thee.

  1. One word, to show how near Thou art,

For Thou dost dwell within my heart;

And of Thy life I share a part;

One word, O Lord! One word from Thee.

  1. One word of power, oh, let me hear,

Above the heart’s most anxious fear,

Thy still, small voice, yet deep and clear;

One word, O Lord! One word from Thee.

  1. One word of final triumph, Lord;

Sweet hope Thy promises afford,

To dwell with Thee in sweet accord;

One word, O Lord! One word from Thee.

199 神的话——寻求神的话

一 开启我眼，使我看见，

你所赐的真理一现；

求将钥匙，放置我手，

使我解开，并得自由。

和 恩主，我今等候你前，

神的心意，使我得见；

开启我眼，使我看见，

你的圣言！

二 开启我耳，使我听见，

你所赐的真理圣言；

愿你声音绕我耳边，

清除恶者一切谎言。

三 开启我口，使我能够

诉说你的怜悯丰厚；

开启我心，使我豫备

同你儿女分享恩惠。

四 开我心窍，更多领会，

你爱中的话语、作为；

有你引领，何足畏惧？

更多亮光，是我所需。

199 8.8.9.8. with chorus

  1. Open my eyes that I may see

Glimpses of truth Thou hast for me;

Place in my hands the wonderful key

That shall unclasp and set me free.

Silently now I wait for Thee,

Ready, my God, Thy will to see;

Open my eyes, illumine me,

Spirit Divine!

  1. Open my ears that I may hear

Voices of truth Thou sendest clear;

And while the wave notes fall on my ear,

Everything false will disappear.

  1. Open my mouth and let me bear

Tidings of mercy everywhere;

Open my hert and let me prepare

Love with Thy children thus to share.

  1. Open my mind that I may read

More of Thy love in word and deed;

What shall I fear while yet Thou dost lead?

Only for light from Thee I plead.

200 神的话——寻求神的话

一 我主，请说，仆人敬听，

我今等候你恩言；

我心渴望闻你慈声，

我愿现在就听见。

哦主，我今正倾听，

是否就向我发言？

二 我主，请说，仆人敬听；

杂音常侵入我心，

你从圣所所发命令，

竟不能清晰听闻。

求主今向我发声，

其他杂音使寂沉。

三 我主，请说，仆人敬听，

让我得闻你微声；

鉴察我的渴慕心情，

我主，务请再发声。

凡我需要，你察明；

你一说话就供应。

四 我主，请说，仆人敬听；

使我随时能儆醒，

你口所发每句命令，

欢然领受并遵行。

将你心意来显明，

哦主，我今正倾听。

五 我主，请说，仆人敬听，

求你按名向我说；

我愿快步随你而行，

亦步亦趋何稳妥，

如羊随牧人引领，

磐石影中我躺卧。

200 8.7.8.7.7.7.

  1. Master, speak! Thy servant heareth,

Waiting for Thy gracious word,

Longing for Thy voice that cheereth,

Master, let it now be heard.

I am list’ning, Lord, for Thee;

What hast Thou to say to me?

  1. Often through my heart is pealing

Many another voice than Thine,

Many an unwilled echo stealing

From the walls of this Thy shrine.

Let Thy longed-for accents fall;

Muter, speak! and silence all.

  1. Master, speak! though least and lowest,

Let me not unheard depart;

Speak! for oh, Thou knowest

All the yearning of my heart.

Knowest all its truest need;

Speak! and make me blest indeed.

  1. Master, speak! and make me ready,

When Thy voice is truly heard,

With obedience glad and steady,

Still to follow every word.

I am listening, Lord, for Thee:

Master, speak, oh, speak to me!

  1. Speak to me by name, O Master,

Let me know it is to me;

Speak, that I may follow faster,

With a step more firm and free,

Where the Shepherd leads the flock,

In the shadow of the Rock!

201 神的话——寻求神的话

一 愿主为我擘开

生命的饼，

就像当日旁海

对众所行。

靠这圣书引导，

我寻求你；

我主，神的活道，

我渴慕你！

二 愿主为我擘开

生命的饼，

使我充满主爱，

记念主名！

释放我的思想

脱离自己，

好叫我的倾向

都在乎你。

三 惟主解开真理，

我才明白，

你的一切所是，

向我启开；

使我与你同情，

与你同行，

使我逐日变化，

像你荣形。

四 爱主，求你祝福

你的真理，

像你为饼祝福

在加利利；

叫我捆绑都脱，

锁链都落，

自由为你生活，

为你工作。

201 6.4.6.4.D.

  1. Break Thou the Bread of Life,

Dear Lord, to me,

As Thou didst break the loaves

Beside the sea;

Beyond the sacred page

I seek Thee, Lord;

My spirit pants for Thee,

O Living Word.

  1. Thou art the Bread of Life,

O Lord, to me,

Thy holy Word the truth

That saveth me;

Give me to eat and live

With Thee above;

Teach me to love Thy truth,

For Thou art Love.

  1. Oh, send Thy Spirit, Lord,

Now unto me,

That He may touch my eyes,

And make me see;

Show me the truth concealed

Within Thy Word,

And in Thy Book revealed

I see the Lord.

  1. Bless Thou the truth, dear Lord,

To me, to me,

As Thou didst bless the bread

By Galilee;

Then shall all bondage cease,

All fetters fall,

And I shall find my peace,

My All in all.

202 神的话——神话的功用

一 神的话如丰富宝库，

其中美善充足；

有心愿者都可进入，

享受它的丰富。

神的话像稀世宝矿，

珍宝深深内藏；

留待寻求的人前来，

将它挖掘、分享。

二 神的话如万星灿烂，

射下闪烁光线，

引导客旅，使能看见，

一路安然进前。

神的话如武器之仓，

备足全副军装，

在世一生，如上战场，

它使我打胜仗。

三 哦，我宝爱你的话语，

我要挖掘矿区，

属天珍宝容我尽取，

并在光中沐浴。

找出适用军装一穿，

神的话作宝剑；

面对仇敌，勇往直前，

为主勇敢征战！

四 它是永活之神的话，

爱子心意表达；

无它，不能将地践踏，

也不能将敌杀。

主，将正确存心赐给，

使我学得智慧，

如婴孩般简单、宝贵

你属天的教诲。

202 8.6.8.6.D.

  1. Thy Word is like a storehouse, Lord,

With full provision there,

And everyone who seeks may come,

Its glorious wealth to share.

Thy Word is like a deep, deep mine,

And jewels rich and rare

Are hidden in its mighty depths

For ev’ry searcher there.

  1. Thy Word is like a starry host:

A thousand rays of light

Are seen to guide the traveler,

And make his pathway bright.

Thy Word is like an armory,

Where soldiers may repair,

And find, for life’s long battle day,

All needful weapons there.

  1. O may I love Thy precious Word,

May I explore the mine,

May I its glorious riches take,

May light upon me shine.

O may I find my armor there,

Thy Word my trusty sword;

I’ll learn to fight with every foe

The battle of the Lord.

  1. Word of the ever living God,

Will of His glorious Son;

Without Thee how could earth be trod,

Or God and Christ be won?

Lord, grant us all aright to learn

The wisdom it imparts,

And to its heav’nly teaching turn,

With simple, child-like hearts.

203 神的话——无限的亮光和真理

一 莫让我们贫乏悟性，

限制神的真理，

莫因所处时代、环境

而生偏见、拘泥。

要让更佳﹑求新愿望，

催动我们的心；

就有更多真理亮光，

从主话语引进。

二 谁敢容让迟钝感觉，

捆住天来圣言？

古今中外，没有分别，

话中同蒙恩典。

海洋、星空浩瀚无边，

万世不能尽知，

话中真理，丰富无限，

有待发掘认识。

三 古时属灵先贤所历，

有如旅程首途；

所见不过黎明晨曦，

渐明直到日午。

荣耀日头越是增长，

就越照耀辉煌，

话中亮光，无限无量，

有待开启照亮。

四 山谷已过，我魂仍须

攀登更高山峰；

今不过从更高领域

俯视所经路程；

越是往上，空气就越

清新，天乐可闻！

话中真理，神圣超绝，

配得竭力追寻。

五 哦，父、子、灵，三一之神，

求你从上恩待；

扩大所有信徒的心，

使能领会你爱；

用你所赐超绝能力，

使我们都明白，

你有更多亮光、真理，

要从你话布开。

203 8.6.8.6.D.

  1. We limit not the truth of God

To our poor reach of mind,

By notions of our day and sect,

Crude, partial and confined.

Now let a new and better hope

Within our hearts be stirred:

The Lord hath yet more light and truth

To break forth from His Word.

  1. Who dares to bind by his dull sense

The oracles of heaven,

For all the nations, tongues and climes

And all the ages given!

The universe how much unknown!

That ocean unexplored!

The Lord hath yet more light and truth

To break forth from His Word.

  1. Darkling our great forefathers went

The first steps of the way;

’Twas but the dawning yet to grow

Into the perfect day;

And grow it shall, our glorious Sun

More fervid rays afford:

The Lord hath yet more light and truth

To break forth from His Word.

  1. The valleys past, ascending still,

Our souls would higher climb,

And look down from supernal heights,

On all the bygone times;

Upward we press, the air is clear,

And the sphere-music heard!

The Lord hath yet more light and truth

To break forth from His Word.

  1. O Father, Son and Spirit, send

Us increase from above;

Enlarge, expand all Christian hearts

To comprehend Thy love;

And make us all go on to know

With nobler powers conferred:

The Lord hath yet more light and truth

To break forth from His Word.

204 神的话——神话的功用

一 主正渴慕祂的新妇——

全然荣耀﹑美丽。

祂这心愿必将满足，

当她妆饰整齐。

二 话中之水，洗净教会，

圣洁没有瑕疵；

荣耀新妇，与祂相配，

毫无皱纹玷污。

三 我们必须赎回光阴，

祷告领受主话，

每一经节，都说阿们，

存心预备见祂。

四 哦，主的话确像利剑，

剖开我魂与灵，

心中隐情、沉重负担，

都能辨明、除净。

五 主，感谢你，因为你话，

活泼且有功效。

真愿藉话生活、变化，

迎接你的来到。

六 主，使我们满足你心，

促进你能快回。

今藉你话，供应更新，

好使与你相配。

204 8.6.8.6.

  1. Jesus is longing for His Bride,

All glorious within.

His longing ill be satisfied

When she is fit for Him.

  1. ’Tis by the Word the church is made

Holy and pure as He;

All spots and wrinkles it removes

That she His Bride may be.

  1. We must redeem these golden days,

Receive the Word in prayer,

Amening every line and phrase,

And thus for Him prepare.

  1. Oh, how the Word doth penetrate,

Spirit and soul divide,

Revealing every hidden weight

For us to lay aside.

  1. Lord, how we thank Thee for Thy Word

Living and operative.

Oh, for Thy coming, we are stirred

Ever by it to live!

  1. Lord, make us those who bring Thee back,

Who satisfy Thy heart.

Now by Thy Word supply our lack,

Make us Thy counterpart.

205 祷告——教导祷告

一 求主教我如何祷告！

如何使敌遁逃，

如何捆绑灭其权势，

使众罪囚得释。

二 求主教我如何祷告！

如何阵地站牢，

如何向前攻破营垒，

立使仇敌溃退。

三 求主教我如何祷告！

明白神的最好；

如何祷告摇动天地，

得著血下权利。

四 因著信心，藉著祷告，

学习与主同劳；

学知万有全属我们，

运用得胜权柄。

205 8.6.8.6.

  1. Teach us to pray that we may cause

The enemy to flee,

That we his evil pow’r may bind,

His prisoners to free.

  1. Teach us to pray and firmly stand

Upon the battleground,

To fight and break the stronghold down,

The enemy confound.

  1. Teach us to pray and use Thy rod

In strong, prevailing prayer,

Beneath Thy blood to shake the earth

And powers of the air.

  1. By prayer and faith, O may we learn

To labor, Lord. with Thee,

To know the victory is ours

And Thine authority.

206 祷告——祷告的呼召

一 信徒当寻求不息，

听恩主如此警告，

仇敌正环伺著你：

要祷告。

二 黑暗的世界权势，

正暗中布下兵哨，

等待你松懈之时：

要祷告。

三 要穿上属天军装，

日夜都不可卸掉，

因恶者埋伏观望：

要祷告。

四 请听得胜者忠告，

争战的得胜记諕，

人人都如此依靠：

要祷告。

五 要倾听恩主教训，

祂是你所爱、所宝，

将祂话藏在你心：

要祷告。

六 信徒们，儆醒、祷告！

要持守这则信条，

帮助必从天临到：

要祷告。

206 7.7.7.3.

  1. Christian, seek not yet repose,

Hear thy gracious Savior say;

Thou art in the midst of foes:

Watch and pray.

  1. Principalities and powers,

Mustering their unseen array,

Wait for thy unguarded hours:

Watch and pray.

  1. Gird thy heavenly armor on,

Wear it ever night and day;

Ambushed lies the evil one:

Watch and pray.

  1. Hear the victors who o’ercame,

Still they mark each warrior’s way;

All with one sweet voice exclaim,

Watch and pray.

  1. Hear, above all, hear thy Lord,

Him thou lovest to obey;

Hide within thy heart His word:

Watch and pray.

  1. Watch, as if on that alone

Hung the issue of the day;

Pray, that help may be sent down:

Watch and pray.

207 祷告——在主的名里

一 我奉耶稣全能的名，

跪在施恩宝座前，

打败许多黑暗军兵，

灭熄许多的火箭。

和 全能名！ 全能名！

我奉此名就得胜！

全能名！ 全能名！

撒但﹑罪﹑死，都无能！

二 当我求告耶稣的名，

撒但全军都败阵；

耶稣，耶稣，宝贵、全能！

你的大名是得胜！

三 不久主颁有福命令，

召我进入祂天国，

那时全能耶稣的名，

使我得登祂宝座！

207 8.7.8.7. with chorus

  1. In the mighty Name of Jesus,

When we bow before the Throne,

Many deadly foes are vanquished,

Many victories are won.

Mighty Name! Mighty Name!

In that Name alone we win.

Mighty Name! Mighty Name!

Conquering Satan, death and sin.

  1. When we plead the Name of Jesus,

Satan and his hosts must flee.

Jesus! Jesus! Precious Jesus!

In Thy Name is victory.

  1. Soon shall come the blessed moment

When the battle shall be won,

When the Mighty Name of Jesus

Shall exalt us to the Throne.

208 祷告——在信心里

一 “凭信心求，”奉主的名，

施恩座前来祷告；

你若相信，听主答应：

“看哪，小子，已成了！”

二 “凭信心求，”神要成就

圣灵涂抹的祷告；

祂必施行奇妙拯救，

远超你心所意料。

三 “凭信心求，”才是祷告，

因信你就敢站牢，

满有平安、盼望、欢笑，

高张两手向神要。

四 “凭信心求，”神正等你

能凭信心来求恳；

因为信心随时随地

得神喜悦摸著神。

208 8.7.8.7.

  1. “Ask in faith,” the Name of Jesus

All your plea before the throne;

As you trust, the Lord will whisper,

“See, my child, the work is done.”

  1. “Ask in faith,” God waits to answer

Each petition, Spirit-wrought;

He will work in wondrous power,

Far beyond your highest thought.

  1. “Ask in faith,” ’tis just the asking,

In a faith that dares to stand,

Full of joyful expectation,

With an open, outstretched hand.

  1. “Ask in faith,” for God is waiting

For thy faith-filled, earnest prayer.

Faith delights Him; faith can touch Him,

Every moment, everywhere.

209 祷告——告诉主

一 我所有苦况，必须告诉主，

我不能独自担此忧郁；

我在患难中，惟主能安抚，

擦去我眼泪，将我体恤。

和 我必须告诉，必须告诉主，

将我的心事向主倾吐；

我必须告诉，必须告诉主，

惟主能安抚，惟祂是主。

二 我所有困难，必须告诉主，

我不能独自对付遭遇；

我一切事务，惟主能担负，

使我得安息，慰我情绪。

三 我所有软弱，必须告诉主，

我不能独自胜过私欲；

我所有捆绑，惟主能帮助，

使我得释放，脱离罪律。

四 我所有试探，必须告诉主，

我不能独自抵挡鬼魔；

主所受试探，与我毫无殊，

惟主能救我脱离凶恶。

209 10.9.10.9. with chorus

  1. I must tell Jesus all of my trials;

I cannot bear these burdens alone;

In my distress He kindly will help me;

He ever loves and cares for His own.

I must tell Jesus! I must tell Jesus!

I cannot bear my burden alone;

I must tell Jesus! I must tell Jesus!

Jesus can help me, Jesus alone.

  1. I must tell Jesus all of my troubles;

He is a kind, compassionate Friend;

If I but ask Him, He will deliver,

And in my griefs with me He will blend.

  1. Tempted and tried I need a great Savior,

One who can help my burdens to bear;

I must tell Jesus, I must tell Jesus;

He all my cares and sorrows will share.

  1. O how the world to evil allures me!

O how my heart is tempted to sin!

I must tell Jesus; He will enable

Over the world the vict’ry to win.

210 祷告——告诉主

一 何等朋友，我主耶稣！

担我罪孽负我忧；

何等权利，能将难处，

到主面前去祈求。

多少平安屡屡丧失，

多少痛苦无须受；

无非我们未将万事，

到主面前去祈求。

二 我们有否苦难、艰辛？

有否试探和引诱？

不能因此失望、灰心，

应当向主去祈求。

谁能像祂忠实可托，

背我重担分我愁？

惟祂知我每一软弱，

故当向主去祈求。

三 我们是否疲倦、苦楚、

思虑、重担压心头？

救主仍旧是避难处，

应当向祂去祈求。

朋友有否卖你、弃你？

应当向主去祈求；

祂的怀抱是你护庇，

经祂抚慰必无忧。

210 8.7.8.7.D.

  1. What a Friend we have in Jesus,

All our sins and griefs to bear!

What a privilege to carry

Ev’rything to God in prayer!

O what peace we often forfeit,

O what needless pain we bear,

All because we do not carry

Ev’rything to God in prayer!

  1. Have we trials and temptations?

Is there trouble anywhere?

We should never be discouraged,

Take it to the Lord in prayer.

Can we find a friend so faithful

Who will all our sorrows share?

Jesus knows our every weakness,

Take it to the Lord in prayer.

  1. Are we weak and heavy-laden,

Cumbered with a load of care?

Precious Savior, still our refuge

Take it to the Lord in prayer.

Do thy friends despise, forsake thee?

Take it to the Lord in prayer:

In His arms He’ll take and shield thee,

Thou wilt find a solace there.

211 祷告——与祂交通

一 在祂同在的隐密处，

我得安居何甘美！

在祂面前时常俯伏，

所学功课何宝贵！

忧虑不能将我搅扰，

试炼也不能压住；

每逢撒但引诱吼叫，

我就到祂隐密处。

(每节重唱最后一行)

二 当我带著疲倦、干渴，

来到祂的翅膀间，

就得荫庇，凉爽、快乐，

活泉清澈而新鲜；

在此投身救主胸怀，

彼此交通满香甜；

我虽尝试，也说不来

祂那秘密的语言。

三 但有一事是我所知：

当我向祂诉苦情，

祂就耐心听我心事，

并且鼓舞我萎灵。

你想从来祂不责备？

那祂就是很虚伪！

如果祂是从来也未

责备祂所见的罪。

四 这隐密处如何美佳，

如果你也愿知晓，

请去住在祂的荫下，

就必尝到这味道；

若你的灵与祂相交，

安静住于祂荣光，

你的脸面就必反照

祂那荣美的形像。

211 8.7.8.7.D. with repeat

  1. In the secret of His presence

How my soul delights to hide!

Oh, how precious are the lessons

Which I learn at Jesus’ side!

Earthly cares can never vex me,

Neither trials lay me low;

For when Satan comes to tempt me,

To the secret place I go.

(Repeat the last line of each stanza)

  1. When my soul is faint and thirsty,

‘Neath the shadow of His wing

There is cool and pleasant shelter,

And a fresh and crystal spring;

And my Savior rests beside me,

As we hold communion sweet;

If I tried, I could not utter

What He says when thus we meet.

  1. Only this I know: I tell Him

All my doubts and griefs and fears;

Oh, how patiently He listens!

And my drooping soul He cheers;

Do you think He ne’er reproves me?

What a false friend He would be,

If He never, never told me

Of the sins which He must see!

  1. Would you like to know that sweetness

Of the secret of the Lord?

Go and hide beneath His shadow;

This shall then be your reward;

And whene’er you leave the silence

Of that happy meeting-place,

By the Spirit bear the image

Of the Master in your face.

212 祷告——与祂交通

一 坐在我主耶稣脚前，

听祂向我说美言！

与主亲近，喜乐之源，

天天愿在此流连！

坐在我主耶稣脚前，

回首看见我既往，

祂爱宝贵而且甘甜——

赢得我心来欣赏。

二 坐在我主耶稣脚前，

蒙恩之人何有福！

在此卸下忧虑、罪愆；

疲心在此蒙安抚。

坐在我主耶稣脚前，

向祂倾诉并流泪，

天天从祂领受丰满，

得祂恩典和安慰。

三 亲爱救主，求你祝福，

当我静坐你脚前！

用你大爱将我眷顾，

让我得见你慈脸！

求主将你圣洁赐我，

使我圣洁有如你；

得以见证与你同活，

因你是我的公义。

212 8.7.8.7.D.

  1. Sitting at the feet of Jesus,

O what words I hear Him say!

Happy place—so near, so precious!

May it find me there each day!

Sitting at the feet of Jesus,

I may look upon the past,

For His love has been so gracious—

It has won my heart at last.

  1. Sitting at the feet of Jesus,

Where can mortals be more blest?

There I lay my sins and sorrows,

And, when weary, find sweet rest,

Sitting at the feet of Jesus,

There I love to weep and pray,

While I from His fullness gather

Grace and comfort every day.

  1. Bless me, O my Savior, bless me,

As I sit low at Thy feet!

O look down in love upon me,

Let me see Thy face so sweet!

Give me, Lord, the mind of Jesus,

Make me holy as He is;

May I prove I’ve been with Jesus,

Who is all my righteousness.

213 祷告——烧香

一 “这香要常焚烧”

在祭坛火上；

让你心所求讨，

与深处渴望，

如香的烟上升，

围绕神座前，

直到祂所命定，

都完满实现。

二 “这香要常焚烧”

在祭坛火上；

主，助这火常著，

直到你愿望

在众儿女里面，

能通行无阻；

发出抹膏恩言，

成就神意图。

三 “这香要常焚烧”

信心虽软弱；

虽心深处所要，

难用话述说；

但圣灵来指教，

藉内心默求，

必要荣耀得到；

因神必成就。

四 “这香要常焚烧”

要时刻上升，

直到火焰照耀

敞开的天空，

又从天上降下，

使众心著火，

好叫主名尊大——

何等的结果！

213 6.5.6.5.D.

  1. “Keep the incense burning”

On the altar fire;

Let thy heart’s petition,

Let thy deep desire,

Be a cloud of incense

Wreathing God’s own throne,

Till His will among us

Shall be fully done.

  1. “Keep the incense burning”

On the altar fire;

Feed the flame, Lord Jesus,

Till Thy whole desire

Shall in us, Thy children,

Find free course, and be

Breathed thro’ lips anointed

For this ministry.

  1. “Keep the incense burning”

Though thy faith be weak;

Though in words thou canst not

All thy longing speak;

Silent heart-petitions,

Spirit-taught, will be

Gloriously answered;

Wrought by God for thee.

  1. “Keep the incense burning”

Hourly let it rise,

Till from opened heavens,

Till from flame-swept skies,

Fire shall fall and kindle

All hearts to a flame;

Making us a glory

To our Savior’s name.

214 祷告——为全地祷告

一 激动我心，主，我别无计较，

只求激动我心关怀世人，

使我去给﹑去传﹑更去祷告；

愿将血红救赎大旗高擎，

传遍外邦﹑除去黑暗笼罩，

好使万民认识十架大道。

二 激动我心，主，直到我全心

充满同情，关心失丧灵魂，

被你的话催促，为人求恳，

被你的爱激励，到处找寻，

天南地北，因爱传扬你恩，

东奔西走，里面爱火如焚。

三 激动我心，主，直到我祷告

能从痛苦转为喜乐、赞美；

愿我全人都能被你得到，

一生归你使用、永不后悔。

求你使我学会迫切祷告；

也求使我学会等候、依靠。

四 激动我心，神，你曾因爱火

激动，赐下你的独生爱子，

使祂离开天上荣耀宝座，

为使我们得生，被钉受死。

激动我心，叫我为你而活，

好叫众人从我将你得著。

五 激动我心，主，使我能看见，

你的荣耀得胜日子已近；

晨曦已经隐约显在天边；

主的教会阿，当兴起、儆醒。

黑夜已深，我主即将再显，

我愿传报此讯直到那天。

214 10.10.10.10.10.10.

  1. Stir me, oh, stir me, Lord, I care not how,

But stir my heart in passion for the world,

Stir me to give, to go, but most to pray;

Stir till the blood-red banner be unfurled

O’er lands that still in heathen darkness lie,

O’er deserts where no cross is lifted high.

  1. Stir me, oh! stir me, Lord, till all my heart

Is filled with strong compassion for these souls;

Till Thy compelling word drives me to pray;

Till Thy constraining love reach to the poles

Far north and south, in burning deep desire,

Till east and west are caught in love’s great fire.

  1. Stir me, oh, stir me, Lord, till prayer is pain,

Till prayer is joy, till prayer turns into praise;

Stir me, till heart and will and mind, yea, all

Is wholly Thine to use through all the days.

Stir, till I learn to pray exceedingly;

Stir, till I learn to wait expectantly.

  1. Stir me, oh stir me, Lord, Thy heart was stirred

By love’s intensest fire, till Thou didst give

Thine only Son, Thy best beloved One,

E’en to the dreadful cross, that I might live.

Stir me to give myself so back to Thee,

That Thou canst give Thyself again through me.

  1. Stir me, oh, stir me, Lord, for I can see

Thy glorious triumph-day begin to break:

The dawn already gilds the eastern sky;

Oh, Church of Christ, arise, awake, awake.

Oh! stir us, Lord, as heralds of that day.

For night is past, our King is on His way.

215 祷告——为国度祷告

一 父阿，愿你国降临，

满带生命的大能；

愿你末后的发声，

引进得胜的时辰。

二 正如从前的日子，

每当圣徒殉道时，

显在人心的深处；

愿它快来不延迟。

三 黑暗权势的宫庭，

全都被你所除尽；

你的王权来执政，

愿人都尊你为圣。

四 自从教会受教导，

漫长岁月虽难熬；

仍然儆醒并祷告，

求使光明遍地照。

五 得胜日子快降临，

我们的心要欢欣；

无数颂歌存此心，

等你来临同献吟。

六 国度、王权、并宝座，

都当归我神得著，

父阿，在地每颗心，

都愿你国快降临。

215 7.7.7.7.

  1. Father, let Thy kingdom come,

Let it come with living power,

Speak at length the final word,
