乃“无价之宝”一现！

四　并非因它本是虚无，

使偶像化成灰土；

乃是祂美丽的倾注，

并祂爱心的流露。

五　谁愿熄灭他的灯光，

若非朝阳已在望？

谁愿收藏他的寒衣，

若非炎夏已经莅？

六　惟有彼得所见泪眼，

司提反所望荣脸，

陪马利亚同哭慈心，

使我脱地的吸引。

七　求你来施情并吸引，

直到你充满这心；

我们既是你的同伴，

与偶像有何相干？

424 8.7.8.7.D.

  1. Hast thou heard Him, seen Him, known Him?

Is not thine a captured heart?

Chief among ten thousand own Him;

Joyful choose the better part.

Captivated by His beauty,

Worthy tribute haste to bring;

Let His peerless worth constrain thee,

Crown Him now unrivaled King.

  1. Idols once they won thee, charmed thee,

Lovely things of time and sense;

Gilded thus does sin disarm thee,

Honeyed lest thou turn thee thence.

  1. What has stripped the seeming beauty

From the idols of the earth?

Not a sense of right or duty,

But the sight of peerless worth.

  1. Not the crushing of those idols,

With its bitter void and smart;

But the beaming of His beauty,

The unveiling of His heart.

  1. Who extinguishes their taper

Till they hail the rising sun?

Who discards the garb of winter

Till the summer has begun?

  1. ’Tis that look that melted Peter,

’Tis that face that Stephen saw,

’Tis that heart that wept with Mary,

Can alone from idols draw:

  1. Draw and win and fill completely,
    Till the cup o’erflow the brim;
    What have we to do with idols
    Who have companied with Him?

425 奉献归主——完全降服于祂

一　我将一切全献基督，

全献恩主心甘愿；

我要永远爱主，随主，

天天活在主面前。

(和)一切全奉献！一切全奉献！

　　我的恩主，向你我愿一切全奉献！

二　我将一切全献基督，

我今俯伏主脚前；

今世福乐永不我属，

恩主，收我在今天。

三　我将一切全献基督，

恩主，将我全得著。

惟愿圣灵从我证出：

我是属主，主属我。

四　我将一切全献基督，

主，我愿作你器皿；

恩惠、能力充我如注，

显明你生在我身。

五　我将一切全献基督，

圣火已将我烧净；

哦，这救恩甜美丰富，

荣耀、荣耀归主名。

425 8.7.8.7. with chorus

  1. All to Jesus I surrender,

All to Him I freely give;

I will ever love and trust Him,

In His presence daily live.

I surrender all, I surrender all.

All to Thee, my blessed Savior, I surrender all.

  1. All to Jesus I surrender,

Humbly at His feet I bow,

Worldly pleasures all forsaken;

Take me, Jesus, take me now.

  1. All to Jesus I surrender,

Make me, Savior, wholly Thine;

Let me feel Thy Holy Spirit,

Truly know that Thou art mine.

  1. All to Jesus I surrender,

Lord, I give myself to Thee;

Fill me with Thy love and power,

Let Thy blessing fall on me.

  1. All to Jesus I surrender,

Now I feel the sacred flame.

Oh, the joy of full salvation!

Glory, glory to His name!

426 奉献归主——完全降服于祂

一　你希望常平安，信心增长不断，

为此你虔求、望主成全；

但不觉有安息，祝福也未多见，

直到把一切献于祭坛。

(和)你是否把一切都奉献于祭坛？

你心是否让灵掌管？

你若要心平安，满有安息、甘甜，

只有把全人献于祭坛。

二　你愿否在主话光中与祂同行，

常享满足、喜乐与平安？

你须遵行主旨，远离一切恶行，

并须把一切献于祭坛。

三　我虽祷告寻求，但永不能认识

主所赐祝福何等丰满，

直等到我身心全归恩主管制，

并把我一切献于祭坛。

四　谁能尽述祂那从天倾下爱怜？

哦，我心因此何等畅欢！

哦，在祂的脚前，交通何等甘甜！

当我们一切献于祭坛。

426 12.9.12.9. with chorus

  1. You have longed for sweet peace, and for faith to increase,

And have earnestly, fervently prayed;

But you cannot have rest, or be perfectly blest,

Until all on the altar is laid.

Is your all on the altar of sacrifice laid?

Your heart, does the Spirit control?

You can only be blest and have peace and sweet rest,

As you yield Him your body and soul.

  1. Would you walk with the Lord in the light of His Word,

And have peace and contentment alway;

You must do His sweet will to be free from all ill;

On the altar your all you must lay.

  1. Oh, we never can know what the Lord will bestow

Of the blessings for which we have prayed,

Till our body and soul He doth fully control,

And our all on the altar is laid.

  1. Who can tell all the love He will send from above!

Oh, how happy our heart will be made!

Oh, what fellowship sweet we shall share at His feet,

When our all on the altar is laid!

427 奉献归主——完全降服于祂

一　主，你得著我一生，

使它归你成为圣；

得著我日与我时，

归你使用永无止，

(重唱每节最后一行)

二　得我双手为你用，

因爱催促才举动；

得我两足为你行，

踪迹佳美传你名。

三　得我声音来歌唱，

荣耀天上的君王；

得我嘴唇作用器，

前来述说你信息。

四　得我金银和所有，

不敢分毫有私留；

得我聪明并才干，

前来作成你心欢。

五　得我意志永属你，

从今不再为自己；

得我心作你宝座，

你住我里号令我。

六　得我爱情，哦，我主，

只在你前才倾吐；

得我全人，灵、魂、体，

直到永远都为你。

427 7.7.7.7. with repeat

  1. Take my life, and let it be

Consecrated, Lord, to Thee;

Take my moments and my days,

Let them flow in ceaseless praise.

(Repeat the last line of each stanza)

  1. Take my hands, and let them move

At the impulse of Thy love;

Take my feet and let them be

Swift and beautiful for Thee.

  1. Take my voice, and let me sing

Always, only, for ‘my King;

Take my lips, and let them be

Filled with messages from Thee.

  1. Take my silver and my gold;

Not a mite would I withhold;

Take my intellect, and use

Every power as Thou shalt choose.

  1. Take my will, and make it Thine;

It shall be no longer mine.

Take my heart; it is Thine own;

It shall be Thy royal throne.

  1. Take my love; my Lord, I pour

At Thy feet its treasure-store.

Take myself, and I will be

Ever, only, all for Thee.

428 奉献归主——完全降服于祂

一　主，你曾为我受死，

我当献何给你？

是否稍许保留我所持，

或将全部献给你？

(和)耶稣我主，我救主，

为我，你舍一切；

你曾为我离天府，

并且死在加略。

耶稣我主，我救主，

为我，你舍一切；

我心岂可私自留一部？

向你，我献一切！

二　主，你已将我救赎，

我当献何给你？

所献虽小却是我全部－

降服归你来管理。

三　主，你仍赐恩眷顾，

我当将何给你？

无论时光、恩赐与财富，

不再保留全归你。

428 Irregular Meter

  1. What shall I give Thee, Master?

Thou who didst die for me.

Shall I give less of what I possess,

Or shall I give all to Thee?

Jesus, my Lord and Savior;

Thou hast giv’n all for me;

Thou didst leave Thy home above

To die on Calvary.

What shall I give Thee, Master?

Thou hast giv’n all for me;

Not just a part or half of my heart,

I will give all to Thee.

  1. What shall I give Thee, Master?

Thou hast redeemed my soul;

My gift is small but it is my all—

Surrendered to Thy control,

  1. What shall I give Thee, Master?

Giver of gifts divine!

I Will not hold time, talents or gold—

For everything shall be Thine.

429 奉献归主——照祂旨意

一　照你企图，主，

照你企图，因你是陶人，

我是泥土：

塑造又甄陶，照你美意；

降服且等候，使我归依。

二　照你企图，主，照你企图，

　　我在你面前谦卑俯伏：

　　鉴察又试炼，显我真情；

　　修理且洗涤，使我纯净。

三　照你企图，主，照你企图，

　　完全脱自己，是我所慕：

　　破碎又剥夺，使我成零；

　　挖透且倒空，使我无剩。

四　照你企图，主，照你企图，

　　深愿我全人向你降服：

　　圣灵充满我，流露你命；

　　基督活于我，彰显你形。

429 5.4.5.4.D.

  1. Have Thine own way, Lord,
    Have Thine own way; Thou art the Potter,
    I am the clay.
    Mould me and make me After Thy will,
    While I am waiting, Yielded and still.

  2. Have Thine own way, Lord, Have Thine own way;
    Search me and try me, Master, today.
    Whiter than snow, Lord, Wash me just now,
    As in Thy presence Humbly I bow.

  3. Have Thine own way, Lord, Have Thine own way;

Wounded and weary, Help me, I pray.

Power, all power, Surely is Thine,

Touch me and heal me, Savior divine.

  1. Have Thine own way, Lord, Have Thine own way;

Hold o’er my being Absolute sway.

Fill with Thy Spirit Till all shall see

Christ only, always, Living in me.

430 奉献归主——属于主

一　勿对我谈属地享乐，

勿用鄙利引诱我；

勿愚我以地上幻影，

勿用虚荣烦扰我。

我已弃绝化装偶像，

今后不再属自己；

我已将心献给基督，

我只属祂无别依。

(和)我不属自己，我不属自己，

　　我今属于基督，不再属于自己。

二　哦，只属于我主基督，

带来何等的安息！

当我所有全都不留，

祂丰盛我能倚。

荣耀恩主，将我接收，

使我完全属于你，

适合享受你作我分，

当我喜欢成你的。

三　疲倦人哪，放弃挣扎，

永勿再属你自己；

将你自己全给基督，

全然属祂无所遗。

祂曾舍己为要得你，

今来要你全归祂；

凡祂所有都已给你，

你就不该不给祂。

430 8.7.8.7.D. with chorus

  1. Tell me not of earthly pleasures,

Tempt me not with sordid gain;

Mock me not with earth’s illusions,

Vex me not with honors vain.

I am weaned from sinful idols;

I am henceforth not my own;

I have given my heart to Jesus,

I belong to Him alone.

I am not my own, I am not my own.

I belong to Jesus, And I am not my own.

  1. Oh, the blessed rest it brings us

To belong to Christ alone;

We can draw on all His fulness

When we’ve nothing of our own.

Blessed Jesus, take me, own me,

Make me, keep me wholly Thine.

Deign to find in me Thy portion,

While I joy to call Thee mine.

  1. Weary soul, give up the struggle,

Cease at length thyself to own;

Give yourself away to Jesus,

And belong to Him alone.

Once He gave His all to win thee,

Now He asks as much of thee;

All He has He fully gives thee;

Let thy love His portion be.

431 奉献归主——被祂的爱激励

一　当这世界已变迁，

当这炎日不再升，

当我站立在主前，

回顾今生的历程；

主，那时我才知道，

我亏欠你有多少。

二　当我站立在座前，

穿上美丽的白衣；

当我得识你完全，

能以全心来爱你；

主，那时我才知道，

我亏欠你有多少。

三　虽今有如对镜看，

将你荣耀看不清；

使我仍觉恩甘甜－

以你圣灵来显明：

现在就让我知道，

我亏欠你有多少。

431 7.7.7.7.7.7.

  1. When this passing world is done,

When has sunk yon glaring sun,
When we stand with Christ on high,
Looking o’er life’s history;
Then, Lord, shall I fully know,
Not till then, how much I owe.

  1. When I stand before the throne
    Dressed in beauty not my own,
    When I see Thee as Thou art,
    Love Thee with unsinning heart;
    Then, Lord, shall I fully know,
    Not till then, how much I owe.

  2. E’en on earth, as through a glass
    Darkly, let Thy glory pass;
    Make forgiveness feel so sweet;
    Make Thy Spirit,s help so meet:
    E’en on earth, Lord, make me know
    Something of how much I owe.

432 奉献归主——照祂旨意

一　不再固执，我向你投依；

主，我属你，单单属你；

我今向你倾吐我心意：

“愿你成就所定旨意。”

(和)紧拥抱我！神甘美旨意！

直到完全消失于你！

紧拥抱我！神甘美旨意！

直到完全消失于你！

二　罪污路上已厌倦失望，

黑暗笼罩使我心慌；

光明已现，今使我欢畅，

我在你里寻得太阳！

三　得胜的主，你宝贝旨意，

现在将我拥抱、管制；

纷扰消失，平安何满溢，

我心有如困鸟获释！

四　封闭于你，与你永相依，

流荡脚踪不再游移；

无何能使我与你相离，

我要永住你美旨里。

432 9.8.9.8.D.

  1. My stubborn will at last hath yielded;
    I would be Thine, and Thine alone,
    And this the prayer my lips are bringing,
    “Lord, let in me Thy will be done.”

Sweet will of God, still fold me closer,
Till I am wholly lost in Thee;
Sweet will of God, still fold me closer,
Till I am wholly lost in Thee.

  1. I’m tired of sin, footsore and weary,

The darksome path hath dreary grown,
But now a light has ris’n to cheer me;
I find in Thee my Star, my Sun.

  1. Thy precious Will, O conqu’ring Savior,

Doth now embrace and compass me;

All discords hushed, my peace a river,

My soul a prisoned bird set free.

  1. Shut in with Thee, O Lord, forever,
    My wayward feet no more to roam;
    What pow’r from Thee my soul can sever?
    The center of God’s will my home.

433 奉献归主——完全降服于祂

一　都归基督，都归基督，

都归基督理当然；

我既是主宝血所赎，

主就当得所有权。

都归基督，都归基督，每时每日归基督；

(重唱每节最后一行)

二　愿我双手归主使用，

愿我两脚跟主行，

愿我双目瞻主圣容，

愿我两唇颂主名。

都归基督，都归基督，愿我两唇颂主名。

三　世人贪爱虚荣、美色，

追求属地的事物；

夸耀财富、名声、享乐；

我却单单靠基督。

　　都归基督，都归基督，我要单单靠基督。

四　自从我眼注视基督，

所有事物全变色；

一望主在十架受苦，

我就甘愿负主轭。

都归基督，都归基督，我心甘愿负主轭。

五　奇妙恩典，深高阔长！

我口歌颂，心感戴；

荣耀救主，王中之王，

竟然看我可宝爱！

　　都归基督，都归基督，我口歌颂，心感戴。

(“基督”可唱作“耶稣”)

433 8.7.8.7.D.

  1. All for Jesus! All for Jesus!

All my being’s ransomed pow’rs;

All my thoughts and words and doings,

All my days and all my hours.

All for Jesus! All for Jesus! All my days and all my hours.

(Repeat the last line of each stanza)

  1. Let my hands perform His bidding;

Let my feet run in His ways;

Let mine eyes see Jesus only;

Let my lips speak forth His praise.

All for Jesus! All for Jesus! Let my lips speak forth His praise.

  1. Worldlings prize their gems of beauty,

Cling to gilded toys of dust;

Boast of wealth, and fame, and pleasure;

Only Jesus will I trust.

All for Jesus! All for Jesus! Only Jesus will I trust.

  1. Since mine eyes were fixed on Jesus,

I’ve lost sight of all beside—

So enchained my spirit’s vision,

Looking at the Crucified.

All for Jesus! All for Jesus! Looking at the Crucified.

  1. Oh, what wonder! how amazing!
    Jesus, glorious King of kings,
    Deigns to call me His beloved,
    Lets me rest beneath His wings.
    All for Jesus! All for Jesus! Resting now beneath His wings.

(Repeat last two lines of each stanza)

434 奉献归主——分别出来归于祂

一　绝对分别出来，归于主圣灵！

不惜任何代价，寻求祂丰盛；

割断所有岸索，开到水深处；

靠著祂的大能，刚强而坚固。

(和)绝对分别出来，归于万有主，

答应祂的呼召，寻求祂丰富。

二　绝对分别出来，归于主圣灵！

沉没还要沉没，直到己去净！

直到器皿倒空，祂脚前破碎；

等候直到充满，流出主恩惠。

三　绝对分别出来，归于神旨意！

走主所走道路，靠著祂恩力；

撇弃安逸、享乐，随主向前进；

等候祂的引导，静听祂声音。

四　绝对分别出来，一直到永世；

不要我的心意，乃要祂意旨；

我的计划、愿望，在祂全灭没；

似乎一无所有，万有实属我。

五　绝对分别出来，何等的甜美，

作祂爱的俘虏，自由何宝贵；

脱离罪的辖制、疑惑与恐惧，

脱离所有重担、忧愁和挂虑。

六　绝对分别出来，何等的安息，

在祂面前等候，照祂的心意；

等候得著充满，满有祂圣灵，

将我里面各部完全都炼净。

七　祂灵将我充满，带著祂同在！

在祂我蒙祝福，在祂我蒙爱！

今后里面亮光永不再变暗，

如此向祂活著，分别到永远。

434 6.5.6.5.D. with chorus

  1. Utterly abandoned To the Holy Ghost!

Seeking all His fulness At whatever cost;

Cutting all the shorelines, Launching in the deep

Of His mighty power, Strong to save and keep.

Utterly abandoned To the Lord of all,

Seeking all His fulness, Answ’ring His dear call.

  1. Utterly abandoned To the Holy Ghost!

Oh! the sinking, sinking, Till the self is lost!

Till the vessel’s emptied Broken at His feet;

Waiting till His filling Makes the work complete.

  1. Utterly abandoned To the will of God;

Walking in the pathway That my Master trod;

Leaving ease and pleasure; Making Him my’choice,

Waiting for His guidance, Listening for His voice.

  1. Utterly abandoned! Through eternity;

My will never choosing, His it e’er shall be;

All my plans and longings Lost in His sweet will,

Having nothing, owning All things in Him still.

  1. Utterly abandoned! ’Tis so sweet to be

Captive in His love-bonds, Yet so wondrous free;

Free from sin’s dominion, Free from doubt and fear,

Free from every worry, Burden, grief or care.

  1. Utterly abandoned! Oh, the rest is sweet,

Waiting in His presence At His blessed feet;

Waiting for the filling Of the Host divine,

Who my inward parts shall Perfectly refine.

  1. Lo! His Spirit fills me, With His presence sweet!

I, in Him, am blessed! I, in Him, complete!

Now the light within me Never shall grow dim

While abandoned ever, Living unto Him!

435 奉献归主——完全降服于祂

一　求主把我捆绑，

我才得著释放；

愿主迫我向主缴械，

我才得胜奏捷；

当我倚靠自己，

我就失败危亟；

当主膀臂将我围困，

我手就更有劲。

二　我心未交主时，

真是软弱愚痴，

自己所愿自己不行，

万事漂流无定；

主若未加锁炼，

就难自由进前，

求主慈爱将它奴隶，

它才会得能力。

三　我的生命未死，

终身总是丧失：

胜少败多，实无能力，

时为肉体叹息。

我若没有死过，

我就难以活著，

求主使我脱离自己，

才会完全得你。

四　我今认识了你，

也略知道自己，

所以今后真不愿意

再藉天然能力。

求主永远的灵，

使我生命全钉，

使我治死肉体行为，

主兴盛，我衰微。

435 6.6.8.6.D.

  1. Make me a captive, Lord,
    And then I shall be free;
    Force me to render up my sword,
    And I shall conq’ror be.
    I sink in life’s alarms
    When by myself I stand,
    Imprison me within Thine arms,
    And strong shall be my hand.

  2. My heart is weak and poor

Until it master find:
It has no spring of action sure,
It varies with the wind;
It cannot freely move
Till Thou hast wrought its chain;
Enslave it with Thy matchless love,
And deathless it shall reign.

  1. My power is faint and low

Till I have learned to serve:

It wants the needed fire to glow,

It wants the breeze to nerve;

It cannot drive the world

Until itself be driven;

Its flag can only be unfurled

When Thou shalt breathe from heaven.

  1. My will is not my own
    Till Thou hast made it Thine;
    If it would reach the monarch’s throne
    It must its crown resign;
    It only stands unbent
    Amid the clashing strife,
    When on Thy bosom it has leant,
    And found in Thee its life.

436 奉献归主——分别出来归于祂

一　我已转身背向俗世，

和它一切的欢娱；

我已心向更美的事，

就是天上的储蓄；

一切虚荣、一切扬显，

不能使我再逗留；

我已越过分别界线，

世界已丢在背后。

(和)远远丢背后，

远远丢背后，

我已越过分别界线，

世界已丢在背后。

二　我已脱离罪的生活，

弃绝所有的愚行；

我今主里生活、动作，

只愿听祂的命令；

我已靠主出死入生，

十架已将我拯救；

　 我愿为祂舍去名声，

世界已丢在背后。

(和) 远远丢背后，

远远丢背后，

就愿为祂舍去所有，

世界已丢在背后。

三　我今永远不再回到

旧日愚昧的地位；

惟独在此才有恩召，

完全安息、不定罪；

我今已经更换主人，

对祂我要永伺候；

我今在此永弃红尘，

世界已丢在背后。

(和) 远远丢背后，

远远丢背后，

地的捆绑就此脱尽，

世界已丢在背后。

四 我的前途，一定永定，

我并不要别救主；

我也不求更好福音，

过于祂赐的宽恕；

我心已经决定事神，

无论如何不回头；

已往一切实为可恨，

世界已丢在背后。

(和) 远远丢背后，

远远丢背后，

已往一切实为可恨，

世界已丢在背后。

436 8.7.8.7.D.

  1. I’ve turned my back upon the world

With all its idle pleasures,

And set my heart on better things,

On higher, holier treasures;

No more its glitter and its glare,

And vanity shall blind me;

I’ve crossed the separating line,

And left the world behind me.

Far, far behind me!

Far, far behind me!

I’ve crossed the separating line,

And left the world behind me.

  1. I’ve left the old sad life of sin,

Its follies all forsaken;

My standing place is now in Christ,

His holy vows I’ve taken;

Beneath the standard of the cross

The world henceforth shall find me;

I’ve passed in Christ from death to life,

And left the world behind me.

Far, far behind me!

Far, far behind me!

I’ve passed in Christ from death to life,

And left the world behind me.

  1. My soul shall ne’er return again

Back to its former station,

For here alone is perfect peace,

And rest from condemnation;

I’ve made exchange of masters now,

The vows of glory bind me,

And once for all I’ve left the world,

Yes, left the world behind me.

Far, far behind me!

Far, far behind me!

And once for all I’ve left the world,

Yes, left the world behind me.

  1. My choice is made forevermore,

I want no other Savior;

I ask no purer happiness

Than His sweet love and favor;

My heart is fixed on Jesus Christ,

No more the world shall blind me;

I’ve crossed the Red Sea of His death,

And left the world behind me.

Far, far behind me!

Far,’ far behind me!

I’ve crossed the Red Sea of His death,

And left the world behind me.

437 奉献归主——跟随祂

一　我今愿跟随救主，不论走何路：

　　或是平坦大路，或是崎岖窄途；

　　既有救主亲自相辅，我就不踌躇，

　　一路跟随耶稣，直到进国度。

(和)跟随！跟随！我愿跟随耶稣！

　　不论福，不论苦，我必跟随主！

　　跟随！跟随！我愿跟随耶稣！

　　不论领我何处，我必跟随主！

二　我今愿跟随救主，不论在何处：

　　或在明媚乐土，或在死荫幽谷；

　　既有救主亲自照护，我就不感苦；

　　处处跟随耶稣，直到末一步。

三　我今愿跟随救主，不论时何如：

　　或是阳光满目，或是黑云密布；

　　既有救主亲自部署，我就无所顾；

　　时时跟随耶稣，一直到天曙。

437 Irregular Meter

  1. Down in the valley with my Savior I would go,

Where the flowers are blooming and the sweet waters flow;

Everywhere He leads me I would follow, follow on,

Walking in His footsteps till the crown be won.

Follow! follow! I would follow Jesus!

Anywhere, everywhere, I would follow on!

Follow! follow! I would follow Jesus!

Everywhere He leads me I would follow on!

  1. Down in the valley with my Savior I would go,

Where the storms are sweeping and the dark waters flow;

With His hand to lead me I will never, never fear,

Dangers cannot fright me if my Lord is near.

  1. Down in the valley, or upon the mountain steep,

Close beside my Savior would my heart ever keep;

He will lead me safely in the path that He has trod,

Up to where they gather in the rest of God.

438 奉献归主——跟随祂

一　我当如何爱我的主？

如何奉献使祂欢喜？

不稍离开祂的道路，

学习如何与祂亲密？

二 穷困、忧患、被人厌弃，

劳苦重担，寄身陋屋，

荆棘冠冕，虚伪礼仪─

难道这是奉献道路？

三　我的途径若是痛苦，

主，我求你，禁我退缩，

使我仍然向你顺服，

追忆你的十架重负。

四　让我思念，你曾如何

离开许多纯洁乐事，

来忧、来饿、来倦、来渴，

无家之夜，不息之日。

五　为我来忧、来倦、来死，

你来不求自己喜悦；

地上安逸虽难推辞，

我岂爱你不胜这些？

六　是的，我算万事为损，

为要来得你的注意；

丢弃万事虽如土粪，

为著爱你有何可惜？

(英诗无第六节)

438 8.8.8.8.

  1. How shall I follow Him I serve?

How shall I copy Him I love?

Nor from those blessed footsteps swerve,

Which lead me to His seat above?

  1. Privations, sorrows, bitter scorn,
    The life of toil, the mean abode,
    The faithless kiss, the crown of thorn—
    Are these the consecrated road?

  2. Lord, should my path through suff’ring lie,
    Forbid it I should e’er repine;
    Still let me turn to Calvary,
    Nor heed my griefs, rememb’ring Thine.

  3. O let me think how Thou didst leave
    Untasted every pure delight,
    To fast, to faint, to watch, to grieve,
    The toilsome day, the homeless night:

  4. To faint, to grieve, to die for me!
    Thou camest, not Thyself to please;
    And, dear as earthly comforts be,
    Shall I not love Thee more than these?

439 奉献归主——为祂而活

一　活著为耶稣，只望能单纯，

所有的一切都求祂喜悦，

自动并乐意来向祂投顺，

这是我蒙神赐福的秘诀。

(和)耶稣我主，我救主，

我将自己给你，

因你为我代死时，

给的是你自己；

从此，我无别的主，

我心是你宝座，

我的一生一世，基督，

只要为你生活。

二　活著为耶稣，祂为我缘故，

在十字架上担当罪与羞，

这爱激励我答应祂招呼，

恭敬向著祂奉献我所有。

三　活著为耶稣，无论在何处，

我为祂缘故，作成祂事务，

甘愿来承受损失或痛苦，

看每个试炼是十架一部。

四　活著为耶稣，时间已短促，

祂的笑脸是我宝贵秘密，

寻找失丧者，祂死所救赎，

带领疲倦者，享受祂安息。

439 10.10.10.10. with chorus Thomas O. Chisholm

  1. Living for Jesus a life that is true,
    Striving to please Him in all that I do;
    Yielding allegiance, glad-hearted and free,
    This is the pathway of blessing for me.

O Jesus, Lord and Savior,

I give myself to Thee,

For Thou, in Thy atonement,

Didst give Thyself for me;

I own no other Master,

My heart shall be Thy throne,

My life I give, henceforth to live,

O Christ, for Thee alone.

  1. Living for Jesus who died in my place,

Bearing on Calv’ry my sin and disgrace;

Such love constrains me to answer His call,

Follow His leading and give Him my all.

  1. Living for Jesus wherever I am,

Doing each duty in His holy name;

Willing to suffer affliction and loss,

Deeming each trial a part of my cross.

  1. Living for Jesus through earth’s little while,

My dearest treasure, the light of His smile;

Seeking the lost ones He died to redeem,

Bringing the weary to find rest in Him.

440 奉献归主——完全降服于祂

一　我的荣耀、得胜君王，

我举双手降服于你；

我的意志向你投降，

作你座前快乐奴隶。

二　我主，领我到你门口，

我耳甘愿被你穿透；

你的捆索是真自由；

服你、事你，没有怨尤。

三　思想、意志、我耳、我手，

都归你作爱的奴役！

甘愿舍弃我的自由，

服你脚下，永不背离。

四　在你脚下；我才知晓

你的恩赐溢我双手；

被穿耳朵方始听到

细语告我：“我归你有。”

440 8.8.8.8.

  1. My glorious Victor, Prince Divine,
    Clasp these surrendered hands in Thine;
    At length my will is all Thine own,
    Glad vassal of a Savior’s throne.

  2. My Master, lead me to Thy door;

Pierce this now willing ear once more;
Thy bonds are freedom; let me stay
With Thee, to toil, endure, obey.

  1. Yes, ear and hand, and thought and will,

Use all in Thy dear slav’ry still!

Self’s weary liberties I cast

Beneath Thy feet; there keep them fast.

  1. Tread them still down; and then I know,
    These hands shall with Thy gifts o’erfiow;
    And pierced ears shall hear the tone
    Which tells me Thou and I are one.

441 奉献归主——跟随祂

一　我今撇下一切事物，

背十架跟耶稣；

甘受藐视、厌弃、贫苦，

一心跟主走窄路。

前我所爱、所慕、所求，

今与雄心同归尽；

但我又是何等丰优，

神与基督是我分。

二　让这世界弃我、嫌我，

恩主也曾被弃嫌；

人面、人心，欺我、骗我，

惟你永远不欺骗。

当你向我显出笑脸，

友虽生疏敌虽险，

但我心安，处之泰然，

因我得见你欢颜。

三　人虽逼我使我苦痛，

不过驱我到你前；

世间苦难压我愈重，

天上平安愈甘甜。

有何忧苦能将我袭，

当你赐我你爱怜。

有何快乐能将我迷，

若你不在它里面。

四　向前！由恩进入荣耀，

信当藤牌，求当翼；

永世日子就要破晓，

主必领我直到底。

地上职事就要停止，

作客旅程就要完，

盼望就要变成事实，

信变眼见，求变赞。

441 8.7.8.7.D.

  1. Jesus, I my cross have taken,
    All to leave and follow Thee;
    Destitute, despised, forsaken,
    Thou, from hence, my all shalt be.
    Perish every fond ambition,
    All I’ve sought, and hoped, and known;
    Yet how rich is my condition,
    God and Christ are still my own!

  2. Let the world despise and leave me,

They have left my Savior, too;
Human hearts and looks deceive me;
Thou art not, like man, untrue;
And, while Thou shalt smile upon me,
God of wisdom, love, and might,
Foes may hate, and friends disown me;
Show Thy face, and all is bright.

  1. Man may trouble and distress me,

‘Twill but drive me to Thy breast;

Life with trials hard may press me,

Christ will bring me sweeter rest.

O ’tis not in grief to harm me,

While Thy love is left to me;

O ‘twere not in joy to charm me,

Were that joy unmixed with Thee.

  1. Haste thee on from grace to glory,

Armed by faith and winged by prayer;

God’s eternal day’s before thee,

God’s own hand shall guide thee there.

Soon shall close thy earthly mission,

Swift shall pass thy pilgrim days,

Hope shall change to glad fruition,

Faith to sight, and prayer to praise.

442 奉献归主——跟随祂

一　我今已定意跟随主耶稣，

我今已定意跟随主耶稣，

我今已定意跟随主耶稣，

不再回头，不再回头。

二　我面向十架，世界丢背后，

我面向十架，世界丢背后；

我面向十架，世界丢背后；

不再回头，不再回头。

三　即使无别人，我仍要跟随；

即使无别人，我仍要跟随；

即使无别人，我仍要跟随；

不再回头，不再回头。

四　有主引领我，我当然跟随；

有主引领我，我当然跟随；

有主引领我，我当然跟随；

不再回头，不再回头。

五　唱荣耀、荣耀，唱阿利路亚；

唱荣耀、荣耀，唱阿利路亚；

唱荣耀、荣耀，唱，阿利路亚；

不再回头，不再回头。

442 10.10.10.8.

  1. I have decided to follow Jesus,

I have decided to follow Jesus,

I have decided to follow Jesus,

No turning back, no turning back.

  1. The world behind me, the cross before me,

The world behind me, the cross before me,

The world behind me, the cross before me,

No turning back, no turning back.

  1. Though none go with me, still I will follow.

Though none go with me, still I will follow.

Though none go with me, still I will follow,

No turning back, no turning back.

  1. Where Jesus leads me, I’ll surely follow.

Where Jesus leads me, I’ll surely follow.

Where Jesus leads me, I’ll surely follow,

No turning back, no turning back.

  1. Sing glory, glory and hallelujah.

Sing glory, glory and hallelujah.

Sing glory, glory and hallelujah,

No turning back, no turning back.

443 奉献归主——无上的特权

一　当人弃绝地的贿赂，

前来为神而活，

他的所得无限富有，

口舌难以述说，

因为万有全是他的，

生、死，或是事、物；

基督是他生命、呼吸，

也是他的住处。

二　像我这人，王肯选上，

有分祂的宝座，

而我竟然不肯应选，

这是何其奇特！

永远勿说这是牺牲！

无论代价若干，

只要能入加略圣军，

乃是难言特权。

三　起来！将这交易算看：

零碎换来整个－

万事、万物、加上万人，

竟都归你得著。

当你属祂，万有属你，

并且祂你合一；

你还得享无限生命，

权益有何能比！

443 8.6.8.6.D.

  1. No mortal tongue can e’er describe

The freedom of the soul,

When passed beyond all earthly bribe

To God’s complete control.

All things are his, yes, life, and death,

Things present or to come;

In Christ he draws in peace each breath,

In Christ he finds his home.

  1. When such as we the King can choose,

To share with Him His throne,

’Tis passing strange that we refuse

To be our Lord’s alone.

O never speak of sacrifice!

A privilege untold

Is to be His at any price,

In Calv’ry’s hosts enrolled.

  1. Arise! the holy bargain strike—

The fragment for the whole—

All men and all events alike

Must serve the ransomed soul.

All things are yours when you are His,

And He and you are one;

A boundless life in Him there is,

Whence doubt and fear are gone.

444 奉献归主——甘心受苦

一　众人涌进主的国度，

十架少人负；

众人争夺主的赏赐，

世界有谁辞？

人虽无心走主道路，

仍想主祝福！

人虽无心走主道路，

仍想主祝福！

二　多人都贪享主甘旨，

少有愿禁食！

多人都喜登主宝座，

少有愿飘泊！

同祂唱诗虽然有人，

儆醒却不能。

同祂唱诗虽然有人，

儆醒却不能。

三　众人都想同主高贵，

卑贱却都畏。

当主凡事为他豫备，

就大声赞美；

当主稍微求他一点，

就立发怨言。

当主稍微求他一点，

就立发怨言。

四　但那诚实爱主的人，

祸福都不问，

就是他们宝贵心血，

也愿为主舍；

求主给我这样心志，

赤忠忘生死。

求主给我这样心志，

赤忠忘生死。

444 8.5.8.5.D.

  1. Many crowd the Savior’s kingdom,
    Few receive His cross;
    Many seek His consolation,
    Few will suffer loss.
    For the dear sake of the Master,
    Counting all but dross,
    For the dear sake of the Master,
    Counting all but dross.

  2. Many sitat Jesus’ table,

Few will fast with Him,
When the sorrow-cup of anguish
Trembles to the brim.
Few watch with Him in the garden,
Who have sung the hymn,
Few watch with Him in the garden,
Who have sung the hymn.

  1. Many will confess His wisdom,

Few embrace His shame.

Many, should He smile upon them,

Will His praise proclaim;

Then, if for a while He leave them,

They desert His name,

Then, if for a while He leave them,

They desert His name.

  1. But the souls who love Him truly,

Let woe come or bliss,

These will count their dearest hearts’ blood

Not their own, but His.

Savior, Thou who thus hast loved me,

Give me love like this,

Savior, Thou who thus hast loved me,

Give me love like this.

445 奉献归主——甘心受苦

一　我是否要背负十架，

跟从神的羔羊？

我岂可以怕出代价，

要得世界原谅？

(和)因你名，宝贵的名，

因你为我舍命，

靠恩，无论如何艰难，

我要求你喜欢。

二　别人苦战要得荣耀，

血汗满被沙场；

我岂可以安坐花轿，

被抬直到天上？

三　难道我无仇敌当拒？

我无破口当堵？

难道俗世也可相与？

也可作我帮助？

四　我要掌权，就得争战，

哦主，加我力量；

我愿受辱，我不畏难，

靠你话语刚强。

445 8.6.8.6. with chorus

  1. Am I a soldier of the Cross—

A follower of the Lamb?

And shall I fear to own His cause,

Or blush to speak His name?

In the name, the precious name,

Of Him who died for me,

Through grace I’ll win the promised crown,

Whate’er my cross may be.

  1. Must I be carried to the skies

On flowery beds of ease,

While others fought to win the prize

And sailed through bloody seas?

  1. Are there no foes for me to face?

Must I not stem the flood?

Is this vile world a friend to grace,

To help me on to God?

  1. Since I must fight if I would reign,

Increase my courage, Lord!

I’ll bear the toil, endure the pain,

Supported by Thy Word.

446 奉献归主——在主这一边

一　谁是在主这边？

谁要事奉王？

谁要作祂助手，

去为祂救亡？

谁要撇开世界，

去为主争战？

谁是在主这边，

跟随主向前？

(和)借著你的救赎，

并藉你恩典，

可爱、荣耀救主，

我在你这边。

二　参加主的军队，

欢乐去争战，

不是为著荣耀，

不是为冠冕；

乃是因著主爱

激励我向前；

我既蒙祂恩待，

该在祂这边。

三　你已将我救赎，

作你的子民，

乃是用你宝血，

不是用金银；

凡来跟从你者，

得福都无限；

你使我们甘愿

且自由向前。

四　战争虽会凶猛，

仇敌也强悍；

但是主的军队，

无人能击散。

在祂大纛之下，

必定能得胜，

因祂真实、不变，

奏凯已确定。

五　蒙主选为兵丁，

在今世争战，

我当完全忠心，

随元帅向前；

如此服事我王，

切勿变冷淡，

守住高贵身份，

忠贞又勇敢。

446 6.5.6.5.D. with chorus.

  1. Who is on the Lord’s side?

Who will serve the King?

Who will be His helpers,

Other lives to bring?

Who will leave the world’s side?

Who will face the foe?

Who is on the Lord’s side?

Who for Him will go?

By Thy grand redemption,

By Thy grace divine,

We are on the Lord’s side;

Savior, we are Thine.

  1. Not for weight of glory,
    Not for crown and palm,
    Enter we the army,
    Raise the warrior psalm;
    But for love that claimeth
    Lives for whom He died;
    He whom Jesus nameth
    Must be on His side.

  2. Jesus, Thou hast bought us,
    Not with gold or gem,
    But with Thine own life-blood,
    For Thy diadem;
    With Thy blessing filling
    Each who comes to Thee,
    Thou hast made us willing,
    Thou hast made us free.

  3. Fierce may. be the conflict,

Strong may be the foe,

But the King’s own army

None can overthrow.

Round His standard ranging

Victory is secure,

For His truth unchanging

Makes the triumph sure.

  1. Chosen to be soldiers
    In an alien land:
    Chosen, called, and faithful,
    For our Captain’s band;
    In the service royal
    Let us not grow cold;
    Let us be right loyal,
    Noble, true, and bold.

447 经历主——与祂合一

一　与你合一，恩主耶稣，

与你合一在灵里；

凡你所是都活我里，

我今得享你自己。

(和)合为一，合为一，

我与你合为一；

你的丰富是我供给，

我的一切全是你。

二　今享你的属人生命，

丰满有你的人性，

所有你的完全顺从，

都能用于我人生。

三　与你合一，在十架上，

在你里面我已死；

我向世界已经死了，

世界向我也如此。

四　与你合一，在复活里，

现今与你同活著；

复活生命——你的自己－

在我里面供应我。

五　与你合一，在升天里，

现今同你坐天上；

在这地上乃是旅客，

我的真命在你藏。

六　与你合一，在宝座上，

有分于你的权柄，

如同有分于你生命，

同一性情，同一灵。

447 8.7.8.7. with chorus

  1. I am one with Thee, Lord Jesus,

One in spirit now with Thee;

All Thyself I now possess, Lord,

All Thou art now lives in me.

One with Thee, one with Thee,

One with Thee, one with Thee;

Day by day I share Thy riches,

Thou art everything to me.

  1. Now I share Thy human life, Lord,

Filled with Thy humanity,

All of Thy complete obedience

Is available to me.

  1. One with Thee in crucifixion,

On the cross I died in Thee;

I am dead unto the world, Lord,

And the world is dead to me.

  1. One with Thee in resurrection,

Risen now to live in Thee,

With that life which is Thyself, Lord,

Now in me, Lord, even me.

  1. One with Thee in Thine ascension,

In the heavens now with Thee;

Here a pilgrim and a stranger,

My true life is hid in Thee.

  1. One with Thee in Thine enthronement,

Sharing Thine authority,

Even as I share Thy life, Lord,

I in Thee and Thou in me.

448 经历主——与祂合一

一　与你合一，永远之子，

因信与你成一灵，

得你包罗万有的死，

和非受造的生命。

与你合一，蒙爱之子，

藉恩成为你一部，

与你同为父的后嗣，

并作圣灵的房屋。

二　与你合一，化身之子，

作你奥秘的肢体，

因你诞生，与你连枝，

与你一同客此地。

与你合一，受膏之子，

同得圣灵的能力，

日复一日，时复一时，

与你合作不稍离。

三　与你合一，被弃之子，

经过审判和咒诅，

永远同你向罪而死，

并胜凶恶的阴府。

与你合一，复活之子，

脱离坟墓的埋没，

因你更生，同你更始，

靠你逐日结义果。

四　与你合一，升天之子，

同登宝座来管治，

你的权柄我也掌执，

因我和你同位置。

与你合一，再来之子，

同得荣耀同临世，

那时都要显你殊姿，

与你合一无已时。

448 8.7.8.7.D.

  1. One with Thee, Thou Son eternal,
    Joined by faith in spirit one,
    Share we in Thy death inclusive
    And Thy life, O God the Son.
    One with Thee, Thou Son beloved,
    Part of Thee become thru grace,
    Heirs with Thee of our one Father,
    We’re Thy Spirit’s dwelling place.

  2. One with Thee, Thou Son incarnate,

Born with Thee, the Man of worth,
We, the members of Thy body,
Sojourn with Thee here on earth.
One with Thee, Thou Son anointed,
Sharing too the Spirit’s power,
We in full cooperation
Labor with Thee hour by hour.

  1. One with Thee, Thou Son forsaken,

Judgment and the curse we’ve passed;

We to sin are dead forever,

Hell beneath our feet is cast.

One with Thee in resurrection,

Death can never us oppress;

Live we in Thy new creation,

Bearing fruits of righteousness.

  1. One with Thee, Thou Son ascended,
    Seated with Thee on the throne,
    Thine authority we share and
    Rule with Thee, Thy rank our own.
    One with Thee, Thou Son returning,
    Glorified with Thee we’ll be,
    E’er to manifest Thy beauty,
    One with Thee eternally.

449 经历主——在祂的死和复活里

一　与基督同死，祂死算我死；

与基督同起，我有祂生命；

与基督同升，我超过此世；

主，时时刻刻，我归于你名。

(和)我时时刻刻蒙祂爱保守，

我时时刻刻从祂得生命，

我时时刻刻在祂前等候，

我时时刻刻归于祂的名。

二　没有一争战，祂是不参与；

没有一战事，祂是不表态；

祂为我举起得胜的旌旗；

我时时刻刻受祂的领率。

三　没有一试炼，祂是不同在；

没有一重担，祂是不与共；

没有一痛苦，祂是不担代；

我时时刻刻在祂眷顾中。

四　没有一寂寞、没有一感伤、

没有一叹息、没有一郁闷、

没有一艰难，——但在宝座上，

祂时时刻刻思念祂的人。

五　没有一软弱，祂不曾扶助；

没有一疾病，祂不能医治；

哦，时时刻刻，无论乐或苦，

耶稣我救主，与我同行止。

449 10.10.10.10.D.

  1. Dying with Jesus, by death reckoned mine;

Living with Jesus a new life divine;

Looking to Jesus till glory doth shine,

Moment by moment, O Lord, I am Thine.

Moment by moment I’m kept in His love,

Moment by moment I’ve life from above;

Looking to Jesus till glory doth shine;

Moment by moment, O Lord, I am Thine.

  1. Never a battle with wrong for the right,

Never a contest that He doth not fight;

Lifting above us His banner so white;

Moment by moment I’m kept in His sight.

  1. Never a trial that He is not there,

Never a burden that He doth not bear;

Never a sorrow that He doth not share,

Moment by moment, I’m under His care.

  1. Never a heartache, and never a groan,

Never a teardrop, and never a moan;

Never a danger but there on the throne

Moment by moment He thinks of His own.

  1. Never a weakness that He doth not feel,
    Never a sickness that He cannot heal;
    Moment by moment, in woe or in weal,
    Jesus, my Savior, abides with me still.

450 经历主——在祂的死和复活里

一　与主同葬，也一同复活，

还有甚么留给我去作？

只要我不再奋斗击空，

只要我照新生而举动。

　　荣耀归于神！

二　与主我的元首同复活，

我今在圣洁路上走著；

当我向前时，我就想到：

“死的人脱罪”是何其好！

荣耀归于神！

三　与主同活，祂永不再死；

与主同行，祂永不会迟；

我天天算自己已经死，

所以我就从捆绑得释。

荣耀归于神！

四　为主活著，我献上肢体，

永远归神，作祂的奴隶。

我今在恩下，不在法下，

罪已失势，主代兴管辖。

荣耀归于神！

五　靠主长大，我今真惭愧

再题到我已往的宝贵；

我愿意结出成圣果子，

满足神心意，遵行神旨。

荣耀归于神！

450 9.8.9.9.5.

  1. Buried with Christ, and raised with Him too;

What is there left for me to do?

Simply to cease from struggling and strife,

Simply to walk in newness of life.

Glory be to God!

  1. Risen with Christ, my glorious Head,

Holiness now the pathway I tread,

Beautiful thought, while walking therein:

He that is dead is freed from sin.

Glory be to God!

  1. Living with Christ, who dieth no more,

Following Christ, who goeth before;

I am from bondage utterly freed,

Reckoning self as dead indeed.

Glory be to God!

  1. Living for Christ, my members I yield,

Servants to God, for evermore sealed,

Not under law, I’m now under grace,

Sin is dethroned, and Christ takes its place.

Glory be to God!

  1. Growing in Christ; no more shall be named

Things of which now I’m truly ashamed,

Fruit unto holiness will I bear,

Life evermore, the end I shall share.

Glory be to God!

451 经历主——在祂的死和复活里

一　主，你启示一个奥秘，

就是我同你死的理，

　　不用别法，不用别能，

我就看见完全得胜。

二　你的十架就是我的，

其光照耀我生命里；

　　一信与你同钉那里，

世界失去它的能力。

三　我既与你十架同钉，

胜过罪恶﹑自己﹑人情，

　　就怎能还追求地物？

就怎能再盼望世福？

四　因此，我便到你那里，

与你同站十架死地，

　　你命﹑你权﹑全是我的，

因我与你合而为一。

五　你既是来败坏仇敌

一切作为﹑权势﹑能力，

　　我自然可和你同胜，

天天经历你的大能。

六　但是我主，我们只能

靠著你的十架得胜；

　　你走的路，我们当走，

直到与你见面时候。

七　我今接受你的同钉，

求你所赐永远的灵，

　　使我更懂你死意义，

使我脱离罪﹑己﹑肉体。

八　我愿得胜像你得胜！

与你同王，同得权能！

　　背负十架，我们若肯，

这些荣耀必定有分！

451 8.8.8.8.

  1. Lord, Thou hast shown the mystery,
    How on the Cross I died with Thee;
    I need no other pow’r or way
    That I may triumph day by day.

  2. That cross of Thine is also mine,
    Into my life its light doth shine;
    When I believe I’m dead with Thee,
    The world has lost its pow’r o’er me.

  3. Since I am crucified with Thee,

From sin and self I am set free;
How can I still enjoy the world
Or seek its vanities unfurled?

  1. I take my place, dear Lord, with Thee

Upon the cross of Calvary.

Thy life and power then are mine,

Since Thou and I in oneness twine.

  1. Since Thou didst come to slay the foe,

His work and power to overthrow,

I too can overcome in Thee

And prove Thy mighty pow’r in me.

  1. Yet, for the vict’ry we rely

Upon the death which Thou didst die;
We tread the path which Thou hast trod
Until we reach the goal in God.

  1. My death with Thee I now believe

And all its meaning would receive.

Thy death more deeply show to me,

That from my flesh I may be free.

  1. I long to win as Thou hast won,

To reign with Thee when Thou dost come.
If we the cross will gladly bear,
Then in Thy glory we will share.

452 经历主——在祂的自由里

一　罪律辖制的囚徒，

今已完全释放！

生命之灵的活律，

从里使你刚强。

依靠生命之圣灵，

祂就要来管理：

你魂对外的门户

你身上众肢体。

二　你已与主同钉死，

在祂里已释放！

从里到外，祂早已

毁坏罪的力量。

身体不再如无“律”，

可以任意而行；

昔无忌惮，今则有

“生命之律”执政。

三　深深栽于主的死，

在祂里已得释！

生命之气向你吹，

生命大能开释。

生命复苏的力量，

你灵里渐增强；

魂与身体受管治，

肢体不再抵抗。

四　今与复活主联结，

在祂里面释放！

藉争战祷告奏凯，

加略得胜同享。

因祂自由得释放，

胜过黑暗军旅；

祂的生命已胜过，

罪与死亡之律。

452 7.6.7.6.D.

  1. Made free! Made free! O captive!

Bound by the law of sin,
The law of life in Spirit
Will quicken you within.
And counting on the Spirit,
His life shall now control
The members of your body,
The portals of your soul.

  1. Made free! Made free in Jesus:

For crucified with Him,

From center to circumf’rence,

He breaks the power of sin.

No longer act in body

As if it had no “law”;

His “law of life” must govern

All that ran wild before.

  1. Made free! Made free in Jesus:

Deep planted in His death,

He liberates His life pow’r,

And breathes His Spirit’s breath.

Then waxing strong in spirit,

With force of quickening life;

The soul and body governed,

Its members cease from strife!

  1. Made free! Made free in Jesus:

Joined to the Risen One,

By conflict prayer you triumph,

And claim His victory won.

Freed with His glorious freedom,

Above the darkness rife;

For now the law of sin and death

Is conquered by His life.

453 经历主——在祂的美丽里

真美丽，真美丽，

耶稣真是美丽，

耶稣使我生命中事物美丽。

关怀我，感动我，

使我眼被开启，

耶稣使我生命中事物美丽。

453 6.6.11.6.6.10. Dennis Cleveland

Beautiful, beautiful,

Jesus is beautiful;

And Jesus makes beautiful things of my life.

Carefully touching me,

Causing my eyes to see;

Jesus makes beautiful things of my life.

454 经历主——在祂的美丽里

一　我本瞎眼，不能看见

主的面貌所显恩典，

但今你的美丽脸面

向我射出灿烂光线。

二　我本耳聋，不能听见

主口所出一切美言；

但今欢欣，因已听见

你的声音何其甘甜！

三　我本哑口，不能发表

主名所含恩典﹑荣耀；

但今已被圣火点著，

我唇将你赞美﹑称道。

四　我本死沉，对你冷漠，

不肯前来得主丰富；

但今你已将我点活，

脱离罪的黑暗坟墓。

五　主，你已使盲者复明，

聋者听见，哑者发言，

死者得活；看哪，我今

断开一切捆我锁炼！

454 8.8.8.8.

  1. Lord, I was blind; I could not see
    In Thy marred visage any grace,
    But now the beauty of Thy face
    In radiant vision dawns on me.

  2. Lord, I was deaf; I could not hear
    The thrilling music of Thy voice;
    But now I hear Thee and rejoice,
    And all Thine uttered words are dear!

  3. Lord, I was dumb; I could not speak

The grace and glory of Thy name;
But now, as touched with living flame,
My lips Thine eager praises wake.

  1. Lord, I was dead; I could not stir

My lifeless soul to come to Thee;

But now, since Thou hast quickened me,

I rise from sin’s dark sepulcher.

  1. For Thou hast made the blind to see,
    The deaf to hear, the dumb to speak,
    The dead to live; and, lo, I break
    The chains of my captivity.

455 经历主——在祂的爱里

一　以爱为旗在我以上，

以爱为旗在我以上；

祂带我进入祂的筵宴所，

祂以爱为旗在我以上。

(和)以爱！以爱！

以爱为旗在我以上；

祂带我进入祂的筵宴所，

祂以爱为旗在我以上。

二　祂的果子何其甘甜，

祂的果子何其甘甜；

我在祂的筵宴所里饱尝，

哦，祂的果子何其甘甜。

(和)甘甜！甘甜！

祂的果子何其甘甜；

我在祂的筵宴所里饱尝，

哦，祂的果子何其甘甜。

455 Irregular Meter

  1. His banner over me is love,

His banner over me is love;

He brought me into His banqueting house,

And His banner over me is love.

Is love! Is love!

His banner over me is love;

He brought me into His banqueting house,

And His banner over me is love.

  1. His fruit is sweet unto my taste,

His fruit is sweet unto my taste;

I’m feasting here in His banqueting house,

And His fruit is sweet unto my taste.

How sweet! How sweet!

His fruit is sweet unto my taste;

I’m feasting here in His banqueting house,

And His fruit is sweet unto my taste.

456 经历主——在祂的宝贵里

一　耶稣在我灵里，

无何比此更宝贵！

祂除去我挂虑，

满有平安滋味。

祂绝不我弃，

虽我日久渐疲惫；

永远和我一起，

我乐藏身在祂的膀臂。

(和)我求祂名：“主耶稣，来帮助我的软弱。”

祂的生命，每日在我里面供应，

　　是何等稳妥！

二　耶稣在我灵里，

无何比此更宝贵！

祂挽回我心意，

尝祂生命美味。

无一我所为－

乃祂怜悯临到我；

神白白的恩惠，

使我过无穷喜乐生活。

456 Irregular Meter

  1. Nothing’s quite so precious

As Jesus in my spirit.

He takes away the care

And fills me with His peace.

He never leaves me,

E’en as the days grow weary.

His presence goes with me.

My soul delights to hide in His arms.

I call His name, “Lord Jesus, Help me in my weakness.”

So faithfully each day in me

He proves His life is so sufficient.

  1. Nothing’s quite so precious

As Jesus in my spirit.

He tums my heart to Him,

To feast upon His life.

It’s nothing I do—

His mercy’s just upon me.

And God’s free gift of grace

Becomes an endless joy to me.

457 经历主——在祂的宝贵里

一　亲爱主！宝贝主！

我轻视我事物；

有谁像你如此美丽？

如此甘甜？如此柔细？

你是人中无比，

谁能与你相匹？

二　亲爱主！宝贝主！

我听见你招呼；

你的声音入我心内，

我就脱离所有缠累，

骄傲都归虚无，

追求都变庸俗。

三　亲爱主！宝贝主！

我怎能再顽固？

我将刚硬投你脚旁，

领首诗歌回家去唱，

欢喜作你奴仆，

欢喜向你屈服。

四　亲爱主！宝贝主！

我拣选你道路；

一面顺服，一面流泪，

但我不肯改变地位，

我要讨你喜悦，

羡慕爱的暴虐。

五　亲爱主！宝贝主！

自从你去天府，

我脸好像不能再笑，

我天好像不能再晓，

我只想你回来，

我只想你同在。

六　亲爱主！宝贝主！

让我向你倾诉，

你是我所朝夕思慕，

只有你能使我满足，

得你甚么都有，

你外无所要求。

七　亲爱主！宝贝主！

我奉献我事物；

有谁像你如此美丽？

如此甘甜，如此柔细？

你是人中无比，

谁能与你相匹？

457 Irregular Meter

  1. Dear Lord Jesus, precious Jesus,

Thou hast won each love from me;

Who like Thee—so fair and comely?

Who like Thee—so sweet and lovely?

Matchless One, unrivaled beauty,

None can e’er compete with Thee!

  1. Dear Lord Jesus, precious Jesus,

Gladly will I hear Thy call;

Since Thy voice my heart hath entered,

I from all things could but sever;

Void are all my other seekings,

Every pride hath disappeared.

  1. Dear Lord Jesus, precious Jesus,

How can I still stubborn be?

At Thy feet cast all my hard’nings,

And return with songs and singings;

’Tis my love to be Thy bondslave,

’Tis my joy to Thee obey.

  1. Dear Lord Jesus, precious Jesus,

Thy way only will I choose;

Though in tears while I’m obeying,

Yet I would not change my standing;

All I long for is Thy pleasure,

And the peace Thy love would bring.

  1. Dear Lord Jesus, precious Jesus,
    When Thy presence does depart,
    Seems the dawn has lost its traces,
    Hidden am my smiling faces;
    All I yearn for is Thy coming
    And Thy presence’ sweet embrace.

  2. Dear Lord Jesus, precious Jesus,

Can I tell it all to Thee?

Thou my love and satisfaction,

Thou my everlasting portion;

Thou art all that I desire,

Nothing else I would pursue.

  1. Dear Lord Jesus, precious Jesus,

All I have I give to Thee;

Who like Thee—so fair and comely?

Who like Thee—so sweet and lovely?

Matchless One, unrivaled beauty,

None can e’er compete with Thee!

458 经历主——在祂的甘甜里

一　我心感觉天天被吸引，更亲近耶稣；

　　祂比黎明灿烂金色荣光更加耀目；

　　祂是我的幻想与美梦，我心所倾注；

　　祂是天天更加甘甜，今日远胜昨日。

(和)一半也难领略到，金色海岸那边；

　　昨日，今日，到永远，祂是天天更甘甜。

二　当我遥见主，祂的荣光照进我眼目，

　　祂比百合花更鲜艳，比晨星更显著；

　　祂使我渴慕的心灵一再得著满足，

　　祂是天天更加甘甜，今日远胜昨日。

三　我心虽有时沉重，祂慰藉使我心展；

　　当我黯然且神伤，祂怀来将我爱怜；

　　祂如此担我重负，我心怎不将祂恋？

　　祂是天天更加甘甜，今日远胜昨日。

458 14.14.14.14. with chorus

  1. To Jesus ev’ry day I find my heart is closer drawn;

He’s fairer than the glory of the gold and purple dawn;

He’s all my fancy pictures in its fairest dreams, and more;

Each day He grows still sweeter than He was the day before.

The half cannot be fancied this side the golden shore;

Oh, there He’ll be still sweeter than He ever was before.

  1. His glory broke upon me when I saw Him from afar;

He’s fairer than the lily, brighter than the morning star;

He fills and satisfies my longing spirit o’er and o’er,

Each day He grows still sweeter than He was the day before.

  1. My heart is sometimes heavy, but He comes with sweet relief;

He folds me to His bosom when I droop with blighting grief;

I love the Christ who all my burdens in His body bore;

Each day He grows still sweeter than He was the day before.

459 经历主——在祂的甘甜里

一　耶稣，只要一想到你，

我心就满甘甜；

但这甘甜，

还远不及亲眼看见你面。

二　无口能唱，无心能思，

也无记性能忆，

一种声音比你名字

更为甘甜﹑可喜。

三　你是痛悔者的盼望，

温柔者的喜乐；

你对寻求者何善良，

跌倒者何仁德。

四　但对寻得你者如何？

无口无笔能述；

耶稣的爱，其深﹑其阔，

惟被爱者略熟。

五　耶稣！你是世人之光，

你是生命之源！

远超一切我之所享、

一切我所能羡。

六　你外我无别的源头

能解我心干渴；

无穷宝泉！活水涌流！

别流全都干涸。

七　耶稣，你今是我喜乐，

将来是我赏赐；

你是我的荣耀﹑诗歌，

从今直到永世。

459 8.6.8.6.

  1. Jesus, the very thought of Thee

With sweetness fills my breast;

But sweeter far Thy face to see,

And in Thy presence rest.

  1. Nor voice can sing, nor heart can frame,

Nor can the memory find

A sweeter sound than Thy blest Name,

O Savior of mankind!

  1. O Hope of every contrite heart,

O Joy of all the meek,

To those who fall, how kind Thou art!

How good to those who seek!

  1. But what to those who find? Ah, this

Nor tongue nor pen can show;

The love of Jesus, what it is

None but His loved ones know.

  1. O Jesus! light of all below!

Thou fount of life and fire!

Surpassing all the joys we know,

And all we can desire.

  1. No other source have we but Thee,

Soul-thirst to satisfy.

Exhaustless spring! the waters free!

All other streams are dry.

  1. Jesus, our only Joy be Thou,

As Thou our Prize wilt be;

Jesus, be Thou our Glory now,

And through eternity.

460 经历主——在祂的宝贵里

一　凉爽，你像柔和微风，

怎能将你吸够！

芬芳胜过所有花丛，

如同没药在我怀中，

又像天上膏油！

(重唱每节最后一行)

二　滋润，你像清晨甘露，

怎能被你浸够！

新鲜﹑清凉﹑消干﹑解枯、

滋我心情﹑润我深处；

愿你将我浸透。

三　你是美丽中的至美，

怎能将你赏够！

你的面容所发光辉，

使我更感你美可贵：

　　你是美中之首！

四 你是救主、我主、我友，

怎能将你侍够！

我真不愿随意自由，

甘心服事，殷勤不休，

直到一生尽头！

五　你名香甜远超众名，

怎能将你唱够！

我心充满甜美感应，

深愿向你不住颂称！

　　喜乐涌自心头。

六　你的自己可爱﹑饶优，

怎能将你说够！

你心柔细，同情﹑俯就，

吸引我心向你倚投，

　　细语：“有你就够！”

460 8.6.8.8.6.

  1. I cannot breathe enough of Thee,

O gentle breeze of love;

More fragrant than the myrtle tree

The Henna-flower is to me,

The Balm of Heaven above.

(Repeat the last line of each stanza)

(英詩無第二節)

  1. I cannot gaze enough on Thee,

Thou Fairest of the Fair;

My heart is filled with ecstasy,

As in Thy face of radiancy

I see such beauty there.

  1. I cannot yield enough to Thee,

My Savior, Master, Friend;

I do not wish to go out free,

But ever, always, willingly,

To serve Thee to the end.

  1. I cannot sing enough of Thee,

The sweetest name on earth;

A note so full of melody

Comes from my heart so joyously,

And fills my soul with mirth.

  1. I cannot speak enough of Thee,

I have so much to tell;

Thy heart it beats so tenderly

As Thou dost draw me close to Thee,

And whisper, “All is well.”

461 经历主——作我永分

一　耶稣，我主！你是属我，

是父的爱所赐福分；

你的一切所是﹑所作，

今都已成我的永分。

二　贫穷﹑软弱﹑可怜如我，

今竟能归荣耀给你；

我今已蒙宝血洗濯，

使我成为神的公义。

三　你之所有成我永分，

我的泉源藏你里头；

因你我活，欢然承认：

我是无有，你是万有！

四　哦，我救主，教我靠近，

藏在你的受伤肋边，

时刻领受“恩上加恩”，

直至面见你的荣脸。

461 8.8.8.8.

  1. Jesus, my Savior! Thou art mine,
    The Father’s gift of love divine;
    All Thou hast done, and all Thou art,
    Are now the portion of my heart.

  2. Poor, feeble, wretched, as I am,

I now can glory in Thy name;
Now cleansed in Thy most precious blood
And made the righteousness of God.

  1. All that Thou hast Thou hast for me,

All my fresh springs are hid in Thee;

In Thee I live; While I confess

I nothing am, yet all possess.

  1. O Savior, teach me to abide

Close sheltered at Thy wounded side,

Each hour receiving “grace on grace,”

Until I see Thee face to face.

462 经历主——在祂的人性里

一　在旧约圣经里面，

有包金的皂荚木；

何等人性的表显！

赞美主，赞美主，赞美主！

二　耶稣是那皂荚木－

柔细﹑善良的人物；

不能被败坏玷污－

赞美主，赞美主，赞美主！

三　是神子、又是人子，

神的智慧，是耶稣，

新人类从祂开始－

赞美主，赞美主，赞美主！

四　死原从一人而来，

神就藉一人恢复；

生命之气已进来－

赞美主，赞美主，赞美主！

五　将豫表、影儿考查，

知这人就是耶稣。

须让祂在里长大－

阿们，主！阿们，主！阿们，主！

六　但愿你的人性，主，

浸透我全人各部，

好引多人归向主－

阿们，主！阿们，主！阿们，主！

462 Irregular meter

  1. In the Testament of old

See th’ acacia wood with gold;

Such humanity behold!

Praise the Lord, praise the Lord, praise the Lord!

  1. Jesus is th’acacia wood—

What a man, so fine and good!

All corruption He withstood—

Praise the Lord, praise the Lord, praise the Lord!

  1. Jesus, wisdom of God’s plan,

Son of God and Son of Man;

A new manhood He began—

Praise the Lord, praise the Lord, praise the Lord!

  1. For since by the one came death,

By this man came living breath;

Man the Lord recovereth—

Praise the Lord, praise the Lord, praise the Lord!

  1. Types and shadows to us show

Jesus is the man to know.

Now this man in us must grow—

Amen, Lord! Amen, Lord! Amen, Lord!

  1. Lord, may Thy humanity

Permeate us thoroughly,

Drawing many men to Thee—

Amen, Lord! Amen, Lord! Amen, Lord!

463 经历主——在祂的人性里

一　何等荣耀，何等得胜，

神自己来成为人！

亲自穿上人的性情，

叫神计划得完成；

借著十架败坏魔鬼，

祂是人子已高升！

二　耶稣凭著人的美德，

将那诡诈者捕捉；

以人身分抵挡恶者，

所有试探全胜过！

如今我在灵的里头，

拥有祂一切美德。

三　祂的柔细为人生命，

乃是在耶稣灵里，

人性美德因祂能以

与神圣灵调为一。

如今这灵丰富无比，

足供全人类所需。

四　何等奥秘，却是真实，

人子在我里面住！

祂正扩展到我全人，

要从我里面活出。

阿利路亚，阿利路亚，

我要赞美永不止。

五　何等奇妙，何等荣耀，

神今在肉身显现！

我们乃是祂的肢体，

为将祂人性彰显。

我们现在凭祂而活，

让神居所早得建。

463 8.7.8.7.8.7.

  1. What a victory! What a triumph!

God Himself became a man,

Clothed Himself in human nature

To fulfill His mighty plan.

He through death destroyed the devil;

Risen now, the Son of Man!

  1. Jesus by His human virtues

Did the subtle one arrest;

He as man withstood the tempter,

Fully passed through every test.

Now in spirit I can take Him,

All His virtues to possess.

  1. In the Spirit of this Jesus

Is His human life so fine.

Human virtues have been added

To the Spirit all divine.

What abundance in this Spirit,

Rich supply for all mankind!

  1. How mysterious! Yet how real!

Such a man now lives in me.

Into all my heart He’s spreading—

He, my human life, to be.

Hallelujah! Hallelujah!

I will praise unceasingly.

  1. Oh, what wonder! Oh, how glorious!

God in flesh is manifest.

We the members of His Body

His humanity express.

For the building of God’s dwelling

We His human life possess.

464 经历主——在祂的死和复活里

一　浩大的能力，神已经显彰，

使祂的儿子从死复活。

愿见这能力，来将我刚强，

并在复活生命里生活。

(和)大能，大能，复活生命大能，

从里面大大加力我们！

大能，大能，复活生命大能，

在“里面人”里加力我们！

二　升高的能力，神将它展示，

使耶稣高升远超万物。

一切的执政、掌权和主治，

无不因基督的名拜服。

(和)大能，大能，超越一切大能，

从里面大大拔高我们！

大能，大能，超越一切大能，

在“里面人”里拔高我们！

三　征服的大能，今已赐基督，

征服一切，哦，阿利路亚！

作祂的身体，我们何有福－

一切都踏在我们脚下！

(和)大能，大能，征服一切大能，

从里面大大征服一切！

大能，大能，征服一切大能，

在“里面人”里征服一切！

四　这一切之上，祂掌管万有，

祂为教会作万有之首。

这荣耀大能归我们所有，

最高地位归教会所有。

(和)大能，大能，掌管万有大能，

里外全都由它来管理！

大能，大能，掌管万有大能，

藉“里面的人”掌权管理！

464 Irregular Meter

  1. Pow’r exceeding great God did demonstrate
    When He raised His Son from the dead.
    May this pow’r we see, with it strengthened be,
    And in resurrection life be led.

Power, power, resurrection power,
Energize us mightily within!
Power, power, resurrection power,
Energize us in the inner man!

  1. Pow’r exceeding high God did magnify

When He raised His Son far above all.
Principalities, pow’rs, and majesties
At the name of Jesus Christ must fall.

Power, power, all-transcending power,
Elevate us mightily within!
Power, power, all-transcending power,
Elevate us in the inner man!

  1. Pow’r surpassing too, all things to subdue

Has been given to Christ, pow’r complete.

We His Body are; so, hallelujah,

Everything must be beneath our feet!

Power, power, all-subduing power,

All-subjecting mightily within!

Power, power, all-subduing power,

All-subjecting to the inner man!

  1. And the best of all, overruling all,
    O’er all to the church Christ is Head.
    Pow’r so glorious over all’s to us;
    To the highest place the church is led.

Power, power overruling power,
Ruling over all, without, within!
Power, power, overruling power,
Ruling, reigning, through the inner man!

465 经历主——在祂的死和复活里

一　基督现在已经复活，

已从旧造得释放。

看，裹身布已经解脱，

祂今是新造新样。

(和)复活，复活，同主复活，

这是我们的心愿；

在新造里与主同活，

从今时直到永远。

二　祂的全人并祂身体，

都因复活成神圣；

祂与父神相调为一，

祂是我们的模型。

三　我们也需祂的复活，

作到我们全人里；

愿灵﹑魂﹑体，因这工作，

完全被带进神里。

四　我们寻求复活生命，

那个特出的一分。

“超绝复活，”冀能达成，

得脱尽旧造成分。

五　当我们信入基督时，

我们的灵已复活。

更藉享受祂话恩赐，

使魂也得以复活。

六　我们心思﹑情感﹑意志，

每时刻需被拯救！

内里各部旧造性质，

被主拔高并浸透。

七　复活的神，不仅如此，

还赐生命给身体，

直到全人变化尽致，

模成基督的形体。

465 8.7.8.7. with chorus

  1. Christ is now in resurrection,

From the old creation free.

See, He left behind His grave-clothes;

In the new creation, He.

Resurrection, Resurrection,

That is where we want to be;

Living in the new creation

Now and for eternity.

  1. All His being e’en His body,

Now are in divinity.

He with God is fully mingled,

And our prototype is He!

  1. We too need His resurrection

In our being to be wrought

That our spirit, soul, and body

Into God be fully brought.

  1. Lord, we seek an extra portion

Of the resurrection life.

This our goal—out-resurrection

From the old creation rife.

  1. Resurrected was our spirit

When we into Thee believed.

Now our soul needs resurrection

By the Spirit’s word received.

  1. How our mind, will, and emotion

Need His rescue every hour!

Lord, uplift from our old being

All our inward parts with power.

  1. Then the God of resurrection

To our body will give life,

And we’ll live in resurrection,

Every part conformed to Christ.

466 经历主——在祂的爱里

一　前我死在罪中，

心中盼望成空；

但今向罪已死，

因我与主同死。

(和)“祂是爱我，为我舍己，

”这话从何说起？

二　哦高，我不能达！

哦深，我不能察！

哦爱，无限大爱，

满我救主心怀。

三　我活，但不是我，

是主在我里活，

祂已救我脱离

罪和死亡的律。

466 6.6.6.6.8.6.

  1. Once I was dead in sin,

And hope within me died;

But now I’m dead to sin,

With Christ I’m crucified.

And can it be that “He loved me,

And gave Himself for me”?

  1. O height I cannot reach!

O depth I cannot sound!

O love, O boundless love,

In my Redeemer found!

  1. I live—and yet not I,

But Christ that lives in me,

Who from the law of sin

And death has made me free.

467 经历主——作我生命

一　我所事奉复活主，

今仍在世活著。

我知祂活著不误，

无论人怎么说。

我见祂的施恩手，

我听祂的声音；

每当我需祂时候，

祂必来临。

(和)祂活，祂活，祂今仍然活著！

与我交谈，同我行走，

生命窄路同过。

　　祂活，祂活，救恩给我得著！

你问我怎知主活著？

祂在我心中活！

二　繁琐世事围绕我，

祂仍以爱担当，

虽然我心渐疲弱，

但永不至绝望；

狂风怒浪虽不止，

我知祂在引导；

祂要显现的那日，

不久将到。

三　欢欣，欢欣，众圣徒！

你当扬声歌唱！

阿利路亚到永古，

归给基督我王。

祂是寻求者希望，

是寻得者力量，

再无人如此慈祥，

如此善良。

467 Irregular Meter

  1. I serve a risen Savior;

He’s in the world today.
I know that He is living,
Whatever men may say.
I see His hand of mercy;
I hear His voice of cheer;
And just the time I need Him
He’s always near.

He lives, He lives, Christ Jesus lives today!
He walks with me and talks with
me along life’s narrow way.
He lives, He lives, salvation to impart!
You ask me how I know He lives?
He lives within my heart.

  1. In all the world around me

I see His loving care,

And though my heart grows weary,

I never will despair;

I know that He is leading,

Through all the stormy blast;

The day of His ‘appearing

Will come at last.

  1. Rejoice, rejoice, O Christian,

Lift up your voice and sing

Eternal hallelujahs

To Jesus Christ the King!

The Hope of all who seek Him,

The Help of all Who find,

None other is so loving,

So good and kind.

468 经历主——作我生命

一　前远离神，死在罪中，

黑暗蒙蔽心眼；

今蒙主话照明得知，

主活在我里面。

(和)主活我里面，

主活我里面，

哦，这是何等救恩，

主竟活我里面。

二　如同阳光照射大地，

百花盛开争艳；

生命，光，爱从主而来，

祂活在我里面。

三　正如花朵隐于花籽，

树木孕于果实；

同样，满带真理﹑恩典，

祂在我里居住。

四　我心不禁羡慕像祂，

完全将祂彰显；

我被吸引不断思量，

主活在我里面。

468 6.6.6.6.8.6.

  1. Once far from God and dead in sin,

No light my heart could see;

But in God’s Word the light I found,

Now Christ liveth in me.

Christ liveth in me,

Christ liveth in me;

Oh! what a salvation this,

That Christ liveth in me.

  1. As rays of light from yonder sun,

The flow’rs of earth set free,

So life and light and love come forth

From Christ living in me.

  1. As lives the flow’r within the seed,

As in the cone the tree,

So, praise the Christ of truth and grace,

His Spirit dwelleth in me.

  1. With longing all my heart is filled,

That like Him I may be,

As on the wondrous thought I dwell

That Christ liveth in me.

469 经历主——作我生命

一　是否渴慕前来得著

基督丰满的基业？

是否想要学会

主所命定生活的秘诀？

主在祂话中已答复，

“基督是我们生命。”

敞开你心，投靠救主，

凭信让祂来居衷。

二　基督，那受膏者掌权，

治理祂所救众人，

日复一日更多彰显

在人里外的大能。

你所不能成就之事，

让祂灵运行于你，

你魂便能将此证实：

“非我，乃主在我里。”

三　神一切丰满住祂里，

你在祂里得完全；

起来，领取属天权利，

俯伏在父的脚前。

祂永不会叫你失望，

赞美祂，已经恩赏；

神圣丰富使你得享，

时刻靠主而前往。

四　主，我单纯来安息于

你信实不变的话，

我信宝血将我清洗，

并基督是主为大。

愿我作你运河，不断

流出你生命与爱；

赢得那些坐在黑暗

中宝贵灵魂归来。

469 8.7.8.7.D.

  1. Art thou hung’ring for the fulness

Of the blessing Christ doth give?

Longing now to ]earn the secret

Of the life He bids thee live?

In His word thine answer standeth,

“Christ who is our Life” it saith;

Open now thy heart, and trust Him,

There to dwell, henceforth, by faith.

  1. Christ, the Lord’s Anointed, reigning

O’er the life He died to win,

Daily shall reveal more fully

His great power, without, within.

What thou never could’st accomplish

Shall His Spirit work through thee,

While thy soul this witness beareth,

’Tis not I, but Christ in me.

  1. In Him dwelleth all God’s fulness,

In Him thou art made complete;

Rise, and claim thy heavenly birthright,

Kneeling at thy Father’s feet.

He will never disappoint thee,

Praise Him that the gift is thine;

Then go forth to live each moment

On sufficiency divine.

  1. Lord, I come, and simply resting

On Thy faithful, changeless word,

I believe the blood doth cleanse me,

And that Christ is crowned Lord.

Grant henceforth a ceaseless outflow

Of Thy life and love through me;

Reaching those who sit in darkness,

Winning priceless souls to Thee.

470 经历主——作我生命

一　荣耀中有一位，

祂生命是为我。

祂圣洁又公义、

得胜且超脱，

祂智慧又慈仁，

温柔且同情。

荣耀中的生命，

成了我生命；

(重唱每节最后一行)

二　荣耀中有一位，

祂生命是为我。

祂胜过了撒但；

祂完全解脱。

在生命中作王；

祂满有权能！

荣耀中的生命，

成了我生命。

三　荣耀中有一位，

祂生命是为我。

在祂毫无疾病；

祂毫不软弱。

祂刚强又有力，

超越且坚定！

荣耀中的生命，

成了我生命。

四　荣耀中有一位，

祂生命是为我。

祂里面有平安；

耐心何广博！

祂喜乐又发光。

祂盼望看见：

荣耀中的生命，

从我得彰显。

470 Irregular Meter

  1. There’s a Man in the glory

Whose Life is for me.

He’s pure and He’s holy,

Triumphant and free.

He’s wise and He’s loving,

How tender is He!

His Life in the glory,

My life must be.

(Repeat the last line of each stanza)

  1. There’s a Man in the glory

Whose Life is for me.

He overcame Satan;

From bondage He’s free.

In Life He is reigning;

How kingly is He!

His Life in the glory,

My life must be.

  1. There’s a Man in the glory

Whose Life is for me.

In Him is no sickness;

No weakness has He.

He’s strong and in vigor,

How bouyant is He!

His Life in the glory

My life may be.

  1. There’s a Man in the glory

Whose Life is for me.

His peace is abiding;

How patient is He!

He’s joyful and radiant,

Expecting to see

His Life in the glory

Lived out in me.

471 经历主——作我生命

一　这是我奇妙的诗章，

基督已经来临；

耶稣，我荣耀的君王，

今已安家我心。

(和)主在我里，主在我里，

基督是我奇妙的诗章，

主在我里，主在我里，

基督是我荣耀盼望。

二　那有如此感人图画，

爱与痛的图画；

那有新郎可爱如祂，

感动我心归祂。

三　我真快乐，因我接受

祂作我的元首；

我虽常使祂心担忧，

今向祂献所有。

四　我怎会再孤单无聊，

我怎能再跌倒？

我还有何缺乏﹑需要，

当祂被我得到。

五　今在祂怀我全信托，

祂是我的乐歌；

在基督里居住生活，

祂也内住于我。

471 8.6.8.6. with chorus

  1. This is my wonderful story,

Christ to my heart has come;

Jesus, the King of Glory,

Finds in my heart a home.

Christ in me, Christ in me,

Christ in me, O wonderful story,

Christ in me, Christ in me,

Christ in me, the hope of glory.

  1. Was there e’er story so moving,

Story of love and pain;

Was there e’er Bridegroom so loving,

Seeking our hearts to gain.

  1. I am so glad I received Him,

Jesus my heart’s dear King;

I who so often have grieved Him,

All to His feet would bring.

  1. How can I ever be lonely,

How can I ever fall;

What can I want, if only

Christ is my all in all?

  1. Now in His bosom confiding,

This my glad song shall be;

I am in Christ abiding,

And Christ abides in me.

472 经历主——作我生命

一　赞美基督住在我心，

作我们救恩的神；

神圣生命来救我们，

不是藉规条﹑章程；

须等我们竭尽所能，

神圣生命才来改人：

　　祂生命能改我们。

二　藉祂赐生命的大能，

祂能救我们到底；

将祂自己注入我们，

祂时刻拯救不息。

祂从里面救失丧者，

不仅救人脱离罪恶，

　　且救到荣耀四射！

三　我们的主是大祭司，

是真正赐生命者；

生命乃是祂的性质，

救我们将“己”攻克。

祂的生命永不会朽，

借此我们完全得救，

　　赞美神，祂必成就！

四　祂的生命完全够格，

带我们进入荣耀；

除此生命，我们如何

能达到这个目标？

自祂降世到十架上，

祂的一生饱经风霜，

　　祂经过阴间死亡！

五　祂保证救我们到底，

祂的生命在成全；

祂为我们，凡事亲理，

为使我们得完全。

我们生命只有失败，

但祂生命已经奏凯，

　　完全救恩已带来！

六　祂今活著为我代祷，

一直继续到永远；

祂今已为我们担保，

祂这祭司永不变。

一直不断为我代求，

这大祭司是我所有，

　　远超高天并万有。

七　现今靠祂进到神前，

不再退后入沉沦；

为得生命，现在进前，

好带进正常功能。

现在进前支取生命，

借此我们成祂子民，

　　并将死亡永吞尽！

472 8.7.8.7.8.8.7.

  1. Sing praise to Christ Who lives in us,

The God of our salvation;

Who saves us by His life divine,

And not by regulation;

After we’ve worked—done all we can,

His life has power to change a man:

His life divine can change us.

  1. He saves us to the uttermost

By His life-giving power;

Transfusing Himself into us,

He saves us hour by hour.

He saved the lost by coming in,

He’s saving now from more than sin:

He’s saving us to glory!

  1. Our Lord was constituted priest

To be a real life-giver;

Life is the nature of this One

Who can from self deliver:

His life is indestructible,

By it He saves us to the full:

Praise God, He’s fully able!

  1. His life is fully qualified

To bring us through to glory;

Were it not for His tested life,

’Twould be another story:

His life was fully tried on earth,

To crucifixion from His birth:

He passed through death and Hades.

  1. He’s Pledged to save us to the full,

His life is operating; .

He’s doing everything for us

’Tis all for our perfecting;

Our life’s a failure at its best,

Only His life can stand the test:

His life brings full salvation!

  1. He’s living now to intercede,

Continuing forever;

He undertakes into the age,

His priesthood changes never;

He always lives to intercede,

Such a High Priest is what we need:

He’s higher than the heavens.

  1. Come forward now to God through Him,

Ne’er shrink back to destruction;

Come forward now to get.the life,

Which brings the proper function;

Come forward now the life to take;

By life His people us He’ll make,

And swallow death forever.

473 经历主——作我食物

一　我主耶稣是生命源，

我主耶稣是活水泉；

喝了这水，主曾明说，

就永远、永远不再渴。

(和)难道永远不再渴？

是！永远不再渴！

难道永远不再渴？

是！永远不再渴！

喝了这水，主曾明说，

就永远、永远不再渴。

二　我主耶稣是永生仓，

我主耶稣是生命粮；

吃了这粮，主曾明说，

就永远、永远不再饿。

(和)难道永远不再饿？

是！永远不再饿！

难道永远不再饿？

是！永远不再饿！

吃了这粮，主曾明说，

就永远、永远不再饿。

三　我主耶稣是生命气，

祂的生命，我们呼吸；

吸了这气，直到永远，

都必拥有神的生命。

(和)难道有神的生命？

是！有神的生命！

难道有神的生命？

是！有神的生命！

吸了这气，直到永远，

都必拥有神的生命。

四　我主耶稣是生命酒，

神圣、芬芳，绝无仅有；

尝了这酒，每时每刻，

都必充满属天喜乐。

(和)难道有属天喜乐？

是！有属天喜乐！

难道有属天喜乐？

是！有属天喜乐！

尝了这酒，每时每刻，

都必充满属天喜乐。

五　我主耶稣是复活王，

死而复活，生命释放；

你接受祂，就必高歌，

且要永远、永远活著。

(和)难道永远地活著？

是！永远地活著！

难道永远地活著？

是！永远地活著！

你接受祂，就必高歌，

且要永远、永远活著。

473 8.8.8.8. with chorus

  1. We’re feeding on the living bread,

We’re drinking at the fountainhead;

And whoso drinketh, Jesus said,

Shall never, never thirst again.

What, never thirst again?

No, never thirst again!

What, never thirst again?

No, never thirst again!

And whoso drinketh, Jesus said,

Shall never, never thirst again!

  1. We are feeding on the living bread,

Eating of the feast our Lord has spread,

And whoso eateth, Jesus said,

Shall hunger nevermore.

W hat, hunger nevermore?

Yes, hunger nevermore!

What, hunger nevermore?

Yes, hunger nevermore!

And whoso eateth, Jesus said,

Shall hunger nevermore.

  1. We are breathing in the living air,

Breathing in the One whose life we share,

And whoso breatheth—now, fore’er—

Shall have the life of God.

What, have the life of God?

Yes, have the life of God!

What, have the life of God?

Yes, have the life of God!

And whoso breatheth—now, fore’er—

Shall have the life of God.

  1. We are tasting of the living wine,

In spirit tasting life divine,

And whoso tasteth, everytime

Shall have the joy of God.

What, have the joy of God?

Yes, have the joy of God!

What, have the joy of God?

Yes, have the joy of God!

And whoso tasteth, everytime

Shall have the joy of God.

  1. Christ is the resurrected King,

Who died and rose, our life to bring,

If you receive Him you will sing,

And live forevermore.

What, live forevermore?

Yes, live forevermore!

What, live forevermore?

Yes, live forevermore!

If you receive Him you will sing,

And live forevermore.

474 经历主——作我食物

一　生命树果，甘甜、丰盈，

是神来作生命。

前我死枯，如今活著；

前饥，今享丰盛。

二　是神领我到生命树，

享受神的基督。

其中滋味，甘甜、满足，

当我亲近我主。

三　基督是我生命源头，

作我属天食物；

祂是我的纯净享受，

祂外再无满足。

四　我今欢享这生命树，

此路我已得著！

今藉吃喝，生命加多，

我就因祂活著。

474 8.6.8.6.

  1. The tree of life, how sweet the fruit,

With God as life complete.

I once was dead, but now I live,

Was starved, but now I eat.

  1. ’Twas God that brought me to the tree,

With Christ Himself as meat;

How precious did that tree become

When I began to eat.

  1. The Lord Himself is food to me,

He is my life supply;

He will my pure enjoyment be,

None else can satisfy.

  1. I freely eat this living tree,

For eating is the way

To put God’s life inside of me,

To live by Him today.

475 经历主——作我一切

一　前要的是祝福，今要主自己；

前要的是医治，今要主而已；

前我贪求恩赐，今要赐恩者；

前我寻求能力，今要全能者。

(和) 永远举起耶稣，赞美主不歇；

一切在于基督，主是我一切。

二　前常用手抓主，今主手牵我；

前常无所适从，今抛锚稳妥；

前是宝贵感觉，今凭主口说；

前是频频苦试，今完全信托。

三　前是忙于打算，今则靠祈求；

前是悬切挂虑，今则主担忧；

前随我之所欲，今听主支配；

前不住的讨问，今不断赞美。

四　前我欲利用主，今则主用我；

前是我的事业，今为主工作；

前欲得人称赞，今求主欢喜；

前不过半得救，今被救到底。

五　前羡慕得著主，今知主属我；

前我灯将熄灭，今则光炳烁；

前所望的是死，今等候被提；

我所有的一切，都在主自己。

475 6.5.6.5.D. with chorus

  1. Once it was the blessing, Now it is the Lord;

Once it was the feeling, Now it is His Word;

Once His gift I wanted, Now, the Giver own;

Once I sought for healing, Now Himself alone.

All in all forever, Only Christ I’ll sing;

Everything is in Christ, And Christ is everything.

  1. Once ’twas painful trying, Now ’tis perfect trust;

Once a half salvation, Now the uttermost;

Once ’twas ceaseless holding, Now He holds me fast;

Once ’twas constant drifting, Now my anchor’s cast.

  1. Once ’twas busy planning, Now ’tis trustful prayer;

Once ’twas anxious caring, Now He has the care;

Once ’twas what I wanted, Now what Jesus says;

Once ’twas constant asking, Now ’tis ceaseless praise.

  1. Once it was my working, His it hence shall be;

Once I tried to use Him, Now He uses me;

Once the pow’r I wanted, Now the Mighty One;

Once for self I labored, Now for Him alone.

  1. Once I hoped in Jesus, Now I know He’s mine;

Once my lamps were dying, Now they brightly shine;

Once for death I waited, Now His coming hail;

And my hopes are anchored Safe within the veil.

476 经历主——作我一切

一　我们看见基督是实际，

但是不能只看见而已，

祂在我们所有的经历，

必须是一切。

祷告之时，瞻仰祂荣面，

读经﹑聚会认识祂恩典，

但在日常生活的细节，

祂是否一切？

阿利路亚！在光中看见，

主是何等真实又完全，

只要我们在每一时间，

在每一天，并在每一事件，

随处多方回到祂前─

经历祂的实际须具体！

不再笼统，摸不著边际！

只要应用祂，就必经历祂乃是一切。

二　我们一生充满了机会，

父所安排，为显祂智慧。

一切遭遇是最好最美，

使我得基督－

祂是内容，祂也是实际，

我们将祂来照耀不已，

你我身上祂必须有路，

祂必须有路。

阿利路亚！我们的身体，

常带主的死，被置死地，

祂的生命得显明无比。

外面的人虽然渐渐毁坏，

里面的人却新起来－

周围的人就都能看见，

宝贝实际在瓦器里面，

福音荣光全得著彰显－

　　是借著我们。

不是道理也不是神学，

乃是实际内容毫不缺，

　　基督作了你我的一切。

　　祂乃是我一切！

476 Irregular Meter

  1. We have seen Christ is reality:

But it’s not sufficient just to see:

He in our experience must be

Everything to us.

We in prayer behold Him face to face,

In the Word and meetings know His grace;

But in daily life, in every place,

What is He to us?

Hallelujah! By His light we see

Oh, how real, how full our Lord will be

If we’ll only turn to Him at every time,

in every day,

Every thing, in every way and—

Be specific for reality!

And be done with generality!

If we’ll just apply Him, we will see He’s everything to us.

  1. Life is full of opportunities

Ordered by our Father’s hand: we see

Everything’s the best that it could be,

So let’s gain Christ!

Christ our content and reality

To shine out from us unceasingly:

He must have a way in you and me,

He must have a way.

Hallelujah! In the body we

Bear the death of Christ continually:

Thus His life comes forth for all to see as

The outer man is broken down,

The inner man is shining so that—

In these earthen vessels men can see

There’s the treasure of reality!

Thus the gospel’s glorious light will be

Shining out from us.

Not just doctrines and theology,

But the content of reality:

Christ as everything in you and me,

He’s everything to us!

477 经历主——作我心中的主

一　我的旧人已经被废除，

在十架上已与主同死；

现在他再无任何用处，

对我他已死。

我的新人在我灵里住，

在我里面如活井涌出，

　　以祂丰盛生命来满布我的每一部。

基督在我灵里作了主，

我心天天向祂不别属，

让里面的人有家可住：

一个地方可作住处，

一个地方成为祂的－

那里是我完全的实际，

将祂所是向我全开启，

丰丰富富居住我心里，

　　作我活的主。

二　藉这位主成形在我里，

我成祂身上的一肢体，

所有行动都不再单独，

乃与众圣徒。

基督必须是我活的主，

我们天然个性须拆除，

天天拆毁直到全了结，

基督作一切！

惟有基督是我活的主，

再无自己的愿望﹑爱慕，

直到教会是基督本身，

建造成为一个新人，

使神永远旨意得成－

神人完完全全的调和，

得到一个合式的居所，

建立起祂国度的权柄，

　　在这地全境。

不是单单基督的自己，

还有教会同配合为一，

取用基督自己的丰盛，

成一个新人。

477 Irregular Meter

  1. My old person has been nullified;
    With my Lord upon the cross he died;
    Now in nothing shall he be applied;
    He’s dead to me.
    My new Person in my spirit dwells;
    Springing in me as a bubbling well;
    Flowing out until each part He fills With abundant life.

Christ, my Person, in my spirit lives;
And my heart to Him I’d daily give;
That my inner man could have a home
And a place to settle down, yes,
A place to call His own, and—
There be my complete reality,
There expressing all He is to me,
Living in my heart abundantly
As my Person real.

  1. By this Person being formed in me,
    I’ll a member of His Body be,
    No more acting individually,
    But with the saints.
    More and more our Person He must be;
    That our natural personality
    Be eliminated thoroughly
    Till Christ is all.

Only Christ, our Person, must remain;
From our aims, our goals we must refrain,
Till the church be only Christ Himself
Built up as the one new man,
Thus fulfilling God’s great plan of—
Mingling fully with the human race
To obtain a proper dwelling place,
‘Stablishing His kingdom’s rule and grace;
Over all the earth.

Not Himself just individually,

But the church together corporately,

Taking Christ as all in all, to be

The full-grown, perfect man.

478 经历主——作我心中的主

一　主，我们切求能认识

你是我们的主人；

并在里面不断经历

你的丰满与福分。

不再仅是外面知识，

或只是心思著迷，

而藉最真实的接触，

使全人都能归你。

(和)主是我们主人，

住在我们心里，

愿我们都能不断经历

这个实际。

二　全世界都在黑暗中，

被堕落之魂驾驭，

仇敌的计谋乃是要

将魂的生命管理。

直到神的怜悯促使

祂儿子住在人里，

今我们完全认识祂

在教会中的奥秘。

三　我们前在旷野流荡，

生活行事全属魂，

从不知道我们的灵

渴望彰显神丰盛；

就当耶稣进来之际，

立刻使情况改变。

我们今以灵为中心，

阿利路亚！新改变！

四　如今灵是我们真人－

何等荣耀的事实！

基督自己在我们里，

彰显神性和神旨；

不是魂生命的幻想，

乃是灵刚强﹑壮大；

基督自己今作主人，

祂是属我﹑我属祂。

478 8.7.8.7.D. with chorus

  1. Lord, to know Thee as our Person,

Earnestly we seek and pray;

To experience Thy fulness

In a constant inner way.

Never longer only outward

Or with soulish thoughts obsessed,

But, O Lord, in realest contact

We by Thee would be possessed.

Lord, Thou art our Person,

In our inmost being,

May we constantly experience

This reality.

  1. All the world is under darkness,

Driven by the fallen soul,

And the enemy designing

Does the soulish life control.

Such we were till God, through mercy,

Caused His Son to dwell in us;

Now we fully come to know Him

In His church so glorious.

  1. Once we walked a soulish person,

Wandering in the wilderness,

Never knowing that our spirit

Craved God’s fullness to express;

At the moment Jesus entered

Instantly the whole was changed.

Now we’re people spirit-centered!

Hallelujah! Rearranged!

  1. Now our spirit is our person—

What a glorious fact is this!

Christ Himself in us expressing

God’s intent and holiness.

Not the soul-life’s vain delusion,

But the spirit strengthened is;

Christ Himself is now our Person—

He is ours and we are His.

479 经历主——作我心中的主

一　我的旧人已经与主同钉，

它深处一切的污秽﹑恶性，

连古蛇性情也一同埋葬，

这个事实发生在我身上，

　　我要持守。

二　今在我灵里另有一主人，

如新生婴儿，微小且幼嫩，

靠著神话纯净灵奶喂养，

好让“里面的人”长大﹑刚强，

赢得我心。

三　主是我主人，须得著我心，

并在每一部分有如君临。

旧主人虽已死，但仍作祟。

哦主，愿我思﹑情﹑意都让给

你来作主。

四　主，在灵里与我调和为一，

神性与人性都和谐如一；

但你仍需有一正常器皿，

好让你的荣耀性情显明

在我身上。

五　主，因此我今将心献给你，

从此如同在你自己家里，

有一地方供你进来安息，

让你工作成就在新人里，

我恢复。

479 10.10.10.10.4.

  1. My old man has been crucified with Him,

With all its foul corruption deep within;

And buried too its nature serpentine,

Completely finished—this great fact is mine,

I hold it fast.

  1. But there’s a Person in my spirit now,

Born as a babe so small, so weak, so low;

Who by the Word’s pure milk will grow to be

The overcoming inner man in me

To gain my heart.

  1. Christ as my Person must possess my heart

And be preeminent in every part.

The former owner died but haunts it still.

O Lord, move in; my mind, emotion, will

Now welcome Thee.

  1. In spirit mingled, we are one,

O Lord, The human and divine in one accord;

Yet Thou must have a proper faculty

That all Thy glorious personality

May be expressed.

  1. So, Lord, I give my heart to Thee today,

That it may be Thy home in every way,

A place for Thee to come and settle down,

And all Thy grand recovery work to crown

In one new man.

480 经历主——作我心中的主

一　哦，基督在祂荣耀里穿上了人性，

借此祂作我主人，并且内住于我；

祂的生命与所是，对我祂全适应，

故祂这荣耀主人，取代了我。

(和)哦主，哦主，你是那人为我！

我接受你作我主人，

作我的完全真体；

哦主，哦主，征服我每一部，

　　每一时刻，每一处所，安家在我心里。

二　哦，基督成了那灵，在我里面说话，

作为那说话的灵，祂不停地说话。

祂的说话如水在里面将我冲刷，

清除我所有老旧，并分赐祂。

(和)哦主，哦主，尽量向我说话，

你说话是你的同在，我必接受不息；

哦主，哦主，说﹑洗我的各部，

藉新陈代谢的变化，安家在我心里。

三　新郎基督就要来娶祂荣耀新妇，

藉从我们里面将教会荣耀发表；

祂这主人是荣耀在我里面展布，

这是我们的主人，何其荣耀！

(和)哦主，哦主，借著你的经营，

将你荣耀彻底满溢、浸透我们全人；

来罢，来罢，在荣耀里显现，

哦，那尊荣者藉教会，在荣耀里显身。

480 egular Meter

  1. Oh, Christ in all His glory put on humanity

So He could be my Person, and live inside of me.

A man in life and being, He fully fits my case,

So all His glorious Person can me replace.

O Lord, O Lord, You are the man for me!

I take You as my Person, as my full identity.

O Lord, O Lord, subdue my every part,

And every moment, every place,

Make home in all my heart.

  1. Oh, Christ became the Spirit to speak inside of me,

And as the speaking Spirit He speaks unceasingly.

His speaking is the water that washes me within,

Discharging all my oldness, impaiting Him.

O Lord, O Lord, speak all You want to me.

Your speaking is Your presence—I must have it constantly.

O Lord, O Lord, speak-wash my every part

And by this metabolic change, make home in all my heart.

  1. Oh, Christ will come, the Bridegroom, for us, His glorious Bride,

By coming from within us the church is glorified.

His Person is the glory expanding now in us;

This glory is our Person—how glorious!

O Lord, O Lord, by Your economy

So flood us with Your glory, saturate us thoroughly.

Come out, come out, break forth in glory here,

And from the church, O glorious One, in glory soon appear.

481 经历主——作我永分

一　永远之神，我心已定，

定于你，定于你；

我的拣选，一定永定，

主为我，主为我。

是我先知﹑祭司﹑君王，

带来救恩，免我死亡，

一息尚存，我仍要唱，

主为我，主为我。

二　在主里我见神荣光，

主为我，主为我；

祂是神圣尊严君王，

主为我，主为我；

祂是父神喜悦爱子，

在宝座上与神同治，

独担人罪，并不推辞，

主为我，主为我。

三　让人夸耀金银财富，

主为我，主为我；

祂的丰富无法尽述，

主为我，主为我；

你的财宝必将锈坏，

你的尊荣转瞬不再，

但我福分永存不衰，

主为我，主为我。

四　无论健康，或是病苦，

主为我，主为我；

或处贫穷，或处丰富，

主为我，主为我；

当祂召我见祂之日，

我须应召不得延迟，

离开这个黑暗罪世，

主为我，主为我。

481 8.6.8.6.8.8.8.6.

  1. My heart is fixed, eternal God,

Fixed on Thee, fixed on Thee;
And my immortal choice is made,
Christ for me, Christ for me;
He is my prophet, priest, and king,
Who did for me salvation bring,
And while I’ve breath I’mean to sing,
Christ for me, Christ for me.

  1. In Him I see the Godhead shine,

Christ for me, Christ for me;

He is the majesty divine,

Christ for me, Christ for me;

The Father’s well-beloved Son,

Co-partner of His royal throne,

Who bore the guilt of man alone,

Christ for me, Christ for me.

  1. Let others boast of heaps of gold,

Christ for me, Christ for me;

His riches never can be told,

Christ for me, Christ for me;

Your gold will waste and wear away,

Your honors perish in a day;

My portion never can decay,

Christ for me, Christ for me.

  1. In pining sickness, or in health,

Christ for me, Christ for me;

In deepest poverty or wealth,

Christ for me, Christ for me;

And in that all-important day,

When I the summons must obey,

And pass from this dark world away,

Christ for me, Christ for me.

482 经历主——作我永分

一　今世福乐没灭，

基督属我！

地上爱情断绝，

基督属我！

在这幽暗野地，

无处可以安息，

惟有基督可倚，

基督属我！

二　莫诱我心离开，

基督属我！

我愿与主同在，

基督属我！

你这今世欢娱，

一时骗人之局，

从我心中离去，

基督属我！

三　去罢，今世幻梦，

基督属我！

我今已经清醒，

基督属我！

凡我从前所慕，

不过使我痛苦；

惟主使我满足，

基督属我！

四　去罢，短暂今时，

基督属我！

来罢，长久永世，

基督属我！

来罢，可爱福气！

来罢，甜美安息！

来罢，恩主自己！

基督属我！

482 6.4.6.4.6.6.6.4.

  1. Fade, fade each earthly joy;
    Jesus is mine.
    Break every tender tie;
    Jesus is mine.
    Dark is the wilderness,
    Earth has no resting place,
    Jesus alone can bless;
    Jesus is mine.

  2. Tempt not my soul away;
    Jesus is mine.
    Here would I ever stay;
    Jesus is mine.
    Perishing things of clay,
    Born but for one brief day,
    Pass from my heart away;
    Jesus is mine.

  3. Farewell, ye dreams of night;

Jesus is mine.

Lost in this dawning bright;

Jesus is mine.

All that my soul has tried

Left but a dismal void;

Jesus has satisfied;

Jesus is mine.

  1. Farewell, mortality;

Jesus is mine.

Welcome, eternity;

Jesus is mine.

Welcome, O Loved and Blest,

Wecome, sweet scenes of rest,

Welcome, my Savior’s breast;

Jesus is mine.

483 经历主——作我一切

一　耶稣，我救主，祂是我一切！

奇妙的救主，何等的可悦！

引导和保护，所有安渡过，

大能的救主——耶稣为我。

(和)耶稣为我！耶稣为我！

每时候，每处所，耶稣为我！

二　耶稣于康健，耶稣于病痛，

耶稣于富裕，或是于贫穷，

无论是日光，无论是风波，

祂是我平安——耶稣为我。

三　祂是我磐石﹑堡垒和盾牌，

祂是我生命﹑亮光和高台，

我的保护者﹑我的避难所、

我的救赎主——耶稣为我。

四　祂是我先知﹑祭司和君王、

我的生命泉﹑我的生命粮；

祂是我信实和我的寄托、

我的拯救角——耶稣为我。

五　耶稣于喜乐﹑或是于痛苦，

损失或利益，祂是我宝库；

无论在何处，祂顾我软弱，

留世或离世——耶稣为我。

483 10.10.10.9. with chorus

  1. Jesus, my Savior, is all things to me;
    Oh, what a wonderful Savior is He,
    Guiding, protecting, o’er life’s rolling sea,
    Mighty Deliv’rer—Jesus for me.

Jesus for me, Jesus for me,
All the time everywhere, Jesus for me.

  1. Jesus in sickness, and Jesus in health,

Jesus in poverty, comfort or wealth;

Sunshine or tempest, whatever it be,

He is my safety—Jesus for me.

  1. He is my Refuge, my Rock, and my Tower,

He is my Fortress, my Strength and my Pow’r;

Life everlasting, my Daysman is He,

Blessed Redeemer—Jesus for me.

  1. He is my Prophet, my Priest and my King,

He is my Bread of Life, Fountain and Spring;

Bright Sun of Righteousness, Daystar is He,

Horn of Salvation—Jesus for me.

  1. Jesus in sorrow, in joy, or in pain,

Jesus my Treasure in loss or in gain;

Constant Companion where’er I may be,

Living or dying—Jesus for me.

484 经历主——作我永分

一　主，我还有谁在天上？

惟有你！惟有你！

我的一生只此可唱：

主为我！主为我！

祂已为我流血辛劳，

祂作我的赎罪羊羔，

使我这人与神和好，

主为我！主为我！

二 我不追求自私福气，

我要主！我要主！

我不羡慕镀金玩意，

我要主！我要主！

自私福气不能长久，

性质定规瞬息甘休，

我的喜乐永远存留，

我要主！我要主！

三　我今弃绝为富思想，

主为我！主为我！

我不盼望自己安享，

主为我！主为我！

无花果树虽不发旺，

葡萄﹑橄榄无一可享，

棚内无牛﹑圈中无羊，

主为我！主为我！

四　我心现今完全安息，

主为我！主为我！

不怕试探常来攻击，

主为我！主为我！

任凭引诱力量汹涌，

我们靠主能够强勇，

能够冷笑它们无用，

主为我！主为我！

五　当我人生路程将毕，

我要主！我要主！

安全倚靠祂的手臂，

我要主！我要主！

我的躯壳虽有痛苦，

所有自然力量都无，

我仍高声歌唱欢呼，

我要主！我要主！

484 8.6.8.6.8.8.8.6.

  1. Whom have I, Lord, in heav’n but Thee?
    None but Thee! None but Thee!
    And this my song through life shall be:
    Christ for me! Christ for me!
    He hath for me the serpent trod,
    He hath redeemed me “by His blood,”
    And reconciled my soul to God:
    Christ for me! Christ for me!

  2. I envy not the rich their joys:
    Christ for me! Christ for me!
    I covet not earth’s glitt’ring toys:
    Christ for me! Christ for me!
    Earth can no lasting bliss bestow,
    “Fading” is stamped on all below;
    Mine is a joy no end can know:
    Christ for me! Christ for me!

  3. Though with the poor be cast my lot:

Christ for me! Christ for me!

“He knoweth best,” I murmur not:

Christ for me! Christ for me!

Though “vine” and “fig-tree” blight assail,

The “labor of the olive fail,”

And death o’er flock and herd prevail,

Christ for me! Christ for me!

  1. Though I am now on hostile ground,

Christ for me! Christ for me!

And sin beset me all around,

Christ for me! Christ for me!

Let earth her fiercest battles wage,

And foes against my soul engage,

Strong in His strength I scorn their rage:

Christ for me! Christ for me!

  1. And when my life draws to its close,

Christ for me! Christ for me!

Safe in His arms I shall repose,

Christ for me! Christ for me!

When sharpest pains my frame pervade,

And all the powers of nature fade,

Still will I sing through death’s cold shade;

Christ for me! Christ for me!

485 经历主——作我一切

一　我已寻到宇宙至宝，

我心因此欢呼；

欢呼基督给我得到，

何等一位基督！

二　我这基督是我先知，

满有启示、亮光，

也是祭司，神前尽职，

且是大能君王。

三　我这基督是王中王，

祂是万主之主；

又是神的公义太阳，

医治所有病苦。

四　基督是我食粮﹑活水，

我的医药﹑健康；

平安﹑力量﹑喜乐﹑安慰，

荣耀﹑冠冕﹑奖赏。

五　基督乃是我父﹑我友，

我兄并我心爱；

中保﹑策士﹑盼望﹑元首，

在天为我担代。

六　我这基督充满万有，

怎能述尽说竭？

祂是首先﹑祂是末后，

祂是一切一切！

485 8.6.8.6.

  1. I’ve found the One of peerless worth,

My heart doth sing for joy;

And sing I must, for Christ I have:

Oh, what a Christ have I!

  1. Christ is my Prophet, Priest, and King;

My Prophet full of light;

My Priest that stands ‘twixt me and God,

My King that rules with might.

  1. My Christ, He is the Lord of lords,

He is the King of kings;

He is the Sun of Righteousness,

With healing in His wings.

  1. Christ is my meat, Christ is my drink,

My medicine and my health;

My peace, my strength, my joy, my crown,

My glory and my wealth.

  1. Christ is my Father, and my Friend,

My Brother, and my Love;

My Head, my Hope, my Counsellor,

My Advocate above.

  1. My Christ, He is the Heaven of heavens;

My Christ what shall I call?

My Christ is First, my Christ is Last,

My Christ is All in all.

486 经历主——作我一切

一　主，我感谢你已指示，

我也开始认识－

你对属你者将如何，

他们对你如何；

只要他们向你降服，

信而顺从你的召呼。

二　何等奇妙，从未知晓

我能如此信靠；

在我一切所行路途，

对我你何丰足，

供应我的一切需要，

满足我心所慕﹑所祷。

三　我接受你作我保守，

今将我交你手，

我魂﹑道路﹑事工、问题，

全部交你管理；

我知我所信托一切，

你必保守完整无缺。

四　主，我接受你作平安，

保守我的心坎，

风暴之中有你平安，

使我不致慌乱；

正如你的国度扩展，

你的平安也在加深。

五　我接受你作我智慧，

你是智慧总归；

拣选世上愚拙之人，

将我分别为圣，

叫我为你说话﹑工作，

如同你在我里所作。

六　主，接受你作一切，

因你是我基业；

我无是处，一无所有，

但仍归你所有。

你就成为我的一切，

有你，我就凡事无缺。

486 8.6.8.6.8.8.

  1. I thank Thee, Lord, that Thou hast shown,

And I begin to see,

What Thou canst be to all Thine own,

What they may be to Thee;

If only they will yield Thee all,

And trustingly obey Thy call.

  1. How wonderful! I never knew

That I might trust Thee so;

That Thou wouldst be so much to me,

In all the way I go,

That every need Thou wouldst supply.

And all my longings satisfy.

  1. I take Thee as my keeper now,

And I commit to Thee

My soul, my way, my works, my cause,

In Thy sole charge to be;

And my deposit, Thou, I know
